Her other hand was behind you for the past few seconds, and you were so lost in her pretty eyes that you didn't see her grab a small plastic cup on the way back up. "IT'LL BE HARD TO SEE YOU IN THE TUB AT THAT SIZE. YOU'LL PROBABLY GET CAUGHT IN A BUBBLE OR SOMETHING AND FLOAT AWAY. I CAN'T LET THAT HAPPEN, AS ADORABLE AS THAT SOUNDS." Before you can react, she places the humongous cup over your tiny body and says "SO I'VE JUST GOT ONE MORE THING TO TAKE CARE OF BEFORE YOUR BATH." She stomps out of the room and you take the opportunity to pace around the inside of the cup, which traps you on all sides. You try lifting the lid up, but it's no use. You're just too tiny to do anything but sit there and ponder your current situation. You still feel damp from being inside Annie's sneaker, and you run your fingers across your back, taking a big sniff and getting a healthy nosefull of Annie's foot smell. Well, she was right about one thing: You were definitely in need of a good scrub down. You feel your body start to tingle again and you panic a bit, knowing that now you're going to be even smaller. You are so worried about what Annie will say that you completely ignore the loud sounds from outside until the plastic prison is lifted right up off of you. When you are brought back into the light, you don't see Annie. You don't see an empty room. What you see, to your shock, is the Shrink Ray that Annie had dragged into the room. You brace yourself for impact, and a bright red light covers your whole body. To your surprise, you don't feel a tingling sensation like the last few times, but rather a warm glow start from your belly and work it's way out. It's a totally new feeling entirely. And it doesn't take long for you to realize why it feels different: She's not shrinking you any furhter, she's growing you! The glowing feeling subsides and you find yourself still on the countertop, but now a much more manageable six inches tall. Annie steps out from behind the machine and hoists you up between a thumb and forefinger. She strokes your naked body gently and says "THAT'S BETTER. NOW I'LL BE ABLE TO HOLD YOU AND HEAR YOU AGAIN. WE'LL MAKE YOU A FLEA AGAIN SOON ENOUGH. BUT FOR NOW, IT'S TIME FOR MY LITTLE BOYFRIEND TO GET CLEAN. She lifts you up to her lips and gives you a gigantic kiss before releasing her grip on you. You freefall what seems like twenty or thirty feet, until you land in a warm, soapy lake of water. You stay under for just a second, letting the water soak you up a bit, before resurfacing. Waiting for you on the edge of the pool is the kind, smiling face of Anamika. You lay back in the water, floating on the surface, knowing that you're about to have the greatest bath of your life.
114332211.title: Washing the Foot Smell Off

choices: "I'LL CALL MY FRIEND LORI AND SHRINK HER WHEN SHE GETS HERE!"
"I'LL USE THE GUN ON THAT SHOE YOU'RE IN AND TURN YOU INTO A SPECK!"
11433222.content:
"HELLO? ANAMIKA? ARE YOU HOME?" You grip the edge of the sneaker, trying not to fall back in, as you stare up at the godlike visage of your friend's 18 year old sister, Meena. She was only a few years younger than Annie, with a bit shorter of a disposition, a slightly thicker frame, and short black hair. She was still cute, but she had a bit of a mean, jealous streak about her. Especially when it came to her sister's achievements in science. Annie was obviously much smarter than her, but that didn't stop Meena from occasionally "borrowing" some of her ideas and putting them into practice for herself. Annie once joked that it was the only reason she passed AP Physics. But now the giant girl is wandering around the room of her sister, unaware of the tiny presence on her sister's footwear. "HMMM SHE'S NOT HERE... LET'S SEE IF SHE'S MADE ANY PROGRESS ON THAT RESIZING DEVICE SHE WAS TALKING ABOUT..." Meena walks over to a dresser and starts filing though papers and folders. She's going to steal Annie's work! If you weren't the size of a bug, you'd help her out! For now all you can do is stare angrily at the jealous little girl looking to take the work of your best friend. While going through everything, she is distracted, and you see her turn her head towards the shoe that you're resting on. You freeze in terror as she stomps over towards you, reaching for the sneaker. "PEW. THESE SHOES REEK... DOESN'T SHE EVER WASH HER FEET?!? Acting on instinct, you jump into the sneaker to hide from the monsterous hand reaching out towards you, and make your way towards the toe section. You realize to your surprise that you're no longer getting smaller. Maybe 1/4 an inch is the lowest you can go? That's great to know! Now you can explore as much of Annie's feet as you'd like without the fear of shrinking down to nothing! But first thing's first, and you are snapped back to reality at the sight of Meena's gigantic thumb gripping the inside of the shoe. You fall over and grip the sweaty sole beneath you for dear life as the stinky container is lifted and brought across the room. "SERIOUSLY, IF I DIDN'T PUT THESE AWAY FOR HER, THE ENTIRE ROOM WOULD HAVE SMELLED LIKE HER DISGUSTING FEET." You can think of worst things. You expected to be dropped a great distance in the shoe, and braced for impact, but to your surprise, the shoe stayed suspended in the air after Meena opened the door to Annie's closet. You can hear her laugh to herself as she says "... THIS IS IT.... IT'S HERE!" Uh oh. She's found the shrink ray.

You hear her talk to herself going over the features. "JUST LIKE IN THE SCHEMATICS... SHE ACTUALLY BUILT THE THING! AND... IT'S BEEN ACTIVATED RECENTLY! THE SCREEN IS STILL ON!" She never lets go of the sneaker you're in, still too in shock of everything to move her limbs accordingly. She thumbs through the controls and sees the panel, as her eyes light up. "FIRST TEST SUCCESSFUL, MINIATURIZATION OF HUMAN MALE COMPLE... MALE?" Your blood goes cold as she pieces together that you've been shrunk! She turns to face the rest of the room and says quietly "THERE'S A LITTLE MAN IN THIS ROOM, ISN'T THERE... LITTLE PERSON! PLEASE COME OUT HERE! I WON'T HURT YOU, I JUST WANT TO LOOK AT YOU!" She slowly steps across the room, making sure not to accidentally step on any tiny people she comes across. "LET'S SEE, IF I WERE A TINY LITTLE PERSON, WHERE WOULD I BE? MAYBE UNDER THE DRESSER? MY BODY MUST LOOK ENORMOUS TO YOU, SO YOU MUST BE HIDING FROM ME." She lays down and places the sneaker back on the ground, searching under Annie's bed and dressers. She is becoming more and more excited with every place she looks, you can hear it in her voice. "LITTLE MEN CRAWLING AROUND LIKE BUGS, THAT'S FANTASTIC! MY SISTER'S FINALLY DONE SOMETHING TRULY AMAZING! BUT WHO WAS HER FIRST LITTLE ITTY BITTY TEST SUBJECT? IT MUST HAVE BEEN SOMEBODY SHE TRUSTS LIKE A CLASSMATE. MAYBE A LAB PARTNER? OR EVEN HER FRIEND...THAT GUY SHE CALLED HER..." You scream in horror as a smirk crosses Meena's face and she leans over the sneaker containing you, placing an eye over the opening. The massive eye scans the sneaker before coming to rest on your insignificant body, causing a look of shock and pleasure to sweep across her beautiful young face. With a smile, she lifts the toe end of the sneaker, causing you to tumble out of it, landing in the soft, warm palm resting on the floor. Before you have a chance to look up at your captor, she extends a thumb and forefinger, trapping you between them. She stares down at you while sitting indian style, gazing in amazement and confidence as she whispers across your tiny body...

"... TOE BOY."

You struggle in between her fingers, causing her to giggle at your plight. You pose no threat to her, and she's enjoying toying with another person in between her fingers like a bug. "YOU ARE SO CUTE. I CAN SEE WHY MY SISTER HAS ALWAYS HAD A BIT OF A CRUSH ON YOU. THEN AGAIN, SHE LIKED YOU BEFORE YOU WERE SMALL ENOUGH TO BE SQUISHED BY HER THUMB... OR MINE." To drive the point home, she increases the pressure on you, causing the air to escape from your lungs. You plead with Meena to stop, but she laughs at your attempts to get out of this situation and continues taunting you. "SO FIESTY. IF I WERE THAT SMALL, I WOULD LIKE TO THINK THAT I'D HAVE A LITTLE BIT MORE RESPECT FOR BIGGER PEOPLE. BUT NO MATTER. YOU ARE ALL THE PROOF I NEED TO SEE THAT ANAMIKA'S DEVICE IS A SUCCESS... BUT I STILL THINK ANOTHER TEST IS IN ORDER. I AM A SCIENTIST AFTER ALL." You scream up at her that she's not half the scientist Annie is and that she should change you back, but your voice falls on deaf ears as the thumb and forefinger release around you, dropping you back into the sneaker you were so anxious to dive into before. "NOW YOU STAY THERE WITH THE SMELL OF ANNIE'S FEET, WHILE I GO AND MAKE SOME PREPARATIONS. THIS IS GOING TO BE HUGE!" She laughs at her own joke before turning on her heel to head back to the closet. Meena's footfalls boom across the floor as you sit waiting to see exactly what she has planned for you. With a large scraping noise, you hear Meena drag the large shrinking device towards the middle of the floor , just a few feet away from the sneaker that contains you. Meena makes a few adjustments, using Annie's notes on the device, before turning it back on and laughing to herself. "FINALLY, I'LL STOP BEING THE 'LITTLE' SISTER. PEOPLE WILL STOP MAKING THE COMPARISONS BETWEEN ME AND GOODY GOODY TWO SHOES. FINALLY PEOPLE WILL RESPECT ME. BUT BEFORE I USE TO TURN MY SISTER INTO AN ANT... I'LL NEED ANOTHER HUMAN TEST TO MAKE SURE I'VE GOT THIS DOWN... AND I KNOW JUST HOW TO DO IT...
11433222.title: Meena, The Jealous Sister, Finds You

114332222.content:
You scramble to the edge of the shoe and try again in vain to get away out. You don't make it very far up as Meena looks down into the shoe, tapping it slightly with her finger to force you off the edge. "NO USE FIGHTING IT LITTLE BUG. SOON YOU'LL BE NOTHING BUT A SPECK. A PUNY LITTLE DUST PARTICLE ON MY SISTER'S FLOOR. WELL... MORE SO." She stomps away towards the device and fidgets with the controls, smiling as she hears it whirring into use. All you hear from your prison is her adjusting the device, stepping around it, and laughing. "FIRST I'LL SHRINK THIS LITTLE USURPER DOWN AGAIN, AND DISPOSE OF HIM. HE SEEMS TO LOVE ANNIE'S FEET, MAYBE I'LL PICK HIS MICROSCOPIC BODY UP WITH TWEEZERS AND DROP HIM INTO HER GYM SOCKS... THEN WHEN MY SISTER COMES HOME I'LL MAKE HER BITE SIZED... BUT HER IN A CAGE SO SHE CAN WATCH ME SHRINK EVERYONE AT THIS DAMN SCHOOL. WHEN I GET TIRED OF LOOKING AT HER I CAN JUST TOSS HER IN THE TRASH, THE LITTLE BITCH. You can't believe what you're hearing... this cute little girl is the biggest psychopath you've ever heard of! In more ways than one, you think to yourself, remembering just how huge she looked when she held you in between her fingers. Finally you hear her say defiantly "THIS IS IT, TOE-GERM. ENJOY YOUR NEW LIFE THE SIZE OF BUGS TO THE BUGS THEMSELVES! HAHAHAHA" You stare terrified up into the opening of the sneaker as a bright light shines from Meena's position. However, a sound arises that confuses and relieves you all at once. It's the sound of a computerized voice:

"UNAUTHORIZED USEAGE. ACTIVATING SAFETY MEASURES."

The giant Indian girl screams in horror as another, brighter light is seen coming from her position. "WHAT? NO! ANAMIKA YOU BITCH!" You hear her scream, then the scream gets quieter and quieter, followed by the machine powering down and then... nothing. You hear no noise. What the hell happened? You hear nothing for a few minutes and decide to try once more to escape the shoe. Unlike last time, your hands fit neatly between the fibers and make for very useful stepping stones. After a few minutes, you finally reach the rim of her sneaker, smelling fresh air for the first time since you were Meena's captive. you finally step onto the ridge, taking one last look down into the smelly shoe of your friend, before turning to face the machine. However, before you can take a look around you, a wall of flesh surrounds your body, with only your head poking out. You can't see the machine, the door or anything past something in your way. It's the angry, tired face of Meena! She's been shrunk! She ran across the expanse of the floor and climbed the outside of Annie's shoe just to get her hands on you, and now she has. Even though she's been miniaturized significantly, she's still big enough to grab you like a child's doll. Her eyes are wild with pulsing hatred and embarrassment as she screams at you "YOU LITTLE SHIT! LOOK AT WHAT YOU DID!" Although you know in your heart you should be terrified about this crazy girl's intentions for you, you can't stop yourself from laughing at her. She's been made as tiny as you were, maybe even smaller when this all started, and her voice is much higher pitched than normal. Her look of disgust and rage immediately changes to a look of embarrasment and humiliated temper as she screams "STOP THAT! STOP THAT RIGHT NOW, YOU FUCKING BUG! YOU THINK THIS IS FUNNY?" You don't know where you have the balls to say this to the girl who's trapped you in her fist, but you say "Eh... Kinda! I mean... You're small too! This is perfect" She is almost tearing up from the embarrasment of her plan failing so horribly, and drops down onto the floor with you still held tightly in her hand. "YOU'LL PAY FOR THIS! REMEMBER, I'M STILL BIG ENOUGH TO CRUSH YOU LIKE A FUCKING COCKROACH! NOW DIE, YOU PATHETIC MAN!" She drops you to the ground, causing you to fall almost fifty feet by your scale. To your surprise, the fall does almost nothing to you. You must be so light now that huge falls don't affect you like normal sized objects! You are so distracted by this realization that you don't see the foot kicking into you, causing you to fall to the ground in pain. "YOU RUINED MY PLANS TO SHRINK MY STUPID SISTER, BUT I CAN STILL HAVE MY WAY WITH YOU! SAY GOODNIGHT, BUG!" You gaze up at the naked form of your shrunken tormentor and she raises a foot up high to squash you. You close your eyes, waiting for death to strike, when you hear Meena say "OH SHIT!" What could have stopped her from killing you right there?
114332222.title: The Shrink Ray Backfired!

1143322221.content:
"NO... NO NO NO, NOT AGAIN!" You hear Meena's voice stop becoming imposing and powerful, and start returning back to the tone you'd expect from a normally short Indian girl. She starts stomping her feet in frustration, tearing up at the fact that now she's not even big enough to treat someone the size of a bug like a lesser person. You stand up to face the girl, but before you can start screaming at her for treating you like this, you notice that your vision is only up to the top of her chest. She's still taller than you, if only by a foot (by your scale), which is enough for her to still feel okay with her situation. "Well, I may not be a giant, but i'm still bigger than you, shorty!" And before you can even start to plead with her, her big bare foot comes swinging for your balls, dropping you to the floor. She gets on top of you, pounding away at your head, which you've barely been able to cover with your arms. Luckily, she's mostly fueled by rage at this point, and although she's got a bit of size on you, she's not landing any stiff hits. "You asshole! I wasn't supposed to be a goddamn bug, you were! You and everyone else who tried to stop me! How the hell am I going to grow back now? Even if Annie walked through that door right now, she couldn't see us, we're too fucking small!" Her cries were interrupted as the last thing you wanted to hear, came back. You used the distraction to push Meena off of your body, and crawl away, but the two of you looked to the other side of the room in terror as you heard a familiar voice...

"ERROR. SYSTEM OVERHEAT. ERROR."

The machine fires wildly from side to side, blasting objects all throughout Meena's apartment. Furniture, Appliances, even the sneaker you were previously trapped in was changed in size. To your surprise, the machine was affecting each target differently, with the couch in front of you shrinking to the size of a dime, but the sneaker became almost three times it's normal size! Each shot was charged with a different pulse that would make each object struck a crap shoot. The thoughts raced through your head of what would happen if the two of you were struck with the beam again, but before you could take cover or even think about moving, You felt your arm wrench behind your back, and a soft brown arm wrap around your throat. Meena was holding you tightly in front of her with no way for you to wiggle out without seriously injuring yourself. "If that thing shoots down at us, i''m making sure it hits you, There's no way i'm ending up a microbe on my sister's floor! Got it?" You struggle to escape but your efforts are in vain as the machine seems to zero in on the two of you. The Indian amazon snickers saying "Don't worry. Before you get too small to see, i'll put you on my big toe. That way you can shrink to nothingness surrounded by the smell of my pretty feet!" Fearing the worst, you wince a bit as a bright light escapes from the barrel of the machine, and strikes...
1143322221.title: A Small Error

11433222211.content:
The beam strikes you square in the chest, making you drop to your knees. Meena laughs victoriously, enjoying what she knew lay in store for you. "Hahaha! You pathetic little speck! You are going to get so small now that even microscopes won't be able to pick you up! Before i get back to my normal size, i'll still be able to squash you like an ant! This is priceless!" Her gloating only scares you that much more, knowing that soon you'd be nothing but a flea to an already bug sized girl. But then you get a feeling of warmth rush through your body, accompanied by a different look from Annie's twisted sister... it was a look of fear. "What? No! No! This isn't supposed to be happening!" Before you can realize what she's complaining about, it hits you that even on your knees, you're looking down at Meena's screaming form! You saw her dwindle down by your perspective, and you waved down condescendingly as your body rose back to the height of a human! Meena stomped and sobbed at the loss of her new toy, and you quickly rose to your feet, dodging any further strikes from your friend's shrinking machine. You crawl under the sight of the cannon to the wall behind the shrink ray and quickly yank the cord out from the wall, breathing a sigh of relief as the machine whirs to a stop and finally shuts off. You were happy to no longer be in danger from the wild spasms of size changing, but also that you weren't a bug on Annie's floor anymore. Wait a minute... Meena! She was still tiny! You got down on your hands and knees and slowly crawled back to the area of the rug with your friend's shoe. Looking next to it, you saw a doll-like figure screaming in a high pitched squeak. She wasn't afraid or nervous, but just screaming out of anger and stomping her little feet. You got a good laugh out of how cute she looked, so defenseless and tiny, while still so full of rage. You reached down slowly for her and before your hands could wrap around her small body, she lunged forwards, striking your skin with her tiny fists. You could hear her squeak quickly and angrily, but you had no idea what she was saying, she was just too small for you to hear. You wrapped your fingers around her little form, and she continued to strike your hand and throw a tantrum while in your grasp. You lifter her up to your ear, and she unleashed a tirade on you. "You bastard! I'll get you for this! Put me down right now! You can't treat me like a fucking doll!" You laughed and said very matter of factly "Actually, I think I can. And you know what? You're a very, very little doll that deserves a time out." You walk over to Annie's dresser drawer, which miraculously wasn't shot by the shrink ray, and opened up the top section. Meena screamed in horror "No! No! Don't put me there, Damn It!" But you ignore her tiny pleas and deposit her softly into Annie's panty drawer. She bounces onto the top layer of linens and screams up at you, falling backwards onto the oversized fabric. You laugh again at how cute she looks and whisper down to her "You should be grateful I didn't step on you, you crazy bitch! I'll let Annie decide how to punish you, but for right now, enjoy some quiet time around her underwear. By the way, don't walk over towards her socks. You may end up getting even smaller." She lets out a high pitched swearing session before you laugh and close the drawer, trapping her inside.

You figure you'll wait for Annie to get back so you can tell her all about your crazy adventure with her now bug sized sister. Waiting around for her was getting boring, so you decided to inspect some of the modified items lounging around Annie's apartment. Judging by some of the items that hadn't been transformed at all, you were able to gauge that you weren't actually back to your normal size, but about a foot and a half shorter. You hoped Annie would be able to fix her machine relatively soon once she got back, you didn't want to spend the rest of your life as a midget. Then again it could be much worse, you thought to yourself, as your attention was brought back to the panty drawer her sister was held prisoner in. You laughed at the obsurdity of everything, which was only intensified when you walked past her now enlarged sneaker. The smell was starting to reach all over the room, and you still couldn't help but take a big whiff when you got close to it. You felt your body tingle and your height drop even further, but it was only a foot or two, so you were able to laugh it off and sit down on the floor, letting the whole experience sink in. Your personal meditation was interrupted however, as the door of Annie's apartment started to open. "HELLO, LITTLE TOE BOY HOW ARE YOU... DOING?!" Annie was carrying shopping bags which immediately dropped to the floor in shock as she saw how her room was "redecorated". "Hey Annie... um... like what i've done with the room?" Annie is dumbfounded by seeing you at your current height of three feet tall, despite the fact that when she left you just a while ago, you were small enough to fit between her toes. She kneels down next to you and gives you a hug before looking at you with a confused expression. "YOU... YOU'RE BIGGER?! HOW?" You sighed and told her the story of her sister's crazy attempt to use her machine and how the two of you ended up on the raw end of a shrinking spree. Annie couldn't help but laugh a bit in amazement and said "YES, I ENACTED THOSE COUNTERMEASURES TO MAKE SURE THAT THE DEVICE WOULDN'T FALL INTO THE WRONG HANDS... I HAD NO IDEA THOSE HANDS WOULD BELONG TO MY OWN SISTER! WHERE IS SHE NOW?" You try and stifle a laugh yourself, holding your hand up to cover your mouth. All you can get out is "Promise not to get mad?" as you point to her dresser. Annie quickly stands up and opens the drawer, her mouth gaped wide open as she sees her miniscule sister looking up at her. She shakes her head a bit to wipe away some of the shock and an angry expression crosses Annie's face. "MEENA! HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME... I TRUSTED YOU! LOOK AT WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU NOW! IF I DIDN'T LOVE YOU SO MUCH, I WOULD SIMPLY CRUSH YOU WITH MY THUMB!" You couldn't see Meena's reaction to this, but you guessed it was one of horror since Annie closed her eyes and said "NO, NO... I WOULDN'T DO THAT TO YOU BUT... OOH, YOU MAKE ME SO ANGRY! THIS DEVICE WAS NOT MEANT FOR YOUR SELFISH NEEDS! MAYBE YOU SHOULD SPEND SOME MORE TIME AT THAT SIZE TO THINK ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE!"

Annie took her miniaturized sister between her thumb and forefinger and brought her to her shirt pocket, dropping her inside. She patted the outside and smiled at you saying "NOW THEN, LET'S GET EVERYTHING IN THIS ROOM BACK TO NORMAL. STARTING WITH YOU." She tinkers with her machine for a few minutes before turning it back on. She stands behind it and zaps you with the ray, enlarging you back to your normal height. Annie hands you back your clothes and you quickly put them on, watching in amazement as Annie recalibrates the device between shots, reversing the effects of everything in her room until it looked like nothing had changed from before. After powering down the shrink ray, Annie leaps at you, giving you a huge kiss, and hugging you. "I'm sorry for putting you through all that... It must have been so scary being so helpless while my sister was planning on doing... god knows what to you!" You look her in the eyes, lost in their beauty and say "It was scary... but i knew that you'd be there to protect me eventually. Just like you always planned on doing." Annie smiles and gives you another kiss, saying "I think with a few more tests I'll have finally perfected the shrink ray. I would be... honored if you'd help me with further testing!" You think about it for a second, remembering how frightening it could be to not have control over your own size. But then again, you look into Annie's eyes and know she really trusts you with this. You two are beginning to have quite the connection. Plus, if she ends up shrinking you again, it could only mean more fun with her pretty feet somewhere down the line. You say "I'll help you with whatever you want, just don't step on me." Laughing, Annie says "I won't make any promises, toe boy. But i've got an idea of what the two of us can do next..."
11433222211.title: You're getting... bigger?

choices: Promise to be nice to her until you return to normal size
Put her in your pants to punish her
Leave her in the carpet to fend for herself
11433222212.content:
Meena lets go in an instance, saying "Ah... That stung... wait.. NO!" You smile confidently and say "Well well. Looks like somebody's going to be getting a little bit shorter, aren't they?" Meena starts to back away from you quickly saying "St.. Stay back! I'm warning you! You'd better not do anything to me, alright?" You step towards her slowly waiting for the effects to take place and say "Or what? You'll hurt me? Torment me? What was that you said you were going to do? Pick me up with tweezers and drop me in Annie's gym socks? No. You just stay here in the carpet and if you're lucky, you won't get picked up by the vacuum. I win." You start to walk away and head towards the ray gun, hearing Meena's defeated cries fade behind you as you contemplate just how to get back to normal. The ray gun is still going off every few minutes or so, shrinking random items in the room. If you could climb up the gun, maybe you could shut it off. Then when Annie comes back, you can wait for her on top of the machine. She's bound to see you there! The plan is bulletproof. That is, until you feel an earthquake on the right side of you. You quickly turn and your face goes pale as you come face to face with a giant... brown... foot. You pan your head up to see Meena, a monstrous giant, looking down with blind, pure rage. She's not quite up to her normal height, but it's still tall enough for you to feel threatened by her mere presence. She whispers very softly, and very cruelly "YOU... FUCKING... BUG..." You start to run away, knowing that even if you wanted to, there's no way you could get away from her at this height. But you had to try. It's just your luck that the ray gun would have a growth effect on the one item in the room you actually WANTED to be shrunk. You run through the thick carpet, feeling the powerful stomps all around you. Meena isn't toying with you anymore. She wants you dead. Her voice is deep and strong as she homes in on you and prepares to finish you off. "NO MORE GAMES. NO MORE CHANCES. DIE UNDER MY FOOT!" You instinctively hold your arms up to protect yourself, even with the knowledge it will do nothing to save you. Only a miracle can help you now. And that's when you hear...

"ERROR. SYSTEM OVERHEAT. ERROR."

You could feel the heat from her foot hovering over you, knowing that the end was near. But you were saved yet again as you noticed the foot getting smaller before your eyes. Meena let out a terrified shriek that got higher and softer, until you could barely hear it anymore. When you looked down at her position, you couldn't see the shrunken girl anymore. Knowing she was lost somewhere in the carpet, You wade through the oversized bristles of the carpet and finally find what you were looking for. A tiny indian girl, no bigger than your thumb, struggling as she tries to free herself from an oversized collection of lint and hair. You can't help but chuckle a bit at her predicament, causing her to look up at you in anger. You have to admire that despite her size, she's not letting go of her rage so easily. "You! You did this to me, you fucking shit! You think this is funny?" You smile and say "Kind of. I mean, you do sort of deserve it." She screams as she struggles in vein to untangle herself from the filthy mess she's gotten herself into. You decide to lend a helping hand and pluck her off the ground between your thumb and forefinger, depositing her into your palm. She's still covered in the dirt and hair trap that she landed in, so using your free hand, you rip away some of the strands of dust. When you get to her face, she tries to bat your hand away with her arms, saying "Get off of me! I will not be handled and treated like this!" You smirk and lean in close, saying "Oh yeah? What are you going to do about it? Step on me? Go ahead and try it now, shorty." Meena drops to her knees and lets out a high pitched squeal of anger as she beats her fists against your palm. You can't help but laugh as the little shrunken Indian girl, who's no bigger than a pen cap to you, stomps around on your open hand, throwing a tiny little hissy fit. "It's not fair! I was big again! I'm supposed to be the big one! And you're supposed to be the shrunken... little... bug..." She stops her tantrum mid sentence and slowly pans her face up to meet yours. You look down at her with joyous confidence and say "Yeah? Well, now you know what it feels like to be helpless in somebody else's hands." Almost as if the weight of the situation drops onto her at once, Meena starts to cower in your hand and says "W...What are you going to do with me?" Good question. You could show mercy on the girl who tried to crush you like a bug, or you could do the very same thing to her. Then again, at this size she's pretty cute. Maybe you could have some fun with her until her big sister comes back to make you big again. The choice is all yours...
11433222212.title: In Charge for Just a Second

choices: Annie comes back and finds the pair
Annie's grandma comes in with a vacume
The shrink ray cools down and goes off
114332222121.content:
Despite her earlier actions you couldn't find it in you to punish the girl. Being shrunk even smaller than you were seemed like punishment enough. Besides there's no telling how Annie would react if you messed with her little sister despite her transgressions against you.

"Don't worry Meena. I'll keep you safe until Annie get's back." You tell the shrunken girl. The look of shock on her face was priceless. So much so that you couldn't help but laugh as you walked over to Annie's work shoes. "What's wrong? Cat got your tongue?"

The cat very well might have. Meena was so stunned by your words the she couldn't get any out. She'd just tried to shrink you into nothing, told you she was going to shrink her sister into nothing, and pretty much rule the world and yet you weren't trying to get even and crush her flat. "You're lying." she finally got out.

"Oh?" You said in mock surprise. Of course she wouldn't believe you. Common sense dictates you should be doing everything in your power to teach her a lesson. But you weren't. "Despite what you might believe I'm being serious here. Let's just pretend this whole mess never happened."

"Now I know you lying!" Meena shouted. "There's no way anyone would sweep a mess like this under the rug! You should be pissed right now! Foaming at the mouth in rage ready to do whatever you want to me! So why? Why are you acting like nothing ever happened?!"

You finally stopped near Annie's work shoes and took a seat. You looked down at the now tiny woman in your palm and sighed. "You think I'm not mad? I'm freaking pissed. You tried to eliminate me and made it pretty clear you're not to fond of Annie either. But your still Annie's little sister and she loves you. How would she feel if something happened to you? So for her sake, I'll forgive you and forget this whole mess ever happened."

Meena was speechless. You made no sense to her. You defied every one of her cynical beliefs. She wronged you and yet you chose forgiveness. For the first time in a long time, Meena felt something she'd long since forgotten... Guilt. She quickly squashed that feeling down though and shook her head. "Fine. Let's just ignore this moment in history and wait for big sis to get back."

You smiled. "I knew you'd see things my way."

Meena grumbled. "Just what do we tell her if she even finds us?"

"Just leave that to me."

Meena grumbled again.
114332222121.title: Truce

choices: Your story of explaining the fiasco to Annie and more size changing hijinks.
Meena's quest to survive and/or be seen by the human eye.
114332222123.content:
"Hmm... What to do with you..." you muse. "How about nothing, you bastard!" Meena yells up at you, still angry. She was like a little bug running around, kicking you, cursing in both English and Indian. "Oh, yeah? Why should I, toe girl?" you smirk, feeling very dominating above her. That's it. She's had it with that final remark. She bends over and bites you pinkie as hard as she can. Pain shoots up your hand. "Owww! You damn bitch!!!" you holler in rage, surprised she can still give you pain at her new size. It doesn't take long for Meena to realize she made a stupid mistake, her smug mug of satisfaction shifting into a blank face full of terror. You grin evilly, realizing the perfect punishment for the mini Indian girl. "Hey! Remember how you said you wanted to shrink the 'whole damn school' down to size? Well, how about instead, you get your own new small town?" "What are you... Oh, God no! Please don't--" she begs after you gesture the the huge carpet. "Don't worry about it! The smell is like no other, it's an exotic area, and there's plenty of solids and liquids to snack on! And best of all, you'll be the first human inhabitant! It won't be long before your new neighbors are inviting you over. For dinner. What do you say?" "Please don't do it! I'll do anything! I'm sorry--" "Excellent choice. Enjoy your temporary stay!" You point your index finger at the insignificant girl, preparing to flick her off you palm and into her new home. She begins to scream, but is flicked off far away in the distance before she can start. You stand still for a few seconds, wondering if you did the right thing. "Pfft. That bitch deserved it." you mutter under your breath, beginning to walk away from her.

Which POV do you want to follow next?
114332222123.title: Marooned in Carpet Land

choices: The creature finishes its meal and leaves.
Meena feels two mandibles grab onto her and lift her up.
1143322221232.content:
Meena screamed as the large finger came into view, sending her tumbling off of the fleshy surface that was the boy's palm and very far away at a high speed. She eventually began to slow down, but did not fall because she was small enough to float through the air instead of fall to her death. This was a welcome attribute to her puny height, but reminded her how truly tiny she was.

The mini Indian eventually crashed into a huge carpet strand, knocking the wind right out of her and causing her to slide down to the very bottom. As soon as she regained it she lost it again in a huge gasp. The fibers looked so much taller from the bottom, nearly obscuring the top of Anamika's bedroom ceiling. The tiny teen then saw strange gray clusters all around her that extended up to her hips. They looked very familiar, but she couldn't quite place her finger on it. Before she could, some strange noises that sounded like footsteps approached her. She yelped, hiding behind the strand of carpet, petrified in fear. She barely poked her head out to see a terrifying grayish alien creature come out of nowhere. It was shaped like a potato, had many legs, and had two big mandibles by what she assumed was its head. To her size, it was at least as big as a car! The abomination seized some of the clusters, eating them with its mandibles. She gulped. The monster was running out of clusters to eat, and it was approaching her. She stood stiller than a statue, begging it wouldn't see her.
1143322221232.title: Monsters or Worse

choices: Cut to a few days later.
11433222212321.content:
After what felt like an eternity, the awful creature scurried off, satisfied with its meal. Meena stepped out, literally shaking in pure terror, as it all started to make sense. She recognized the thing that had nearly found and eaten her from her sister's project on the microscopic world. It was a dust mite, a tiny mite that was one about 1/5th of a millimeter in height. That meant those gray clusters were specks of dust. She couldn't be more than 1/100th of an inch! At her new (and probably permanent) size, she was too small to be seen without a microscope! This was her life now, running from bugs she was a bug in comparison to and mites larger than bears, trying to scavenge "food" for herself that was nothing more than grime and dust particles, trying to avoid her colossal family as they pondered her location--

No. She snapped out of it. She would not end her life like that. She had to get a grip on herself before she completely lost her sanity down here. She had a small and stupid plan, but it was a plan nonetheless:

1). Survive.
2). Try somehow to get a person's attention and/or return to normal size.
3). Get revenge on the asshole that banished her here for all eternity if she could.

She stood up, motivated, and began her trek, not sure which way was which.
11433222212321.title: The creature finishes its meal and leaves.

choices: Anamika's back -- and she's about to vacuum her carpet...
The boy from earlier walks through the carpet, now at normal size.
114332222123211.content:
It wasn't very long before Meena felt some loud, thumping noises knock her off her feet. Unlike the others ones she had felt earlier, these ones seemed to be approaching her. She climbed a carpet strand to view her surrounding. Her jaw dropped when she saw what it was.

What was it?
114332222123211.title: Something happens.

114332222123212.content: After a few days of long and torturous hiking, Meena finally saw some sort of clearing in the distance. She runs the last quarter mile to see it and finds that it is the small gap underneath her sister's door. She climbed the metallic guard that cut off the carpet, and slid down the other side to land in a world of wood. She's so happy, she kisses the ground a few times before standing back up and taking in her surroundings. She knew her house like the back of her hand, but not like this. The micro teen was in the hallway, just outside a door large enough to crush 20 football fields. She see more doors in the distance, and ponders where to go.
114332222123212.title: The Many Minuscule Misadventures of Micro Meena

11433222212322.content:
After peeking out again a few minutes later, Meena sighed with relief. The horrible monster was gone. Suddenly, the room got dark. Was it night already? She checked her watch, only to find in disbelief that it was only 4:15 P.M.

Wait a minute...

She migh not have been as bright as her sister, but she realized what it was before the feeling did. Two mandibles latched on tightly to her side, as she kicked and screamed and tried to escape, but with no prevail. The dust mite raised the pathetic particle up to its mouth, pulverizing Meena in a instant. Then it went on, finally satisfied with its meal.
11433222212322.title: A Dusty Meal

115.content:
You walk slowly over to the blades of grass that extend above you like massive redwoods. You hear a booming noise get closer and closer to you as you feel your friend take enormous footsteps in your direction. "My god, how small did she make me?!" You think before being thrown back with great force by a gust of wind. You look ahead of you and see a massive toe, at least three times as tall as you, wiggling in anticipation. Her foot is unbelievably huge, and that's just one part of her. You look upwards and see the goddess in white staring down at the grass. Her giant lab coat is swaying in the breeze. Her large brown legs extended up into her like skyscrapers. You realize you can't be more than 1/4 of an inch tall!

"Annie! I'm down here!" You say loudly, knowing in your heart that your voice is too small for her to hear. You use the ridges of her toe to climb up, and stand on the top of her unpainted toenail. The toes next to you wiggle as you hear the giant girl above you laugh victoriously. She's still the short little indian girl you knew and loved, but by your scale, she was an absolute goddess. You bang on the toenail as hard as you can and hear her say from the heavens "WELL, THERE'S STILL NO SIGN OF MY FRIEND... BUT I SEEM TO HAVE FOUND AN INSECT!" She drops to her knee, leaving her toe in the exact same place so she doesn't throw you off. She laughs and says "YOU KNOW, I SHOULD REALLY WEAR SHOES OUT HERE. IF I STEP TOO CLOSE TO THE GRASS, MY FEET TEND TO GET COVERED IN BUGS!" She laughs at her own joke as you scream up at her to be careful. She looks down at you and reaches into her coat pocket, pulling out a pair of tweezers. She closes one eye to concentrate with the other as she says "NOW BE STILL, TOE BOY... I WOULD PICK YOU UP WITH MY FINGERS BUT I'M AFRAID I MIGHT SMOOSH YOU BY MISTAKE... THIS WILL BE SAFER!" You feel uneasy as the massive tongs reach towards you and grab your sides. you are lifted into the air, face to face with an Indian Goddess. She giggles and says "DON'T WORRY, I'LL BE SURE TO RETURN YOU TO MY WARM SOFT FEET... BUT ONLY IF YOU'RE GOOD AND DO WHAT I SAY! YOU'LL BE A GOOD LITTLE TEST SUBJECT, WON'T YOU?" Her warm breath washes over you as you stare into her massive mouth. She could pop you right in and eat you like a snack. But your attention was still brought down to her feet. You hadn't even realized until you were lifted off of them how good they smelled and how soft the skin was. All you could think about was getting back down to her massive toes. But she had other plans. "LET'S GO INSIDE, AND CONTINUE THIS EXPERIMENT PROPERLY." She thought for a second, squinting at you. "BUT HOW SHOULD I TAKE YOU INSIDE...."
115.title: Like Skyscrapers! (1/2 an inch or less tall)

choices: "HAVE SORT OF A THING FOR TINY MEN"
1152.content:
You were hoping she would take you back in something a little bit more comfy (like maybe her sock?) but instead, Annie merely dropped you into the pocket of her labcoat, letting your tiny body bounce against the fabric. Staring up at her, you yelled at her to be more careful with you, but the massive Indian girl didn't pay you any notice. Instead she patted against the outside of the pocket, as if the secure you, but instead it just shook you around your white colored prison even more. "NOW THAT I KNOW YOU'LL BE SAFE, LET'S GET INSIDE AND START SOME MORE TESTS!" Your light is cut off by the massive form of her hand reaching into the pocket and laying on top of you. Your entire body is covered by just two of her fingers, which hold you tight against her palm in an unyielding grip. She's probably not even using any energy to keep you there, but your tiny body is pinned against the warm flesh of this Indian beauty. her hand smells like a cinnoman lotion, and you start to feel comfortable in her warm embrace. The fingers move slightly up and down your miniscule body, and a laughter echos around you. She is obviously having some fun feeling her tiny bug sized friend trapped in her hand. The area around you is starting to get sweaty and you feel yourself almost in a free fall, sliding from finger to finger, looking for anything to grab hold of. You wrap your hands around her pinkie finger, and hold on for dear life as your hot prison stops shaking.

She must have stopped walking. Those few steps into her house felt like an eternity for someone in your position. All of a sudden, the two fingers closest to you grasp you between them and your body is lifted from the pocket. The world goes zooming by as the fingers head to their destination and lower down to a solid white plane. You manage to unstick yourself from the sweaty lotioned hands of your friend, and you land on the surface. You look around and see several beakers, a metal ruler that is trapped in the upright position, and a diagram that seems to show an outline of a human, and on next diagram over is a significantly smaller drawing of the same outline. You can't even fathom a guess as to how long she's been working on this project, but it's obvious that it paid off. You walk around the desk trying to get familiar with your surroundings. Without a human to compare yourself to, the simple objects on her desk are breathtaking. Pens are about twenty times as long as you are tall. You could trap yourself without escape in what looks like a ring for her index finger. And you make your way up to the ruler and stand up to measure yourself, confirming that Annie's machine has in fact made you only half an inch tall. You're the size of a bug in the care of your Indian friend. And just as that thought crossed your mind, a strong voice came over your body. "SO, NOW THAT YOU'RE THIS SIZE, WE'RE GOING TO NEED TO PERFORM SOME TESTS. MAKE SURE THAT THE MINIATURIZATION HASN'T DONE ANYTHING TO YOUR BODY BESIDES MAKING IT TEENY TINY."

Looking back, you see that Anamika has taken off the lab coat, revealing a pink tank top. Her eyes glistened behind the lens of her glasses, and her smile was so reassuring, you completely forgot that you were the size of an ant on her desk. "COME TO THE EDGE OF THE DESK PLEASE, SO WE CAN BEGIN". You would follow this woman into battle if you could. You were totally under her spell. Coming to the front of the desk before her massive body, you watched in awe as her giant frame bent down to gaze at her little subject. She was an absolute goddess, coming down to earth to look you in the eyes, it was breathtaking. hot air flowed over your body as the goddess asked "NOW BEFORE WE GET INTO THE ROUTINE PROCEDURE, I WANTED TO LET YOU KNOW WHY I SHRUNK YOU IN THE FIRST PLACE." Drumming her massive fingers against the desk, causing thunderous slams at your tiny size. "IT'S NOT REALLY BECAUSE OF THE POSSIBILITIES OF GOOD A DEVICE LIKE THIS COULD DO, OR BECAUSE I WANTED THE FAME AND ADULATION." She gets in very close to you and whispers onto your tiny body, "I MADE SURE YOU WERE THE FIRST PERSON I SHRANK BECAUSE I WANT YOU TO KNOW THAT I..."
1152.title: Brought Inside In a Pocket

choices: "Yes, I will be your slave!" (You are rewarded)
"No, you have to stop this! (You are punished)
"I... I don't know about this..."  (She tries to convince you)
11523.content:
Her disposition changes from caring friend to smirking and dominant in a matter of seconds. Tapping her finger harder and harder against the desk, she laughs as you lose your balance and fall backwards on your ass. Faking sympathy she booms down at you in a loud whisper "AWW, ARE YOU OK, CUTIE? WELL YOU'RE PROBABLY GONNA WANT TO TAKE A SEAT ANYWAY. I'VE GOT PLANS TO GO THROUGH WITH YOU." She stands up to her full height and walks across the room, stroking the shrink ray with her index and middle fingers. She's biting her lip in excitement and looks at your miniscule body on her desk with a longing gaze. "THERE'S A LOT OF POWER THAT COMES WITH BEING TALL, YOU SHOULD KNOW THAT." You have an idea where this is going, and don't like it one bit. Well, okay, maybe a bit. "I'VE ALWAYS BEEN SHORT. ALWAYS BEEN LITTLE. IT'S WHAT INSPIRED ME TO MAKE THIS DEVICE. I WANTED OTHER PEOPLE TO FEEL SMALL, TO FEEL WEAK. JUST ONCE I WANTED TO BE THE POWERFUL ONE." She slowly walks back to you, her footfalls shaking you to the core with every step. She must know what she's putting you though, since she puts more pressure on her steps, causing massive earthquakes to your tiny body on her desk. "NOW THAT I KNOW THE MACHINE WORKS, THERE'S NOTHING TO STOP ME FROM BEING THE TALLEST PERSON ON EARTH." Rubbing her body all over, the massive Indian woman lets out a giggle and says "I COULD SIMPLY REVERSE THE RAY'S EFFECTS AND USE IT ON MYSELF... I COULD TURN INTO A GIANT, AND CRUSH THIS MISERABLE TOWN UNDER MY LITTLE TOE..." Bending over you, she lets her hair fall around you, causing a waterfall of black hair to surround you on all sides. Your light is all but taken away as her face fills your entire vision. "OR I COULD BE MORE DISCREET. I COULD JUST SHRINK EVERYBODY IN TOWN, LET YOU ALL LIVE IN MY SHOE. YOU'D BE RIGHT WHERE YOU WANT TO BE, NEXT TO MY STINKY FEET AT THE SIZE OF A FLEA..."

She leans back, letting some strands of her hair knock you forward. You become tangled in a strand of her thick black hair, and are lifted off the desk. You struggle to get free as the warm body of your giant Indian friend rubs against you. She looks down at you, and uses her hand to slowly wrap the hair you're caught in around her index finger. As the finger gets closer and closer, rotating in a deadly swirl, she taunts you and continues her expository rant. "I MEAN, YOU'D BE TAKEN CARE OF. I'D GIVE YOU FOOD TO EAT, A PLACE TO SLEEP. I'D LET YOU SPEND HOURS OF THE DAY WORSHIPING MY FEET AND DOING LITTLE CHORES FOR ME. WELL, MAYBE TO YOU THEY'D BE BIG CHORES." The finger gets closer and closer as you try desperately to escape your silky black restraints. "PAINTING MY FINGERNAILS, CLEANING THE LINT OUT OF MY NAVAL, MAYBE EVEN CLEANING MY EARS. I'D HAVE SLAVES FOR EVERY PART OF MY BODY, BUT SINCE YOU WERE MY FRIEND, AND YOU WERE THE FIRST, I'll LET YOU PICK WHICH PART OF ME YOU WANT TO LIVE FOR... OR DIE FOR." You don't know where this dominant attitued is coming from, but you can't help but feel turned on and terrified all at the same time. Do you really want to spend your life as the slave of your hot Indian Friend? Sure it's basically a fantasy come true, but eventually you'll have to snap out of your delusions and realize that she wants you to abandon your own life to serve as her miniature slave! You finally break out of her hair, and fall down onto her fingernail. She feels you on her hand and lifts the finger up to her massive green eye. It squints to make out your small features as the gigantic face poses a question to you that would change your life forever... "SO WHAT DO YOU SAY, WILL YOU WILLINGLY BE MY SLAVE, OR DO I HAVE TO PUNISH YOU?" You answer up at her...
11523.title: Power Trip

choices: A laughter coming from the other room...
115231.content:
You realize there's no way to reason with her, she's obviously demented. However, if the end of the world is inevitable, and you have an opportunity to be in the favor of the beautiful indian girl ready to rule over it, why wouldn't you jump at the opportunity? At least, that was your way of thinking. Plus, you'd be able to spend time with her lovely feet! You scream up at her that you would gladly be her slave, causing her to laugh and pull the finger you're on towards her lips. Pressing her finger into the lips, you are smothered by wet flesh, and covered with a clear film of lipstick and spit. She pulls you away and laughs saying "I KNEW YOU'D SEE THINGS MY WAY. YOU'RE GOING TO BE MY FAVORITE PET. Using her other fingernail, she strokes your back gently, and you can't help but feel comfortable in the situation your'e in. Maybe this won't be so bad after all. The finger moves as she places it into the palm of her other hand and tilts upwards, sending you sliding down into the warm palm beneath you. Looking down at the platform you're standing on, she says "OKAY, I HAVE YOUR FIRST TASK. UNFORTUNATELY FOR YOU, IT DOESN'T INVOLVE MY TOES." She presses a button on the device, and you instantly shoot up to six inches tall in her hand. From what you can tell, the device has hardwired you into it's system, and now she can control how small you get any time she wants! She walks you over to the door of her apartment, and opens it, bringing you back into the light of the outdoors. In a moment or two she arrives at the door of the apartment next door. "OKAY, LITTLE GUY, IT'S TIME FOR YOU TO GO TO WORK." Lowering you down at the floor, she rises up to her full height and gives you your orders.

"THIS IS THE APARTMENT OF ALICIA RAY. SHE'S BEEN WORKING ON SOMETHING SIMILAR TO THE SHRINK RAY I DEVELOPED, AND I WANT YOU TO SABATAGE WHAT SHE HAS SO FAR. I'M PRETTY SURE SHE KEEPS HER NOTES ON THE PROJECT IN A DESK BY THE DOOR, SO YOU GRAB THE NOTES AND BRING THEM TO ME, AND I'LL REWARD YOU. SAY... GIVE YOU SOME TIME WITH MY FEET?" She wiggles her toes in front of you, and you gaze wide mouthed back up at her face smiling down at you. "THE QUICKER YOU DO IT, THE MORE TIME YOU GET TO SPEND BASKING IN THE SMELL OF MY TOES. BUT THAT'S ONLY IF YOU DO A GOOD JOB. NOW GET TO MOVING. OH, AND IF YOU WANT TO GRAB ANY JEWELRY OR ANYTHING ELSE THAT COULD BE OF USE TO ME... I'D APPRECIATE IT." She puts emphasis on that last part and blows you a kiss. Pressing a button on her phone, she waves to you as your body gets smaller again. At only a half an inch tall, you are definitely able to crawl under the door to Alicia's apartment. Not wasting any time, you effortlessly walk under the opening into the large expanse of her apartment's living room. It's a pretty simple setup, with a couch, an endtable, and a television, with doors leading into her kitchen and bedroom. But to you this is a whole new world to explore. You hear a loud tap against the door and turn around. Behind you, through the crack of the door, the eye of Annie, gazing at you through the thick width of her glasses, whispers to you "CALL ME ON MY CELL PHONE WHEN YOU NEED TO GET LARGER. I DON'T THINK YOU CAN CARRY ALL OF THAT PAPER AT YOUR TEENY TINY SIZE!" She gets up and walks away from the door, leaving you to do her dirty work. You stare in awe at the space around you, and spot a desk in the corner of the room. You figure that's what Annie was talking about, and head towards it. On your run over to the massive desk, you think of just what's happened today. Your best friend, this petite Indian girl, was going to shrink you and everyone in the world down to ants at her feet, and you were getting turned on by the thought of it! In fact, your lust for her feet was probably the only thing keeping you alive at this moment. You think of what would have happened if you had said no to her, and it probably involves her smushing you into the pavement with just a fingertip. When you reach the leg of the chair of her desk, you stop to catch your breath, thinking how you were going to scale this behemoth. All of a sudden from ways away you hear a noise that startles you. Spinning around as fast as you can, you look to the couch and see what made the noise...
115231.title: Your first assignment

1152312.content:
You hear a squeak from across the room, close to what your voice sounds like at this size. God, is somebody else shrunk in here? Has Annie tried this on somebody else? You decide to abandon the desk and investigate the sounds from the couch getting louder and louder with each step. A faint yell that seems to be screaming for help from anybody that could possibly hear it. You get to the leg of the couch and realize the sounds are coming from a hamster cage that was positioned on the cushion. You climb up the leg of the couch, using the fabric as grips to help you to the top. When you finally get to the cage, you are amazed at how big it is to you. it looks to be the size of a real life prison, but you can barely see over the edge, you're too small to climb inside it. You hear a voice cry out from inside "HELLO! IS ANYBODY THERE? PLEASE, HELP ME SHE'S CRAZY!" You have to help whoever's trapped inside, but at your size you'd probably be the size of her foot. Which is when you get the idea to betray the trust of your Indian goddess on the other side of the door. You give her a call on your phone, which SOMEHOW still works, and lay this on her:

"Annie, I'm having trouble getting up to the desk, can you make me a little bit bigger so i can climb from the chair over?" She sighs over the phone and says "OKAY FINE, BUT MAKE IT QUICK. I DON'T KNOW WHAT SHE'S UP TO IN THERE AND I DON'T WANT MY LITTLE SLAVE GETTING MISTAKEN FOR A MOUSE OR SOMETHING. I HAVE A LOT OF PLANS FOR YOU." Within a few minutes you feel your world getting smaller and the fabric of the couch compressing beneath your feet. To help you out, she's made you about six inches tall, which is just enough height to get you into the cage, but still small enough that you can easily squeeze through the bars. The voice of the prisoner inside is normalized now, but still powerful. She's obviously still arger than you, but you make your way inside the cage and are amazed. The girl looks at you from across the cage and her eyes go soft. "OH MY GOD, SHE MADE YOU SMALL TOO! DAMMIT, MY RESEARCH WAS SUPPOSED TO HELP PEOPLE, NOT LET THIS BITCH GO AROUND TURNING PEOPLE INTO DOLLS!" Wait, HER research? It's then that you realize that the figure inside the cage, trapped and trembling, screaming for help was none other than...
1152312.title: Another Prisoner

choices: Free Alicia, she could be useful
Abandon Alicia, she'll only cause trouble
Meena comes through the door with Annie in her palm
11523121.content:
You could hardly believe it, but in the cage was none other than Alicia herself. That made no sense! What was she doing in a hamster cage? Then her words from a few seconds ago came back to you. Someone else must've found out what she was working on and stole her invention. Wait! If she was tiny then that meant her device was complete.

Annie was not going to like that.

"Are you Alicia Ray?" You asked playing dumb.

"Yes I'm Alicia Ray!" She practically shouted, anger coming off her in waves. "That bitch shrunk me with my own invention and stole it along with my research!"

So the research wasn't here. Well there went your chance at reward. Annie was really not going to like hearing this. The whole reason she sent you here was to steal Alicia's notes and sabotage her work. You never would've imagined you'd find Alicia trapped hamster cage, her notes and device stolen.

Now that you got a good look at her she was quite pretty, also she was taller than your six inch frame. Upon closer inspection you only came up to her breasts. Still, you could see the anger burning in those ocean orbs and it made you slightly nervous.

"Who did this to you?" You asked.

Alicia now looked at you in confusion. "You don't know? Didn't she shrink you as well?"

Crap! You asked the wrong question. Oh well you might as well come clean. If the worse did happen you could just call Annie for some height. And if that didn't work you could slide out of the bars, Alicia couldn't.

"Well... Not exactly. You see I'm a friend of Annie's and --"

"Annie? As in, Anamika?" Alicia interrupted. You nodded. "Of course! If you're tiny then that means she shrunk you down." again you nodded. "Damn! That means she also had a shrink ray up and operational."

"Yeah." You said rubbing the back of your head nervously.

"Hold on! If she shrunk you and not my attacker, then what are you doing in my apartment?"

Moment of truth time. You then went on to explain everything to Alicia, minus a few key details like Annie's plans for the future and the fact that you agreed to them. You also filled in the gaps with a few white lies. Who knows? If you played your cards right, Alicia could be an ally in the future.

"I see. She knew what I was working on and wanted you to spy on me. That makes sense. I still don't like it though." Alicia sighed.

"Yeah. So anyway. who shrunk you down and stole your research anyway?"

"It was your friend's bitch of a sister Meena. She was secretly helping me on the project and once it was finished she decided it needed a little field testing. Long story short she used me like a lab rat and stuck me in this hamster cage when she was done!" Alicia spat.

You could hardly believe your ears. Meena did this. Annie's little sister. This was bad. You needed to get out of here and warn Annie as soon as possible. Also there were no certainties Meena wouldn't barge through that door and find you.

"Alright. Thanks for the info, Alicia."

Just as you slipped your body through the bars you heard the blue died haired girl call out to you. "Wait! You have to get me out of here! I help build that device and know how to destroy it!"

That was a good point she made. But this brought up another problem. Annie didn't know about your private meeting and bringing Alicia along would only complicate things. Who know how Annie will react? Then again, Alicia's device needed to be destroyed. Annie was the only one who had the right to hold this kind of power.

Wow you were turning into a zealot.

Did you risk letting Alicia out though?
11523121.title: Alicia!

choices: Swipes you into a glass jar!
Lifts a hand up to swat you!
115232.content:
You realize that the consequences are too much. She would have no control over what she would do to people, no restraint.
