"SHIT, I ALMOST FORGOT. THIS IS YOUR FIRST DAY UNDER MY SPELL... YOUR BODY WILL HAVE TO TAKE A FEW DAYS TO GET USED TO THE FEELING OF BEING WITHOUT MY PRETTY FEET... BUT FOR THE FIRST FEW NIGHTS, I'LL GIVE YOU SOMETHING TO REMEMBER ME BY." She grabs something from her top drawer and waves it in front of your tiny face. She's pulled out... toenail clippers? She smiles and pulls up a stool, looking down at you as she lifts her leg up to trim her beautiful toenails. "YOU'RE SO PATHETIC, YOU KNOW THAT? TOTALLY DEPENDENT ON ME, LIKE A LITTLE PARASITE. I KNOW YOU REMEMBER YOUR LIFE BEFORE YOU WERE NOTHING BUT A SLAVE TO MY PRETTY FEET, AND OCCASIONALLY YOU'LL FEEL LIKE YOU WANT TO GO BACK TO THE LIFE OF A HUMAN." With a loud snap, you hear the clippers go to work. She laughs at your obviously needy expression and says "BUT THAT WILL SHOW UP LESS AND LESS THE MORE TIME YOU SPEND WITH ME, LITTLE BUG. YOU'RE NOT A PERSON ANYMORE. YOU'RE NOT A HUMAN ANYMORE. YOU'RE NOT EVEN WORTHY OF HAVING A NAME ANYMORE. FROM NOW ON, YOU'RE NOTHING BUT MY PROPERTY." She puts the clippers down and bends down to the floor, picking up the biggest toenail clipping she can find and bends it between her powerful fingers. She smirks down at you and says "I HAVE TO TEND TO MY OTHER SLAVES, BUT THIS SHOULD KEEP YOU ALIVE UNTIL MORNING. SLEEP TIGHT." She places the big toenail in the pouch with you and closes the lid slowly, letting the darkness creep into your sight. When you hear her powerful footsteps start to walk away, you run to the discarded toenail and immediately start licking it. It is just about as long as you are tall, and you find your needs filled when you taste her sweat collected underneath it. You smell her foot all around you as you hug the hard skin, and you realize you're starting to get aroused by the feeling of being helpless at her feet. The shock of your discovery makes you step back a bit, and you think to yourself that she's won. You're never going to be back to normal, just a slave forever worshipping her smelly feet. You sit indian style and stare at the huge toenail, taking in it's sweet scent. You start to cry as you understand there's no going back now. And you lay down, exhausted and fall to sleep.

Your eyes open and you are no longer in the jewelry box. You are in bed next to Sam. You breathe heavily not understanding why you've returned to your normal size, but you don't argue with a good thing. You brush her pretty red hair out of her face and give her a kiss on the forehead. She smiles with her eyes still closed and whispers your name. "Where are you? I lost you this afternoon, I... I need you back." You embrace her, happy that you're back among the world of the living with the girl of your dreams, and say "I'm here now. I don't know how, but i'm just happy to be near you again. I love you, Sam." She opens her eyes and says "I'm going to find you. And bring you back to me. Where are you?" You realize that this is more than a regular dream. Sam is actually communicating with you telepathically! You really need to read up more on this witch stuff! You explain "I fell on your mother's foot today. I'm with her, she's... turned me into one of her slaves." Sam's eyes go wide and she says "No... No she can't... She'll pay for this. Where are you?" And before you can answer, Sam disappears and light floods your eyes, blinding you temporarily. You look up and see a huge, grinning face staring down at you. "WELL WELL, LOOKS LIKE SOMEONE GOT A LITTLE COMFY WITH MY STINKY TOENAIL, DIDN'T THEY!" You look in front of you and you had involuntarily grabbed her toenail and are spooning with it. You are so embarrassed that not only Kendra found you like this, but you were doing it in the first place.

Her huge hand reaches in and grabs you between two fingers. She lifts you up to her eye and says "I'VE GOT THE DAY OFF TODAY, SO YOU'RE IN FOR A TREAT. IT'S TIME FOR YOUR FIRST TASK." Her feet boom beneath you as she walks you into her kitchen and sits down to a bowl of cereal and a banana. She places you gently on her kitchen table and picks up her spoon to start eating. She gets halfway through the bowl, letting you wander around a bit on her table before she picks up the banana and peels it. She cuts out a sliver of the fruit under her index fingernail and scrapes it against the table. She points to it and says "EAT UP.". You walk over towards the yellow paste in front of you and dig your hands in to eat it. She laughs at your efforts to eat the little bit of food and says "YOU ARE SO CUTE, YOU'D BETTER NOT SUCK AT THIS, I DON'T WANT TO HAVE TO EAT YOU JUST YET." You suddenly lose your appetite and just stare up at the redheaded beauty that's just threatened to swallow you like a piece of candy. Even this early in the morning, without her makeup, her hair a mess and her nails unpolished, she is still a beautiful woman. Evil, yes, but undoubtedly gorgeous. It just makes you think more and more about where Sam got her looks from. Thinking about Sam is pretty much what's keeping your mind intact while you do unspeakable things for her mother. You were so lost in thought that you didn't notice Kendra raise her hand above you and with a smirk, her eyes began to glow. You felt the sensation again of electricity running through your body and began to panic at the thought of changing size again. Kendras eyes narrowed as she talked down to you saying "IT'S TIME FOR YOUR FIRST JOB, LITTLE SLAVE... AND IT REQUIRES YOU TO GET JUST A LITTLE BIT..."
123121212.title: Asleep in the Jewelry Box

choices: Heather is waiting at the door.
12312122.content:
You think about the horrors that await you being the gigantic witch's mindless slave. The days, the years you will spend worshipping her gigantic toes, reduced to nothing but a worthless piece of filth at her feet. And it's all going to come to an end once the droplet of her toe sweat hits your lips. You can't bear to watch as it happens, and you close your eyes, and involuntarily hold your hands up to brace yourself for the oncoming storm of salt water. Wait a second... you can look away. You can hold your arms up! You can move on your own again! Instinctively you don't ask how, you just cover your mouth and nose, waiting for the droplet to crash over your tiny body. But after a few seconds it doesn't happen. You are still dry! You look up and to your shock, the water is released from it's perch of her huge fingertip, but it's not moving, almost as if it's suspended in the air! You also notice that Samantha's mother isn't talking to you any more. or even moving! She's stuck in that position, as if time itself is standing still! And that's when you hear an angel speak down to you...

"IT'S OKAY. I'VE GOT YOU!"

You look behind you and reaching out for you is the shining image of Sam! She's come to rescue you! Her huge thumb and forefinger pluck you from the palm of her mother and she brings you up to her face, giving you a quick but forceful kiss, which covers your whole body. She is crying in relief as she says "LET'S GET YOU OUT OF HERE. I CAN ONLY HOLD HER LIKE THAT FOR A LITTLE WHILE LONGER!" The entire world shifts around you as the huge hand brings you up to Sam's ear and you instinctively jump off and into it. Since you've shrunk again, her ear has become a huge cavern with lots of room for you to walk around. She places her hair back over the opening, hiding you from the outside world yet again, and starts running out of her mother's house. You are thrown around a bit, but using the tiny hairs in her ear, you keep yourself from getting thrown out or at least against her huge mesh of silky red hair. You feel yourself come to a rest as you hear around you that Sam has made it to her car, has hit the gas and is now speeding away from your former captor's home. "OKAY... WE MADE IT. CAN YOU SAY SOMETHING? I WANT TO MAKE SURE I CAN HEAR YOU LIKE THIS." You regain your balance, shaking off what little dirt gathered on you from the tumble and say "Hello! Can you hear me, Sam!" A laugh rumbles around you like the rest of the sounds coming from her mouth, and you hear her say "YES, I CAN HEAR YOU LITTLE GUY. I'M SORRY, I'M SO SORRY THAT MY MOTHER TOOK YOU... I CAN'T IMAGINE WHAT SHE WAS GOING TO DO TO YOU." You tell her about her plan to turn you into her obedient toe slave, and how you were just a few seconds away from losing your free will completely. She starts tearing up a bit, and you hear her try to calmly apologize. "I... I CAN'T EVEN BEGIN TO SAY HOW SORRY I AM, IT'S MY FAULT YOU'RE IN THIS MESS TO BEGIN WITH. I'VE HEARD HER TALK ABOUT HOW SHE HAS MEN UNDER HER POWER BUT... I THOUGHT SHE WAS JOKING! I HAD NO IDEA SHE COULD BE THAT CRUEL... THAT HEARTLESS!" You gently stroke the side of her ear (not really knowing what else to do) and say "Look, I'm safe now, and you saved me, i can't thank you enough for it. I love you Sam, and if there's one good thing that came out of this, I got to realize that!" You were pretty amazed at how natural the words flew out of you, but you meant every one. If anything, this situation allowed you to get closer to her than you ever thought possible, and it's all thanks to that spell she cast over you. It didn't even bother you that you were nearly a half an inch tall, taking a ride in her ear. You just wanted to be with her.

Sam is obviously choked up by your confession and manages to say out loud through her spurts of happiness "I... I LOVE YOU TOO, LITTLE MAN! MY PERFECT, CUTE LITTLE MAN! I CAN'T WAIT UNTIL WE STOP SO I CAN SHOW YOU JUST HOW MUCH!!" You lie back in her ear, feeling tingly all over from the exchange of feelings that just took place. You walk to the edge of her ear and manage to grab a small thin strand of her long red hair. Holding it close, you rub your face all over it, taking in it's warm, silky texture and the smell of her floral shampoo. You are thrown back as a huge giggle rattles throughout your entire area and you hear Sam say "HEE HEE, STOP THAT! THAT TICKLES, LITTLE GUY! LET'S JUST FOCUS ON WHERE WE'RE GOING, THEN WE CAN HAVE A MORE... INTIMATE MOMENT TOGETHER." You angrily throw the hair aside and ask "Okay, so... where exactly ARE we going? Isn't your mother going to look for us at your place?" Very matter of factly, Sam replies "WELL OF COURSE SHE IS, THAT'S WHY WE'RE NOT GOING THERE. MY FRIEND HEATHER'S HOUSE IS A FEW BLOCKS AWAY. SHE'LL NEVER FIND US THERE." You had only met Heather once or twice, but she seemed alright. She was a big goth chick with long black hair, always dressed in black with skulls and crap, but seemed pretty harmless. You hoped she was cool with small things, that's all you were asking for. Just as you though that, the car screeched to a halt, and Sam exited the car, lifting a finger up to her ear for you to make your exit with. You jump onto the soft flesh of her finger, hugging it around as much as you can, which gets a cute laugh from Sam. She places you in the palm of her hand, which she brings up to her lips for another full body kiss. This time you try and grab at the flesh yourself, pulling a little bit of it into your tiny lips as well. In this moment, you were pretty happy. Sam curls her fingers up as she gets closer to the house and with her free hand, knocks on the door to Heather's place. The door creaks open and...
12312122.title: Saved By Samantha

123121221.content:
You hear the door open from outside Sam's fingers and a girl answers the door. The voice is deeper than you remember, but you attribute that to how huge she is compared to you now. "HEY BABE, COME ON IN!" Heather was always pretty cheerful and liked you in the few times you'd seen each other, so you were happy Sam didn't bring you to the house of some stranger or god forbid an enemy. Sam made particular care not to turn you around too much in her hand, you could tell that with every motion she made, she was trying not to harm your tiny frame. The two giant girls sat down, and you heard Heather say above you "ALRIGHT SO... WHAT WAS SO IMPORTANT THAT YOU COULDN'T TELL ME OVER THE PHONE?" Sam very quietly says "OKAY... DO YOU REMEMBER WHEN I TOLD YOU THAT MY MOM TAUGHT ME SOME MAGIC?" Heather scoffs and says "YEAH, BUT I STILL HAVEN'T SEEN ANY PROOF OF THAT, WITCHY GIRL." The hand you're resting in turns up and the fingers slowly open, flooding light into your tiny eyes. When you readjust to the brightness, you can see Heather's face more clearly now. She is wearing large, black rimmed glasses, with her hair split into pigtails. Her large, chubby face is staring down at you, with her bright blue eyes wide and unblinking. Her mouth, with a lip ring sticking out of the top of her bottom lip, is gaped wide open in shock. She leans in closer to your tiny body on her friend's palm, and darts her eyes up to make contact with Sam's, looking for answers. Sam laughs and says "WELL... NOW YOU HAVE PROOF."

Heather turns her attention back to you, giving a small swallow, before reaching out with a pudgy finger to test if you are actually real. Before her finger makes contact, you grab out with both hands and make a shaking motion with both arms. Heather squeals in surprise before saying to Sam "HE'S REAL... HE'S REALLY REAL... AND HE'S SO TINY... WAIT A MINUTE! ISN'T THIS YOUR FRIEND? THE GUY FROM LAST WEEK'S PARTY?" Sam says "YEAH, THAT"S HIM. WELL, HE'S MORE LIKE MY LITTLE BOYFRIEND NOW, NOT JUST A FRIEND". Heather smiles and pushes her hair back a bit before saying "HE'S SO CUTE LIKE THIS... CAN... CAN I HOLD HIM?" Sam nods in agreement and tells Heather to open her hand palm up for you to climb into. Sam moves her hand to touch with Heather's, and you effortlessly climb over the gap onto the soft, warm hand of the curvy goth girl. You feel safe in the big girl's hand as Sam tells the story of how you were shrunk in her apartment, only to be taken away by her crazy mother. Throughout the whole story Heather strokes you with her index finger like a small pet in her hand. You don't mind, the motion is actually very soothing. "WOW, I JUST CAN'T BELIEVE I'M HOLDING A REAL LIFE PERSON IN THE PALM OF MY HAND... IT'S SO COOL!" Sam laughs and says "YOU THINK THAT'S COOL, TRY SHOVING THE LITTLE GUY IN YOUR PANTIES. IT'S SO WEIRD." Heather laughs loudly above you and says jokingly to you "OOH, THAT SOUNDS LIKE FUN... YOU BETTER WATCH OUT LITTLE GUY, I MIGHT WANT TO TAKE YOU FOR MYSELF." The girls continue to talk for a while, before Heather hands you back to Sam and says "SO... YOU CAN SHRINK PEOPLE. THAT'S SO AMAZING! CAN YOU DO IT TO ANYONE?" Sam thinks for a second and says "I THINK SO. I HAVEN'T TRIED IT ON ANYTHING THAT WASN'T WILLING TO GET TINY..." She takes a second to look down at you and stick her tongue out, teasing you a bit. You would feel embarassed, if it weren't for how happy and comfortable you were sitting in Samantha's palm. "... BUT I'M PRETTY SURE IF I AMMENDED THE SPELL IT COULD WORK ON ANYBODY... WHY?" Heather looks down a bit embarrassed and says "THE WAY HE LOOKS IN YOUR HAND IT'S... IT'S JUST SO INCREDIBLE... A REAL HUMAN PERSON BEING SO TINY...AND I THINK IT WOULD BE A LOT OF FUN IF YOU COULD USE YOUR POWERS TO SHRINK...
123121221.title: Chubby Goth Friend

1231212212.content:
Sam has the same reaction as you, but your voice is too tiny to be heard accompanying her first word. "YOU?!" Heather looks off to the side and says "Y...YEAH... ME." Samantha places you gently down on the table in front of the two girls and looks back up at Heather. She points down at your tiny body and says "YOU WANT TO BE SHRUNK... LIKE HE IS? ALL TEENY TINY LIKE THAT?" Heather quickly responds back "YES... I MEAN NO... I MEAN... I... I DON'T KNOW. I THOUGHT IT MIGHT BE KIND OF FUN TO BE SO... SMALL AND POWERLESS. I MEAN I LIKE HANDLING YOUR LITTLE FRIEND THERE, BUT WHEN I WAS YOUNGER I ALWAYS USED TO PRETEND TO BE A FAIRY OR A DOLL. TO BE SHRUNK DOWN TO THAT SIZE AND PLAYED WITH, AND OVER THE YEARS IT'S SORT OF DEVELOPED INTO A STRANGE TYPE OF FETISH, YOU KNOW?" It's almost as if the giant girl is speaking for you. Sam shrunk you down for her own needs and wishes, but you're still not sure if she ever figured out that you had the same fetish as her friend sitting right next to her. You totally see where Heather is coming from, and want to speak up, but Sam just shakes her head and says "N... NO, NOT REALLY. IT JUST SEEMS KIND OF ODD FOR ME. I MEAN, I DIDN'T MAKE HIM TINY BECAUSE OF SOME KINKY DESIRE HE HAD TO BE SMALL..." So she thinks... "I DID IT BECAUSE I WANTED TO KEEP HIM A SECRET AND THIS JUST HAPPENED. I MEAN... IT JUST SEEMS LIKE IT WOULD BE TOO DANGEROUS IF I DID IT TO YOU, WHO KNOWS WHAT'LL HAPPEN WHEN YOU'RE IN THIS MINDSET." Heather just sighs and says "I'VE NEVER ADMITTED THAT TO ANYONE, I JUST... KIND OF TRUSTED YOU THE MOST OUT OF ALL MY FRIENDS, ESPECIALLY IN THIS SITUATION. BUT YOU'RE RIGHT. IT... IT WAS STUPID OF ME TO SAY ANYTHING. SORRY IF THAT GOT A LITTLE TOO WEIRD FOR YOU."

Samantha looks down at you, then her eyes travel over towards her friend, who's turning a bit red with embarrassment. She smirks and says "SO... JUST SO I'VE GOT THIS RIGHT..." Sam slowly brings the book out onto her lap and strokes the cover seductively. Heather looks up at Sam's eyes and her expression changes from humiliation to that of absolute excitement. Sam puts a finger to her chin and says coyly "LET'S JUST SAY HYPOTHETICALLY, I THOUGHT YOU MIGHT LOOK CUTER IF YOU WERE JUST A BIT SHORTER... AND HYPOTHETICALLY I AGREED TO DO THIS FOR YOU, SINCE I'M SUCH A GOOD FRIEND..." Sammy opens the book and thumbs through the pages until she comes across the passage that made you shrink in the first place. She licks her lips and taps on the book's open page, saying "AND LET'S JUST SAY I READ THIS PASSAGE THAT WOULD MAKE YOU WHATEVER SIZE YOUR PRETTY LITTLE HEART DESIRES..." You can actually feel Heather shaking with excitement as Sam begins to read in that familiar language. Her eyes roll back into her head and when then come back into focus, they are glowing bright red just like before. Only this time she's a giantess to you already. You can actually feel her body shining with power, her long, curly hair floating and bouncing slightly almost as if there's a fan running through them. She looks absolutely stunning. Her attention goes to Heather, who's intrigued but a little scared by her friend's quick transformation. Sam puts her hand behind Heather's neck, bringing her in close and says "AND I KISSED YOU, EVER SO GENTLY JUST LIKE THIS..." Her lips part and connect with Heather's forming a soft, but passionate kiss. Heather's eyes go wide as she feels electricity flowing through her body and she breaks the kiss, breathing heavily. Sam reverts back to her normal eye color and her hair plops back against her shoulders as she smiles, admiring the process of her friend turning into a fraction of her former size. Heather looks up at Samantha and her look of shock turns into one of pure joy. She feels her body sink further and further into the couch cushion and squeals with excitement as her now gigantic friend leans over her. Sam finishes her long, drawn out spell by looming over her miniaturized friend, who's still getting smaller by the minute, and whispers "JUST HOW SMALL DID YOU WANT TO GET?" The goth girl is still much bigger than you, but you know that it's not that big of an accomplishment. Plus, she's still shrinking pretty fast. It was all up to her dirty little mind anyway just how tiny Sam's magic would make her. Heather stares up at the giant redhead in awed reverance and manages to squeak out "I... I WANTED TO BE THE SIZE OF...
1231212212.title: Filling Heather's Desires

choices: You see Sam's eyes glow bright red!
Sam shrinks down to your size!
123121222.content:
The door flies open, but to your surprise there's nobody home. The lights are all lit in the house, but there's no car in the driveway, no sounds from upstairs. The house appears to be deserted. "STRANGE, HEATHER SAID SHE'D BE HERE BY NOW. GUESS SHE'S STILL OUT." She looks down at you and rubs your tiny body in her hand with her thumb, saying "MAY AS WELL GET COMFORTABLE UNTIL SHE GETS HERE." Sam makes her way into Heather's living room and sets you down on the couch beside her. She leans back and looks at you with worry in her eye saying "ARE YOU HURT?" You walk over to her hand, which is lying flat down on the seat cushion and rub your body up next to it for comfort. You say "I... I think so. I was so scared i'd never see you again." Sam looks down at you and says "If mother had her way, not only would you never have seen me again. You never would have seen daylight again. She was about to make you one of her slaves." You breath a sigh of relief and say "Yeah... thank you. Thanks for getting there when you did. Is there any way you can change me back, i think i've had enough of my fantasy for one day." Sam leans down over you and says "AS SOON AS I CAN, I WILL. BUT MOTHER HAS A WAY OF TRACING SIGNALS OF MY POWER. IF I WERE TO MAKE YOU NORMAL AGAIN, SHE'D KNOW EXACTLY WHERE WE WERE." You sigh in defeat, but stand up and say up to her "Then... can you pick me up again? I can't explain it, i just feel a lot safer when i'm in your hand." She smiles and flips her palm over so it's facing up, allowing you to climb up into the middle of it. You're just about 2 inches tall sitting in the beautiful wiccan's hand and you've never felt better. "COZY?" You hear her say and you respond "Almost. Do me a favor and bring me up to your lips?" She giggles and says "I THINK I KNOW WHERE THIS IS GOING." She lifts her palm up to her face, holding it level with her chin as she perches her lips and slightly leans down. You reach up with both hands and grab her gigantic lips, burying your face in it. A small amount of gloss and saliva runs through your hair as you embrace the mouth of your giant girlfriend, until she lets go and lets a smile shine from ear to ear. "I love you, giant girl.", you shout up to her. "I LOVE YOU, LITTLE MAN." She whispers back. And then, just when you feel that nothing can stop this perfect moment, you hear a booming, familiar voice all around you say "AWW... HOW SWEET."

Sam gasps in fear and holds a hand up to her mouth, darting her eyes around to see where her mother is. The voice returns saying "DON'T BOTHER LOOKING FOR ME. I'M NOT ANYWHERE NEAR YOU. YOU'VE LEARNED WELL, YOU LITTLE TRAITOR. I'M ACTUALLY QUITE IMPRESSED. I JUST WANTED YOU TO KNOW THAT EVEN THOUGH I CAN'T SENSE EXACTLY WHERE YOU ARE, MY POWERS ARE STILL ALIVE AND WELL IN ANYONE I'VE COME INTO CONTACT WITH. THEY'RE JUST NOT AS STRONG AS I'D LIKE THEM TO BE." Sam holds her open hand over you, shielding you as best she can from unknown dangers. She whispers down to you "SHE'S TELLING THE TRUTH. IF SHE HAD OUR LOCATION, SHE COULD HAVE TRANSPORTED US BACK TO HER. SHE STILL DOESN'T KNOW WHERE WE ARE." When you started to feel relieved from that last statement, the wicked voice returns and says "JUST BECAUSE I'M NOT AS POWERFUL FROM FAR AWAY DOESN'T MEAN I CAN'T DO SOMETHING TO REMIND YOU WHO'S IN CHARGE..." And with that, you feel a sharp pain in your stomach and collapse, clutching your sides. You roll around in Sam's palm, hoping for some sort of relief as the booming voice chuckles behind you. Sam is on the verge of tears as she shouts up "STOP IT! STOP IT MOTHER, YOU DON'T CONTROL MY LIFE ANYMORE! HE'S MINE TO BE WITH, AND YOU CAN'T TAKE THAT AWAY FROM ME, YOU FRIGID BITCH!" Her mother's voice becomes much colder and more direct as she responds, "YOU SNOT NOSED LITTLE BRAT! YOU THINK YOU CAN LIE TO ME AND TAKE WHAT'S MINE? LITTLE GIRL, YOU NEED TO BE PUNISHED." Sam starts crying as she looks down at you writhing in pain and says "NO! MOTHER, PLEASE! LET HIM GO!" The voice of the witch is cold and calculated as she says "TRUST ME, CHILD. IT'S FOR YOUR OWN GOOD." All of a sudden, a bright light shoots around Sam's body as well, and she sits terrified, waiting for the next part of her mother's plan to come to fruition...
123121222.title: Found already?

choices: You were transported to a different place.
1231212223.content:
You curled into a ball, waiting for the worst when suddenly, Sam’s palm got smaller. No, you were growing. You looked at each other in confusion, not knowing why this is happening. When you were about a foot tall, Sam placed you on the ground and watched you growing even further. You had liked being small next to Sam, but her mother was terrifying. So growing again felt kinda relieving. At least you would not have to be like a helpless insect on her mother’s fingertip again. But still the question why you were growing remained. Maybe her mother was lifting Sam’s spell. Maybe she even failed at what she was trying to do. When you finally regained your original height you stopped growing.

You looked at Sam who, still confused, looked back at you. After a while you eventually managed to ask: „W-what happened?“ She shook her head. „I don’t know. She was about to punish us and now … she grew you back. That doesn’t make any sense. That’s not like her at all.“

Suddenly, a loud laughter started to come from all around you. You looked at the window and noticed a red light coming from outside. „…maybe we should check that out?“, you asked hesitantly. She looked at you, then nodded. As you walked through the entrance, you looked around and got more and more confused. The streets were empty and all the lights of the houses were out. Also, the moon was glowing in a strange, red light. Then you two froze in shock. At the end of the road, about 500 feet away, Sam’s mother was standing. But she somehow managed to grow to giant proportions. She was about 100 feet tall and with her dark robe looked like an ominous shadow. Her red hair was flowing in the wind, her lips formed a malicious smile and you also did not miss to notice that her naked feet were visible beneath the robe. „Quick!“, Sam shouted, grabbed you and pulled you back in the car. She started the engine and drove away, while you were watching her mother who for some reason did not try to chase after you. Instead, it seemed like her lips were forming words.

It was when you reached the highway that the red light gained intensity and the eyes of Sam’s mother began to glow red. „Oh shit…“, you whispered as she suddenly started to grow. Slowly at first but speeding up fast. You didn’t come far when she was already gaining several hundred feet per second. As terrified as you were you still realized why she was not chasing you. Just by growing the distance between you and her was getting shorter at an alarming rate. She simply did not need to chase you. „Damn, why can’t this go any faster?“ Sam tried gaining more speed, but it was no use. At least there were no other cars. Well, that’s strange. Shouldn’t there be people trying to get away from Sam’s mother? Instead, you saw no-one. But there was no time to talk about that. Looking behind you you saw her big toe which by now was the size of a mountain to you, was directly behind you. Part of it’s tip was already above you and looking to the sides you could not see where it ended. Then Sam grabbed your arm. „There is no other way!“, she screamed and started to chant, her eyes already glowing red. At first you wanted to tell her to keep her eyes on the road, then you started to feel dizzy and suddenly the world around you seemed to fade away only to reform itself in a different shape again.

You almost fell, but Sam caught you. You realized how cold it was and looking around you found yourself in a snowfield. Above you, the stars were shining and the moon had returned to it’s usual sight. „What…“, you started but she interrupted you. „Whenever I got time to study the books on my own, I tried to find something to help me escape my mother’s influence. That was a transportation spell. I knew it would come in handy some time. It was the first time I used it. I still can’t believe it worked. I got us somewhere north I guess. Whatever she was doing, we now have a bit of space between her and us.“ You sigh in relieve. Her mother was scary but knowing Sam knew ways to get away from her made you feel save. You opened your mouth to say at least something when suddenly an echoing voice thundered from all around you like it belonged to an all-powerful goddess. „YOU REALLY THOUGHT YOU COULD ESCAPE FROM ME?“

Your jaws dropped as you looked to the sky. The whole horizon was filled with an incredibly large green eye. That was not scary or terrifying, that was simply overwhelming. Her mother must be bigger than the entire planet. You felt like you were about to collapse or at least fall to your knees, but instead you clung to Sam, who did the same to you. Then, the stars disappeared, no, they were blocked by a continent-sized finger. „NOW YOU MICROBES GET WHAT YOU DESERVE!“ The voice shook you very existence. You starred helpless at the gigantic shadow that was the tip of her index finger. All of a sudden, Sam whispered. „Now I get it.“ She let go of you and looked to the sky, her eyes starting to glow red. „THIS IS NOT REAL!“ Her voice which was now extremely loud echoed across the land when suddenly, the world around you vanished.

The next thing you remembered was you, lying in the palm of Sam’s hand. You looked around. It seemed you were back in Heather’s house. „We did it. It was just an illusion.“, your friend whispered. You looked her in the eyes but before one of you were able to do anything, her mother’s voice echoed through the room again. „YOU BROKE FREE, BUT TOO LATE! WHILE YOU WERE BUSY BEING TRAPPED IN THAT ILLUSION, I WAS ABLE TO FIND YOU! NOW YOUR REAL PUNISHMENT IS ABOUT TO BEGIN!“ Damn, couldn’t she give you at least a short break or something? You looked back at your friend. Both of you prepared for whatever was about to happen next.

15.content:
A few more girls i thought up to start off with....

ELIZABETH BLACK - 5'7, Curvy with long brown hair. Not too fat, but definately not thin, you've always had a crush on her but never acted on it. Liz was always cute, but had an abnoxiously controlling boyfriend. They broke up earlier this year and you haven't seen him since. You'd always joked that she'd had enough and finally killed him. But that can't be true... right?

DANIELLE MAPLE - 6'5 with wavy brown hair. Tall, lanky, extremely geeky. Big D and D fan, was in the marching band, and has an action figure collection. Biggest dork you've ever met. Into role playing and fantasy, has even wrote a few books with you as a character. Her character in the book is an amazon witch. You can see where this is going.

LISA SALERNO - Your ex girlfriend. (For the sake of her inclusion, ignore the first chapter's setup) 5'10 with thin black hair, pale skin, and huge breasts. Extremely clingy, obsessive and emotional, you finally couldn't handle all of the problems. You two broke up on... less than gracious terms and she swore she would have you back someday. It's also worth noting that you always found she hates bugs... but had no problem crushing them.

Who do you start off with?
15.title: Some More Girls

choices: Just a little shorter for now.
Why don't you decide for me.
151.content:
Liz greets you at the door with a hug and walks you inside. You two start up small talk and sip on some beers, laughing it up. You and Liz had known each other for quite some time, she was just a freshman when she trained at your job a year ago, and you two have become pretty close since then. You always thought she was really cute, with a great smile and beautiful curves all over her body, it's a shame that for as long as you'd known her she was with that douchebag Aaron. He always treated her like crap, and you were happy to find out that they had broken up a few weeks ago. Hey, maybe there could be something between you two after all? As the drinking continues, you two keep talking and finally you ask her, because you're dying to know... "Hey Liz, I don't think I ever asked you... whatever happened to Aaron? I haven't seen him since you guys stopped seeing each other." Liz starts laughing really hard, covering up her mouth to stifle the loud sounds. "Oh my god, i never told you did I?" She puts her drinks down and takes your hand "Come with me, I have something i need to show you..." Expecting to find Aaron's corpse stuffed like a teddy bear in her room, you follow her in. You'd constantly joked with her that since he's gone missing that Liz had killed him and buried the body. Admittedly, you wouldn't think anything less of Liz for it, he would constantly make her feel worthless and on a few times had actually struck her. But she seemed so happy with him gone, could you really blame her?

She tells you to sit on her bed and she goes into the closet, pulling out a small box with a small leather bag on the top of it. She takes the bag off and holds it in her palm, presenting it to you. "My cousin knows a few people in the gypsy circle, and i told her about my "problems" with Aaron. She called in a few favors and got me a bag of this stuff. She didn't exactly say what it did but she said to just sprinkle some of it onto Aaron and my issues would him would just fade away. And... well, they did." You sit there shocked to hear this. Gypsy magic? Is it real? She must be joking with you, but you decide to go along with it anyway. "So Aaron just... disappeared? Like, Poof, gone?" Liz laughs and taps the box with her hand saying "No, not quite see... the dust in the bag didn't exactly make him go away it just... made him smaller." You shake your head and say "I'm sorry, did you say... smaller?" She goes "Yep... like a mouse. Like a worthless little pest. Just like he's always been. And now..." She lifts the lid off of the box and reaches her hand in, feeling around until you see her eyes light up as she removes the hand in a fist, opening it slowly to reveal the miniature form of Aaron cowering in her palm. "He's not going to hurt me anymore." You stare in wonder at the tiny man in the hand of your cute friend. Her pudgy fingers closing in on him one by one, as if to toy around with him a bit, she brings the palm up to her face, and blows her warm breath at him saying "ARE YOU, AARON?" The small boy shakes his head furiously and drops to his knees, causing Liz to giggle with glee. "Good boy. Back to the box with you." She lowers his body back into the box and puts the lid on top, sealing him back into his shoebox prison. She turns to see the look of shock on your face and cups your chin in her fingers saying "Don't worry, I have a way to change him back, i just don't want to yet. I have another bag that will reverse the process, it'll be like he was never here. But I have to say, it's been very... interesting having him shrunk. It's a real rush to have people that much smaller than me." You are fascinated by the possibility of your friend being able to shrink people, and you may or may not have had feelings towards a giantess fetish in the past, so this is absolutely amazing to you. The look in her eyes gets deeper as she expresses to you "Aaron's always been bigger than me, taller, but now i have a chance to play with him in my hands, pick him up like a little toy it's... it's intoxicating. I feel so powerful holding him in my hands I... I wish I could feel like that all the time, I wish everybody who's been mean to me could be shrunk to tiny size for me to play with!"

The booze in your system gives you a little bit of extra courage, and you decide to go for it. You can't hold back anymore and lean in, grabbing a quick kiss from Liz. Half of you was expecting her to throw you off of her in surprise, but to your shock, she grabbed the back of your head and kissed you back. Thank god you didn't blow this! Your lips seperate as Liz says "Wow... um... that came out of nowhere..." You confess to her that you've always had feelings for her and hearing her talk about her feelings with shrunken men had awoken something inside you. You honestly don't remember how it started, but you've always been fascinated by the concept of giant women. And seeing her handle Aaron like that was just breathtaking, you wanted to see what it would be like from his perspective, helpless and tiny in the palm of her hand. She laughs and gives you another kiss, whispering into your ear "You like the idea of me as a giantess, huh?" And before you have time to respond, she whips out the bag of dust, and says "I've never done this to anybody else, anybody that I... liked... but i want to make sure that it's what you want... the amount you shrink is dependent on how much of the dust i use on you... so how small do you want to be?" You look at the box down by Liz's feet and realize that Aaron's nightmare is pretty much your dream come true. Liz is looking to make you as small as you want to be, with pretty much no repercussions! You wonder if you should start off only a few inches shorter than her, get a feel for being the small one in the room. Your fantasy has been to be pretty small, pretty much Aaron's size or a little bit smaller. Maybe diving in headfirst isn't a bad idea. But the gleam in Liz's eyes is very comforting. You've known her for so long and you two have a good relationship, she would't want to hurt you in your shrunken state. Since this is your first time experiencing this together, maybe you should let her decide just how small you're going to be. After all, if this works out, you two could have a long, healthy relationship to explore each other at different sizes for as long as you want! Your heart is racing and your primal urges take hold. You take a deep breath and say...
151.title: Liz Likes them Small

152.content:
You knock on Danielle's door, and almost instantly she yanks it open as if she had been waiting beside it ever since she sent that text. You're greeted by having your face shoved into the small breasts of her beanpole body as she wraps her spindly arms around you, pulling you in for a tight hug. Instinctively you return it, your hands running over her velvet clothing. Somehow you guess this isn't a casual get together.

She releases you, allowing you to look up at her face, incredibly pale from years of only going outside when it was absolutely necessary. Her light blue eyes are positively beaming, and her thin mouth is spread in a larger smile than you've ever seen on her. You take a step back to look her over and see that she's wearing a black robe with flowing sleeves that's hemmed just below her knees and had a very generous neckline. She's let her hair down, allowing it to wave in the breeze. To complete the look she's wearing black high-heeled shoes, bumping her up to nearly a foot and a half taller than you.

She stands aside, allowing you to enter her dimly lit room. The walls are lined with her action figure collection, which includes characters from various animes, cartoons comics and tabletop gaming miniatures, as well as her extensive collection of books, half of which are related to gaming. There's a table set up by her bed with polyhedral dice scattered on its surface on top of a plastic mat with a grid drawn on it. A single red leather grimoire lies open on the table amidst the dice, though you can't see what it's open to, and there are two chairs set up.

"I'm so glad you came over so quickly!" she says in her squeaky voice. "As soon as it happened I just had to tell you, I know you'll be super excited." She sits down and gestures for you to do the same. When you've taken your seat she grabs you by the wrist and pulls it toward her. "Brace yourself. You braced?" You nod. "Okay, here goes: I can do magic, just like my character."

You scoff. "Dani, we've been over this. Magic isn't real, no one can do it, it's just a fun little element in our games. I mean it would be really cool if it were real, you know I love wizards almost as much as you do, but if you tell anyone else about this they're going to worry about your mental health." Danielle doesn't look upset or hurt like you expected, in fact the smile doesn't even leave her face. All she does in response is lift up her other hand towards the door and mutter one word you can't understand, sending a spray of colors out from her fingertips. "That's a real impressive trick, but stage magicians do stuff like that all the time, it's not real magic."

Danielle smirks and takes your free wrist with her other hand. "I guess you want me to cast something on you then?" she asks. "You know, to prove it? C'mon, stand up." You try to remain seated, but she insistently pulls you up to your feet. She lets go of your wrists and places her hands on your shoulders, holding you in place while she looks down at you. Compliantly you tilt your head back so that you can look her in the eyes, and she says, "Before I do it, I need you to say that you voluntarily fail your next saving throw."

You shrug, raising her hands slightly, and decide to humor her. "Okay, fine. In order for you to demonstrate your magic, I will voluntarily fail my next saving throw. Just don't cast Fireball or something, I don't want to have to call Lana over here so that she can heal me."

Danielle grins down at you, not minding that you're clearly making fun of her. "Stay close and don't move once this is over," she says as she moves her hands over your head. "If I'm as powerful as my character it could be really hard to find you after this." You watch her pinch her thumb and forefinger together then point at you as she says an arcane word which sounds strangely familiar. She says it a lot while you play, at least once per session, and you quickly place when she would say it: every time she casts Reduce Person!

The shrinking is incredibly fast. One moment you're looking at her low neckline, and the next you're eye to belt. Before you can even blink you're below the hem of her robe and still going. How powerful of a wizard Danielle is will decide how tall you end up from just this one spell, so how powerful is she?
152.title: Danielle, the Real Wizard

1521.content:
Blinking violently you then start to do a 180 degree check around the room observing your surroundings stopping at two large seemingly unreal milk white spire's that belonged to your dear friend. Doing the sensible thing you then you look up at your once tall now mile high friend. She had her eyes closed almost in a trance. She seemed to be holding her breathe until she exhaled in anger. She was like a Volcano. One moment a tranquil mountain then suddenly boom the world shook as she took off into the sky yelling. Her giant heels came crashing down to the floor with an enormous thud shaking you to the point of toppling over onto your back. She was angry for some reason but why?

"DAMN IT!" She cried from up above as she vented with frustration almost as if she was lifting a great amount weight, not that she'd know what weight lifting was like. "Where'd you go, come on out I know your not as small as your meant to be" Very shook up and frightened you managed to muster a response to her call's." Hey Dani behind you... Now look down." When her eyes found you her anger and frustration instantly melted away and were now replaced with an equally terrifying eager and giddy disposition. "Wow I can't believe I did it. In real life. Your my first person to cast a spell on. Well your not what I was aiming for and I'll have to wait a little bit before I can try again. Lets take a look at you then" Alarmingly she out stretched her arms encasing you in her grasp she lifted you up past her chest. "Well my girls weren't big before but they must be pretty nice to you now huh?"

"Slow down! can you please just tell me what's going on?" Danielle smirked at you and began to tell you what was happening. "Didn't I tell you I could do Magic? Anyway it doesn't matter because everything's going to continue as planned and we're gonna have fun. Don't be shy I promise you I won't hurt you."

For the next half hour Danielle carried you around the house like a toddler it was a little embarrassing It kind of reminded you of one of the Chucky films except you weren't the psycho. Danielle was on the computer and still grasped you in her arm right by her chest. She was on there for ages browsing the web. You spoke to her about your boredom but she simply replied with a faint "In a minute" You couldn't take it anymore so you shook and fidgeted around eventually you mistakenly punched her right in the tit. She let go and you fell on the floor with a slam you ran towards the open door but Danielle was too quick. "Where do you think your going little man? you need to learn a little patience and etiquette." She disrobed and she was wearing a swim suit? No it was a costume of one of her characters. Powerless to resist she once again grappled you and held you up constricting your body with her titanic hands. She then chucked you onto the bed and then proceeded to sit on you. The two of you used to horse around before jumping on one another but this was extreme overkill. She then wiggled and smothered your diminished body into her sheets. Your grunts and cries only made her experience more enjoyable. Her laughs and cackles echoed through the room making the experience both tormenting and arousing. This went on for a solid twenty minutes boring you fast but a source of never ending fun for Danielle. She eventually stopped and opened her legs revealing your flushed face to her own from high above. "Guess who's the winner now? Your not tackling down me anymore when I'm least expecting it, that's for sure. Now Have I taught you a lesson?" Coughing and avoiding eye contact with some large camel toe you blurt out. "I thought you weren't going to hurt me?" She looked a little shocked and amused. "I didn't hurt you this is just horse play like we always do except now I'm six times your size... silly"

Danielle then got off and took you into the living room where she once again tried to shrink you.

A. Five inches

B. One inch

C. Author's choice
1521.title: Trials of a Novice

15212.content:
Once again in the overbearing arm of Danielle. You were making your way into the living room and with every stride Danielle made your head knocked into her boob not the one you hit, you wanted to grab on for support and to not be smashing into as much but you then think if I touch her boobs again you may face a punishment worse than your last beating. She rested you onto the couch which now was the size of a truck and in front of you was the coffee table with a game set on it. Oddly enough there was also a model of a forested area with an old roman looking ruin and a well in the middle it looked like something from some fantasy on a scale for someone about one inch. It was really well made although you could tell it was fake. Danielle saw that you had seen your surroundings and then she informed you of the day's entertainment.

"I see you've noticed my model, I did the best I could from your description when we played last month" It was perfect almost an exact replica of what you imagined, this was where the characters started off. "I see that you did an amazing job!" She blushed a little and excepted your gratitude. "What we're going to do today is play a little game" She giggle a bit after that last statement you then exclaimed to her that you couldn't really play very well from your height" Then Danielle smiled and said. "That's the beauty of it we're all going to play in the model? Just as soon as Michelle gets here or if Lana decides to show up" You looked up at Danielle with a concerned looked. "That's crazy. Do you understand how crazy that sounds" She simply said "How tall are you right now" And you decide to be quite. "I thought so. Now to get this right, your supposed to be about one inch, here we go" Blinking once the world completely changed in an instant. "JESUS CHRIST!" You yelled when you saw Danielle's even more imposing form. Her eye's opened and her face lit up with happiness. "Finally I did it your the size I was aiming for. Your just a little cutie huh?" Lightning fast she snatched you up with one hand and laid about ten kisses on you little body covering your top front in lip stick.

"Okay, Okay. Enough... stop it" Danielle then moved you onto the model and dropped you next to the well. Wiping yourself down from the saliva you looked up to Danielle and said. "Look Danielle this is insane, do you expect to do a whole game on this one model?" all she said was in a coy tone "You'll see"

Danielle then Blew out some candles sat in a meditating position and started to chant something. Small amounts of lighting came from the ever growing smoke from the candle's. Things started going dark but there was some ambient light. Lightning struck the ruins and the Model became real the grass was real to the touch the well had become pure stone with a gritty texture. Eventually the gap between the model and the table started to close up then the environment started to expand the model became it's own world, what should be cardboard just simply turned into more forest. No matter how hard you ran the world kept going on and so eventually this became fruitless so you went back to the well and sat down on it. With hands over your face you wondered what you had gotten yourself into when you heard a loud booming all around you. "Aw don't be sad" you leaped up onto your feet and said. "Danielle stop this madness, let me out!" Once again her words boomed over head. " I'm sorry I can't, not until the game finishes. Even if I wanted to I can't let you out because the spell is linked to finishing the game." You were furious and swore to the omnipresent Danielle who then tried to comfort you further. "If it makes you feel better I can see you and the world clearly...see" a giant hand then burst through a blue hole in the sky and dropped a gummy bear onto your head. Which you then brutally devoured. "We haven't even set up your character yet" She then started to Narrate.

"What to call you... Oh I know you will be called Dantin Vaskel. And your class will be... A warrior I bet you'd like the sound of that or an archer perhaps maybe so, nope I'm still mad at you for hitting me in the tit you will be a thieve. Wanted Criminal, Assassin and mercenary, You have a bounty of two shillings for stealing a chicken. Now for your clothes which aren't very ascetically pleasing in this world so just this once I'll help you out." Suddenly smoke enveloped all around your body and your clothes were gone and replaced with light medieval clothing and a hood, also you had a small Gladius sword on your waist which you immediately took out and swung around. You were actually starting to get into this when all of a sudden a bolt of lighting struck the ground near the well and in it's place was.


A. Danielle?

B. Michelle
15212.title: Let the game begin

152121.content:
(Note: This is a very story driven chapter with little to none shrinking sexy stuff we all enjoy)


At first she looked like a terminator, all crouched down in a glowing hot small crater in the ground. It looked like Danielle but she had a few key difference's she no longer had a milky white complexion she now had more of a regular person skin color someone who had been in the sun more than once. She also shed her beanpole body for that of someone like that busty red head from mad men on T.V. But other than that her head was the exact same. Danielle was clad in a very revealing Mage outfit with plenty of cleavage on display.

"Finally, you showed up Dani. I was beginning to get lonely" You then put a hand on her shoulder only to be met with anger and she raised her hand towards you and some how an immense force of wind knocked you towards the ruins hitting against one of the columns. "what the hell was that for Dani" while you were riving with pain on the floor you heard Danielle's voice boom again "That's not me, not yet anyway." The woman walked up to you and looking down she said. " I am Valina Aress, who is this Dani you speak of?" It was Dani's voice alright with a slight hint of a British accent. her voice was also strong and confident unlike Danielle. "I'm sorry lady I thought you needed a hand" she once again looked down at you with anger. "I don't need help from the likes of you, good day." she then took off down the road and into the Forrest then Danielle voice spoke again. "Follow her I'm going to take her over in a couple minutes. Don't let her go I don't want to have a doppelganger running around."

You ran up to her on the path the world expanding with new terrain as you went further. You caught up to her and noticed she was a good foot taller than you and you couldn't quite tell if you were short or she was tall. "Look Val maybe we got on the wrong foot maybe if we stop in the next village have a drink and we can get to know each other better." not making eye contact she spoke once again. "Be gone commoner, your company is not wanted with me." She was defiantly not in the mood to be with you maybe you came off as slimy. "The roads are a dangerous place you don't know what might attack you on the way?" She looked at you with even more scorn. "I can handle myself just fine and as soon as I fined my compatriots nothing will harm me, certainly not some two bit bandits"

Just as she said that arrows started to come out from the tree's. scaring you shitless you crouched behind Valina timid and scared and noticed she was stopping the arrows as if she was using some sort of telekinesis. Then three bandits came out of the forest yelling and holding melee weapons. Cowardly you snuck off into the bushes and watched. This was awesome she took on all three instantaneously she froze one burnt one then shock the last one with lightning out of her hand frying him. But she didn't notice one big looking guy with a shield and axe coming behind her and he knocked her down sending her a good eight feet down the road he was going in for the kill. You couldn't just sit here and watch so you crept up behind him and jumped in the air plunging your sword into his neck bring him to his knees which was the same height as you. You had just killed someone for real there was blood everywhere it was different then in a video game when you ruthlessly mow down individuals. Out of breath you dropped your sword and said with a sigh. "What have I done?" Valina still shocked and scared on the ground managed to speak. "Thank... thank you stranger?" It was odd seeing the women in a moment of weakness."Oh my god I killed a man, I'm a murderer" Valina then tried to get onto her feet and she started to walk but with a hobble in her step. she picked up your sword cleaned it then handed to you. "You saved my life, Maybe you aren't so.... repulsive?" You looked at her with disbelief. "What?... Really?" You sighed again "Hey you look a little injured you need hand" Stubbornly Valina snorted "Ha I'll be fine" she then fell down to her knee. "I'm serious you need help!" She then admitted defeat "I, I suppose your right. will you give me a hand until we make it into the next town or settlement?" With a smile you said. "Of coarse I will"

It wasn't long until you left the forest and came into some farmland, it was about five miles give or take. You knew that farms meant villages and you were right. After you came over a hill you saw a little village with a market and what looked like a pub & inn. You were carrying her with her arm over your shoulder for the entire way when she said while you were walking through the market. "Stop here for a minute I need to buy some things" You looked up to her past her breast and said. "You've got to be kidding we need to rest your leg and get it looked at inside that Pub." She looked frustrated. "Ale doesn't cure wounds, potions do. Just you see I'll be walking right in no time. All you'll find in that pub is a place to eat rest and find pointless side quest's" You took a minute and realized you were in a game. "Just leave me here for a minute and look around for a bit, If you still want to pal around with me you know where I am" What am I going to do I don't have any money you thought to yourself. then you noticed a wealthy looking fat man walking with a lose pouch on his belt. Then it hit you, this is a game I'm a thief I can totally pull this off. You saw him walk off out the market and down an ally in the village so you followed him. You got into a sneaky position and started to trail him. oddly enough your saw a big meter appear above his head and naturally thought it meant if you were being seen. So quickly you ran up and swiped the pouch. Shit he must of felt something he turned around and you hid by a bush. "Hmm must have been nothing" he then went on his business. opening up the pouch you found ten gold coins and twenty silver. not bad for your first one. You then went back to the market and found Val still shopping in the magic shop. So you bought some new clothes while you waited. Finally she was done and she left the little shop. "Got everything you need perhaps the kitchen sink" She looked at you with confusion then you said. "Hey listen its getting pretty late do you want to stay the night here I'll pay." She smiled and looked to you. "But you've already done so much I'll pay for a room in the inn" finally she was starting to melt a little.

Booming all around you Danielle spoke. "Aw that was cute it almost made my cry" in anger and frustration you yell out. "Dani where are you? What are you doing?" Val looked at you oddly. "Who is this Dani you keep speaking off?" Then Danielle spoke again. "She can't here me, no one but you or anyone else who joins us. Oh yeah and I went to the bathroom then came back and was enthralled in your little story, don't worry I'll be there in a minute I promise"

The two of you entered the Pub and inn then got a room for the two of you which surprised you a little coming from Val. Before you headed up you went to the Pub and sat at the bar. You had some mutton then four tankards of mead it was nice to have a drink after today. Admittedly you were getting a bit rowdy from the drink and started to get on Val's nerves who was being quiet and face first in a book. At last something she shared with Danielle other then her face in fact she did this exact same thing once before when you went drinking with her and your friends. You tried to reach into Val for a hug but she smiled patted you on the shoulder and said. "That's okay, I like you too." You saw in your drunken stupor that this wasn't going anywhere and turn to the other person next to you and started to talk. "Hey you.... yeah you!. What what's your name what do you.... what do you do." and you noticed that this was the same man you stole from no less than thirty minutes ago. "Oh hello there young man I see your new here. passing through are we?" You look cock eyed and say. "Answer my question first B...B... Big stuff" He looked offended "Well I'll let that slide for now but I am Man of large stature in this part of the land" You just start laughing. "Pfffff Large you got that right." the man then got up and aimed to punch you square in the face but you tried to avoid him and fell off your stole and onto the ground. The man looked like he'd start mashing your face into the ground any second then Valina stepped over your body blocking your attacker. "I'm sorry, My friend seems to be a bit of a light weight." the bar then roared with laughter and Val picked you up onto your feet. "I'm sorry for anything he did to offend you sir but he isn't worth it if you ask me, Young as he is." The man look like his mood improved but there was still some anger. "Alright but that's the last straw got it"

Thing's kind of got all fuzzy after that you remember Val hauling you upstairs to your room and lying you down on the bed. After that you faded in and out of consciousness. You heard a chair squeak and your eye's popped open you saw Val and she was getting ready for the night she took off some clothes and then came towards you carrying a pouch of potions she was putting them with the rest of her things when suddenly. A blue potions falls out onto your face getting in your mouth. Val then whispered in frustration and you woke up. "What what's happening, what's on my face?" Val then piped up. "Damn, well don't freak out its just some... ingredient for a formula." She was lying. "Well alright" you wiped off and went back to sleep. The next morning you woke up and noticed you were locked in Val's arms and you had shrunk to only?


A. Five foot

B. Eight inches
152121.title: Danielle?

1521211.content:
You felt odd but couldn't quite place a finger on it as to why. The morning haze had just crept through the window and onto the bed. You tried to move but couldn't then you noticed the two arms rapped around your chest. With effort you managed to squeeze around twisting to see the person behind you. At first your face was stuck into some rocking cleavage that was gently moving up and down as she slept, moving your head around you saw the face of Val and strangely she was smiling she looked happy for a change.

"Psst Val... Val. VAL! wake up" She was very groggy still mostly asleep. "What, what do you want let me sleep in" She sounded a little different than usual. She fell asleep again so you started to poke her in the stomach with your index finger which finally brought her out of her sleep. "Ow damn it what was that for, I'm up I'm awake" Surprised you say. "Val are you okay" She then began to laugh smashing her boobs in your face turning you on a bit. "Val's gone it's Danielle now" You then became frustrated. "Where'd Val go, and let me go damn it." she then released you from her grasp. "As you wish. Oh and as to what happened to Valina well she goes away when I'm in the world but when I leave and go back into my body she takes over kind of like an idle mode or a cruise control." You were a little upset by this news. "That's a shame at least she was competent" Danielle then looked a little offended then said. "Does a competent person drop a shrinking potion on someone's head?" You look to her in disbelief. "What, that's what it was. That lying cow!"

152121111222211121.title: Yes

choices: She wants to roleplay an evil giantess
1522.content:
You look up at your giant friend from the floor. While it's true that Danielle towered over you before, the height difference was almost obscene now. Just a few seconds ago she was head and shoulders taller than you, and now she's... well, everything taller than you. The sole of her high-heeled shoe comes up to just above your knees, and you can't even look over the shoe's toe.

"It worked!" she exclaims, peering down at you with a wide-eyed stare. Gently she slides one of her feet forward, planting her shoe's heel next to you so that you can compare heights. The shoe's heel is easily three times as tall as you, though when you look up your eyes are drawn to her stark white calf. "Now do you believe me?" she asks, an enormous smile plastered on her face.

"I... I'm not sure how you did this, Dani," you being. "Granted it's a really convincing illusion, I admit, but there has to be some trick to it. You put a camera on the floor and I'm looking through it, right? And somehow I'm controlling it? C'mon, if I guess how you did it let me know."

"Nope, no trick!" she says, pulling her foot back. "I'm a wizard and I shrank you, simple as that. Search your heart, you know it to be true! Look at how I tower over you, listen to my undoubtedly booming voice!" She beams down at you, letting you bask in the majesty of her sheer size. "Hold on a second, I think I know what will finally convince you and let me get an accurate measure of your height, little guy!"

Danielle steps away from you and walks over to a nearby shelf, her heels' impact on the hard wood floor reverberating around you. Quickly she picks up a little figure, palms it, and strides back toward you, closing the monumental gap between you with only two steps. Carefully she gathers her robe up under herself and kneels down, her bony knees sounding off with an impact similar to that of her heels. She leans in, her pretty face looming over you like a billboard as her hair spills over her shoulders like a waterfall.

In her hand she holds one of her wargaming figures from a game you played together, which you knew to be 28mm in height. She sets it down and slides it next to you with her index finger, then gently prods you with the same so that you stand up on the figure's base. You're now sharing space with what you used to jokingly call a "tiny pewter man" that's nearly a head taller than you. Looking towards Danielle, who still looms over you with the largest smile and brightest eyes you've ever seen, you see her measuring you and the figure, and comparing your relative heights.

"An inch!" she booms, lowering her face towards you and staggering you backwards. Demurely she covers her mouth and leans closer, bringing her narrow, wire-frame glasses mere inches from you. "Sorry," she apologizes, "I got a bit carried away. An inch, though! You're really small! Tiny, even! I mean if I were as powerful as my character you'd be as small to that model as you are to me right now, but it's a start!" You look at Danielle, trying to take in the totality of her size compared to you, then at the model, and then back at Danielle again, attempting to comprehend just how small that would be and how gargantuan she would be if that were true.

"Do you believe me now?" she asks. You look around for where you would be otherwise and see no sign of your body, and mull over the fantastic scale of the woman above and in front of you. Reluctantly you shrug and nod, admitting that she is a real wizard and she has definitely shrunk you down to an inch. "Mmm, I thought that'd be convincing. Lucky for you, too: I've always had a thing for shorter guys, and they don't get much shorter than you. I mean not that they did before, but. You know." She blushes and turns away for a second to hide her flustered embarrassment.

"Now what?" you ask, trying to get her attention back to you.

Danielle rests her hand before you, idly laying her thumb and forefinger around you. "I don't know, little guy," she coyly responds. "My table's all set up and we have the whole room to ourselves, though..."
1522.title: Experienced - 1 inch

15221.content:
She trails off, leaving you still confused as to what she has planned for you now that she's made you tiny. You hope she has a plan for you, at least, since her boredom could be very dangerous for you now. Her finger begins tapping the floor, causing you to recoil away from the loud, rhythmic pounding and stumble onto her couch-sized thumb.

Danielle pounces, closing her fingers together so that you're firmly pinched between them. There's a rush of movement as she pushes herself up to a crouching position, holding you in front of what cleavage she has on her lanky body. She wobbles from the unsteadiness of crouching while on heels, making you worry that you'll be tossed to the floor and lost amongst all the clutter. Luckily she's able to steady herself, and you slowly rise into the sky as she stands.

Wordlessly she turns to the left, as if you were already in on this plan of hers. She begins moving you away from her and lowering you down, guiding you over the top of a chair and over the table. You see that she's laid out the battle mat in preparation for a combat, each grid square the perfect size for someone of your scale, and a variety of monster models had been set up, previously unnoticed among the various dice scattered about.

Dani sets you down exactly in the middle of the center square on her edge of the table and places her hands on either side, letting her lean over you. "I figure since you're here, we might as well play a bit," she booms down, her normally soft and gentle voice sounding more like an avalanche from where you are. "But since you're the size of a figure, I thought we could take advantage of that! First though we should just to a quick little combat so that you can get used to it. I made a character sheet for you as I see you, look it over and let me know what class you want to be so that I can give you appropriate equipment." She pulls up a filled-out sheet and holds it in front of her so that you can read it like a billboard.

Wow, she sure thought highly of you; your lowest stat was Wisdom at 16, probably assigned because you were "unwise" to have doubted her power. "This all looks great, but one thing Dani," you say to the black-clad monolith before you. "I'm not really sure if I can buy the 18/00 strength. That's supposed to be able to lift 400 pounds, right? I doubt I'd be able to lift 4 ounces."

She giggles in response, her massive size turning it into a low rumble. "That's for table purposes only, silly! I have a different sheet for how you actually are, but I'm going to hold on to it for now as a surprise. Anything else?"

"Not really," you answer, shrugging. "I guess I'll be a warrior since I've got the numbers for it." Dani quickly scribbles that down on your sheet. "And... I'll take a mace as my weapon, with a shield." The titanic nerd scribbles some more, and a very solid-looking mace and shield appear in your hands. Before you can say anything else a suit of full plate armor manifests around you along with a helmet, and a sack full of goods is on the ground.

"Okay, let's get started!" she says. "You are as usual Sir Caius, righter of wrongs, defender of the weak, and able to melt a maiden's heart with a single glance! As you walk through the fields outside the village of Cerebon, you come across a trio of bandits, two men and a woman, planning to be up to no good. They haven't noticed you yet, letting you have a surprise round should you choose to attack them."

Patiently you listen as Dani lays out the fairly standard scenario for you. Three bandits should be easy enough, you think to yourself, especially equipped how you are. You announce your intention to charge the nearest one and set off running, shield in front and mace ready to strike. As you close in to striking distance an enormous hand slams down in front of you, stopping your charge as you run face first into Dani's palm. Quickly she wraps her fingers around you and picks you up, then carries you back to the square you started in.

"Not so fast!" she admonishes, wagging a finger the size of a tree at you. "I have to roll your attack first to see if you hit him." She does so, taking her blue eyes off you momentarily to check it. "Okay, 16, go ahead and hit him." You shrug and move forward as you had before, this time getting close enough to swing your mace and hit the opponent in the head. Another die clatters followed by a resounding, "Ten! He's dead!" As soon as she proclaims it your weapon sinks into the opponent's head in a way much unlike if they were metal or plastic.

Before you can question it Dani declares, "Okay, next round!" Some more dice clatter on the table. "You'll be going first, then the other male bandit and then the lady bandit."

"I attack the other male bandit," you say, moving to get into position. A die rumbles in the distance, followed by an unusually excited giantess's voice.

"Twenty, nice crit!" she exclaims. "I'll just go ahead and... max damage, too!" You throw your attack, wondering what effect this has. Much to your surprise the model's head quite literally flies off, and you turn around before you can see any other effects this might have so that you can face the woman.

"Okay. You see the last bandit casting a spell at you," Dani narrates as the model moves its hand up to point at you. It pinches two fingers together and says a word that you've come to hear far too often lately.

"Dani, come on!" you complain. "You're really going to shrink me even more?"

"I'm not, she is!" the giantess retorts. "Unless you have issues with how I'm running this campaign?" You think about how she might respond to the 'issues' you're having so far and decide not to say anything further. "Besides, you won't shrink at all if you pass your save." She drops a polyhedral dice that's nearly your size and says, "Oooh..."
15221.title: Once Upon a Table

choices: You pass, and get ready to retaliate
152212.content:
As soon as the die clatters to a stop you feel the spell's effect, and you know you failed before Dani even says anything. Everything around you begins to grow: the plastic trees double in size, the squares marking off 5 feet on each side stretch out, and the enemy model sprouts up. You feel Dani exhale, and to your surprise the enemy model's plastic hair blows with the breeze.

"Okay, that's the end of the round!" Danielle proclaims, picking up the dice again. She tells you that you're the red one before dropping them and letting them come to a stop. "Lucky you, you get to go first again. Just let me change some stuff on your sheet before you decide."

You dutifully wait while you're titanic friend scribbles the alterations down, and then declare, "I charge the enemy wizard!" You run at her, mace held high to strike. Just as you enter the adjacent square you feel a sharp tug on your back as Dani grabs you, pulling you away.

"You're a size small creature now," she tells you, holding the sheet up. "That means you can't move as far." She sets you four squares away from your target, and you see that you're at about waist height to the figurine. "Okay now it's her turn again!"

The figure's head snaps down to look at you, and its metallic eyes flare to life, turning a very familiar shade of blue. Similarly its metal skin becomes flesh-colored, and the model's clothing is now black with gold embroidery. She moves an arm up, a solid motion much less jerky than the previous time, and does its familiar gesture as an enormous die slams onto the table behind you.

Again everything around you gets bigger. The enemy mage, in particular, stretches up until you're about even with her knees. More details on her fill in as you get smaller - some wire glasses appear on her face, and her hair turns a light shade of brown. This model was becoming Danielle as you shrank!

"Okay, next round," booms a voice behind you, as well as from in front of you. The model's lips move as Danielle speaks, and says, "Lucky you again! What do you do this round?"

"I charge her again!" you say, getting impetuous at how she keeps shrinking you. Quickly you dash forward, and take the square adjacent to Danielle's model. You swing your weapon at the air and wait for Danielle to roll your attack. "It's my turn," you pipe up, "and I'm in range to attack her."

"Not quite! You're in the tiny size category now, you have to occupy the same square to attack! Stop trying to break the rules or I'll stop taking it easy on you!" You sigh in resignation and look up at the figurine. Danielle's tiny avatar, several times your size, raises its hand to you again as it readies a spell.
152212.title: Withering Warrior

1522121.content:
A blast of magic washes over you, accompanied by the titanic thud of a die hitting the table far behind you. "Oof, bad news little guy," Dani says, her representation on the table mouthing along with her. She doesn't even need to use her rumbling voice to explain: it's evident how you rolled when the model begins stretching upward again as you dwindle further.

Your shrinking doesn't stop until your eyes reach her ankle - or at least where her ankle would be if she weren't wearing high heels. You're now only about three inches tall compared to this figurine which you remember holding in the palm of your hand just last week. "Well, at least you're in range to hit her now, so go ahead." You swing your mace half-heartedly, hitting the apparently ever-growing facsimile of Danielle square on the ankle bone.

"I've gone ahead and resolved the combat for you. The good news is you hit, but once I factor in all the modifiers for your size and your now absolutely pitiful strength you did exactly zero damage. If it were possible you would have done negative damage. And she won the initiative roll, so she's up now." Dani's voice sounds more like the rumble of thunder than an actual human voice, but you're still able to pick the words out.

The figurine, which now looks exactly like Dani, looks down at you by her foot. "You shouldn't have done that," the figure says, this time with no input from your friend. "If you had managed to hurt me I'd have been absolutely... crushed." It smiles devilishly and begins to cackle while, according to the rules, you can do nothing but look on.
1522121.title: Continuing Down

choices: Time for a good ol RPG Adventure!!
What other things can my powers do?
Maybe I should make you a different size?
1523.content:
As you shrank right before your friend's eyes, you noticed a similar glee in them. The last time you saw Dani looking that happy was when you finished a two month long campaign. The reward was the staff of absolving light, which boosted her mage's magic based on half of her strength. Since she was an amazon, her strength was at a much higher level too, which normally for mages wouldn't be much help. With this skill, he magic could basically one shot any foe after that.

That is how you felt know. . a simple foe being blasted away!! You were terrified, frozen in fear as Dani grew larger and larger still.

"It work. . wait a minute! You are still shrinking!!" With a heavy footed stomp, Dani placed her enormous high heeled shoe besides you!! Feeling the need to hold something to feel protected, you grasped onto the front of the shoe. Danielle's white skin was quite a contrast compared to the dark appearance of the shoe. While holding it, you felt yourself continue to slip and slide. . .the shrinking wasn't done yet!!

You screamed as loud as you could now, your voice finally returning!!

"Dani!! Help!!"

Danielle put her hands on her mouth as you disappeared with a small poof!!

Her enormous shoes now towered above you like a skyscraper!!

"OH MY G-GOD!! YOU . . DISAPPEARED!!"

Danielle's loud voice boomed over head as she struggled to see you. You screamed at her but she couldn't hear you at all. At this point, you were basically only making grunting sounds anyway. You had sort of got a little crazy from the size difference.

"WOW, I AM WAY MORE POWERFUL THAN I THOUGHT. . .OH. . OH OH OH OH . . OH, I GOT IT, I GOT IT!!"

Lost in thought, she had an idea!! Looking away, she took a step backwards towards one of her bookshelves.

Whoosh!!

The giant heel in front of you spun around quickly!! With you right next to it, you spun around too!! Your body ached as she took another step forward, you still trying to recuperate from her last movement. You watched in wonder and terror as her giant heel lifted high into the ground.
