She took a shine to you right away, but things got uncomfortable REAL quick. She would hang off of you all the time, smother you with attention in public and in private, and call you at all hours of the night. She would never leave you be, not even for a second. But you dealt with it because you still had feelings for her and she was pretty wild in bed. Maybe a little too wild, you found out. She started introducing things into the bedroom that she thought would turn you on, but in all actuality just freaked you out. Whips, chains, handcuffs and all matter of toys were being shoved in your face, and all you wanted to do was be with her in a normal way. She felt like every time you turned down her crazy advances, you were personally insulting her. To the point that she actually set fire to a trashcan in your room when you refused to let her handcuff you to the bed. There was no doubt, this girl was absolutely insane. You tried to break up with her, but she thought you were just playing hard to get, and wouldn't take the hint until you told her off in the middle of the hallway, finally having the courage to break up with her. WIth everyone staring at her, she felt humiliated and slapped you across the face, screaming that she would find a way to get you back, no matter what it took, before storming off. You saw her occasionally and she tried to play it off like nothing had happened, but you just kept ignoring her. That was four months ago, and she's still acting just as batshit as ever. And the last thing you want to do was make her believe you were interested in her at all.

You walk straight home after class, putting the key to the door of your dorm to open it up when your realize that the key is moving freely in the slot... the door is already open. You slowly open the door and take a look inside, hearing deep breathing in the unlit room. "Is anybody in there", you call out to the darkness, not expecting the answer that you get: "You've been ignoring my texts." You roll your eyes in disgust and say "Lisa, we can't do this anymore, how did you get into my room in the first place?" You flick the light switch on and realize that Lisa is sitting on your bed, lying down in a seductive pose, wearing black high heel boots, a pair of skimpy black lace underwear... and nothing else. She slowly rubs her nipple with an extended finger, moving it in a circular motion, and whispers back "I had an extra key. You didnt' think i'd just give you back the copy you gave me without making a spare of my own? You're silly sometimes." You get angry and pick her up off the bed, holding her shoulders and making solid eye contact with her. "Look. We are not together anymore. You have serious problems and I just can't be with you. The sooner you get that through your crazy head, the better it will be for both of us!" She giggles and says "You're funny when you're angry. I almost thought for a second there that you really didn't still love me. Cmon, we both know that you want to be with me. I can see it in your eyes every time i walk past you in the halls. Every time you send me those hurtful messages online. Every time you don't think i'm watching... You still want to be with me, even if you don't know it." You honestly don't know what to say, this girl is beyond insane at this point. You snap, and start yelling at her. "I don't want to be with you! The way you act, the crazy shit you're into, I'm amazed if there's a guy on EARTH who would want to be with you! Now I want you to leave my room, and stay out of my life, you psycho bitch!!" Lisa's smile dissapears from her face, and without warning, she lets loose a swift kick, right in between your legs. You drop to your knees in pain as Lisa goes to the end table and reaches inside her bag. She kneels down in front of you, and applies a thick red lipstick to her pouty lips, puckering them up repeatedly in front of your face. "YOU CRAZY CUN..." Before you can finish the most honest statement you've ever told anyone else, she grabs the back of your head and gives you a long, forceful kiss. You feel your lips go numb, then your head, then your whole body as you fall backwards, passing out.

You wake up what seems like ages later, still on the floor of your dorm. You are horrified to realize that even though you can breathe and talk normally, you are paralyzed from the neck down! What did that crazy bitch do to you?! You feel your head pounding as you lay flat on the floor, looking up at the dominant form of Lisa standing tall above you. She has her hands on her hips and is looking incredibly happy seeing you down at her feet unable to move. "Lisa! What the hell did you do to me?" Her voice seems to be echoing all around you as she explains "WELL, YOU LITTLE SHIT. I WAS GOING TO GIVE YOU THE TIME OF YOUR LIFE. WE COULD HAVE BEEN PERFECT TOGETHER. BUT YOU HAD TO GO AND BE A SELFISH LITTLE PIG, DIDN'T YOU." You still have no idea what she's talking about but hope she gets to the part where you're paralyzed on the god damned floor! "YOU DON'T WANT TO BE MY BOYFRIEND? FINE. I'VE GOT A MUCH BETTER IDEA WHAT YOU CAN BE." She reaches into her bag again, and pulls out what looks like a small perfume bottle. She lowers her body down to get a better look at you and says "MY FRIEND RENEE RUNS THIS SHOP IN TOWN. SHE SELLS OCCULT OBJECTS, SOME OLD WORLD PARAPHINALIA, BUT SHE'S GOT A BACK SECTION SHE DOESN'T LET MOST PEOPLE KNOW ABOUT. SHE COMES FROM A LONG LINE OF GYPSIES AND WITCHES, AND HER MOTHER TAUGHT HER ALL SHE KNEW ABOUT SPELLS AND CURSES." You don't like where this is going one bit. She moves the bottle all over your body, spraying you from head to toe in the funny smelling liquid from the strange bottle. She puts the bottle down and stands back up to her full height, stepping over you as she speaks. "I TOLD RENEE ABOUT HOW YOU WERE ALWAYS TREATING ME, AND HOW I KNEW THAT DEEP DOWN, YOU REALLY STILL LOVED ME. BUT I WANTED YOU TO SUFFER. SO SHE MADE THIS SPECIAL POTION FOR ME. DIDN'T COST ME A CENT, AND SHE EVEN THROUGH IN THAT SPECIAL LIPSTICK THAT MADE YOU UNABLE TO ESCAPE FOR FREE. I GUESS SHE WAS JUST AS INTERESTED TO SEE THE POTION WORK AS I AM." You feel your body burning up, and a deep pain burn in your chest. You are suddenly able to move your limbs again, and use your newfound mobility to clutch your midsection in pain. As you roll around on the ground, you hear the laughter get louder, and Lisa's voice get deeper as the words ring in your head... "AFTER ALL I'VE GIVEN YOU, YOU STILL DON'T WANT ME AS YOUR GIRLFRIEND? FINE. BUT IF I CAN'T HAVE YOU AS MY BOYFRIEND, I'LL MAKE YOU WHAT YOU DESERVE TO BE..."

She possesses a head of long black hair which reaches a bit below her shoulder, and a pair of dark brown eyes most can get lost in. Being that she comes from a family of wealth, Abby is one to be able to afford to keep in fashion. Even though she tends to stick to what most would call the Emo/Scene look. On this particular day wearing a T-shirt with a bands logo on the front, hugging tightly to her small frame. A pair of black skinny jeans and a pair of old chuck taylors. She also wears a pair of fashionable thick framed rectangular glasses, and a beanie fitting loosely to the back of her head.

Abby is a kind girl who tends to socialize with anyone. Abby is a scholar who enjoys the company of like minded company, to which she gains a bit of a competitive nature for. Whether it's a battle of wits, or quite simply one of her own weaknesses, what she finds to be an ultimate test of mental reflex, gaming. Something that she can take quite seriously sometimes, and a subject you try not to argue with her over. 154.title: And then there's

1541.content:
You couldn't help but wonder just what it was that Abby wanted this time. After all, you remembered the last time you had gotten a text from her just out of the blue like this. It was to just to get a rematch with you in one of her new games you happened to best her in, the loss like all of them, did not settle well with the good natured girl. It wasn't rare when you or anyone for the matter beat her, whether it be on the console or PC, but when it happened, you could almost see the meltdown happening in her brain. With a sigh, you hoped it wasn't the case this time, your mind already having been made it that you would just let her win if it was, just to be done with it.

Fortunately, as you arrived and knocked on her door, you were both surprised by the fast response. You having not even finished what you felt was a fair amount of knocks before the door swung open. Though surprised you would also be relieved, due to Abby having a clear smile on her face, not the face of a grump looking to even a score. Though you could also spy something out of place, in her hands she held the newest model of her favorite consoles version of gun. A small handheld and futuristic looking thing, a design choice to be cutting edge from the company no doubt. You couldn't help but wince as you spied in, fearing the worst that Abby had something else in store for you, which to be fair, you weren't completely wrong with that thought.

Before you could even question this, you would have the happy young woman grab you by the arm and drag you into the room. You of course going along with it as she didn't have the strength to pull you around. Once inside, Abby would be quick to shut the door behind you, sealing you inside. Though none of it had struck you as weird, after all, she did this all the time, and it wasn't the first time you had seen this room. Even so, you couldn't help but look around it in envy. The well off girl who's family not only has the money for, but also the influence to allow for Abby to have her own room, no room mate in sight. It was a luxury that you couldn't help but turn green over every time you walked in this room.

Abby's room likewise was a total mess, discarded clothing littered the floor, empty soda cans on her desk, the type of things which would never be approved by a room mate who had to share these four walls. A freedom for her which would also grant her to do what she wanted with her time, and it seemed she had accomplished something with the grin that she wore. "You won't believe it!" She started out, excited, clasping her hands together around the grip of the gun/controller. An excited outburst which would only get you to sarcastically roll your eyes with a scoff. "What highscore did you beat this time?" You couldn't help but ask with a chuckle, sure with yourself this was what it was all about.

Sure enough, you had expected this girl to go off in a tangent about that very topic, but instead she would simply be quiet, a sly grin forming on her lips as she could sense your sarcasm. This left you confused as she didn't say anything, instead she simply smiled, almost with intent in her eyes. "Let's play a game." She would reply simply. Something which would have gotten you to shrug your shoulders with an the word ofcourse following closely. But you would be simply left too puzzled by her actions as she raised the gun up and pointed it at you, and soon what you saw was a bright light shooting from the end.

How small do you get for now?
1541.title: Zapped

Your body is paralyzed as the green light shocks you, the light blinds you for a few seconds as you unknowingly decrease in height.
After what felt like minutes but was in reality seconds the light stops and you can yet again move your limbs, almost immediately you fall backwards onto the floor of Abby's room right next to an odly large shirt considering Abby's size.
All you can do is writhe on the ground covering your eyes with an arm until suddenly as fast as it started the pain stops, removing your arm from your face you look up to see Abby smiling down at you proudly, "Abby what the hell was that?" you say as Abby gives you a hand to help you up.
Grabbing onto her arm she pulls you up with more strength than you would've expected from her size, standing up to your full height and look Abby strait in the eyes.
Abby's grin just grows wider as you look around confused as to why you're not looking down at her anymore, "Abby... What... Did you do to me?!"
All she can respond with is "Perfect." as she puts the gun into her cabinet and locks it taking care to put the key on the inside of her pants making it much harder to retrieve.

Turning around to your wide eyed confused face she gives you a smile and excitedly takes your hand.

Two pairs of pedicured feet (It's her sisters!)
15422.content:
"What do you want loser?" "Yeah, like... can we help you with something?" You stare blankly at the two smoking hot girls before emotionlessly replying "Is Shelley home? She texted me about seeing something in her room." The twins both gave a disgusted sigh at the same time, before saying ""Whatever, she's probably inside, the little nerd." "Yeah, the weirdo's in her room. If she's not, don't bug us, we don't know where she is." You are let through by the girls and walk towards Shelley's room. Her sisters, Brandy and Nicole, were so much different from her, it's amazing that the three of them are related. Her sisters are a few years older, in their late twenties. They both had identical hourglass figures and huge asses. Shelley wasn't as fit, but definitely had the ass of the rest of her family. Her sisters had short blond hair, twisted into ponytails that hung off of their shoulders. Shelly had a mop of frizzy brown tan colored hair that seemed to go on for days. The twins were just about 6 feet tall a piece, with clear, clean skin. Shelley had some dry patches on her skin, and stood at no more than 5 foot 4. There was one major difference that Shelley had in her favor though: Shelley was leagues above any intelligence her two hot sisters possessed... combined. Shelley spent so much time reading and experimenting that she never got out. While her sisters were living the party lifestyle, Shelley would only seem to hang out with you. She had gotten drunk with you a few times, and really seemed to take a shine to you. She had a pretty obnoxious laugh that turned you off a bit, plus her overall appearance was one of a person with less than a single fuck to give, but she was still kind of cute in a nerdy sort of way. Her sisters would constantly tease her for her appearance, and she had tons of revenge fantasies she would share with you. She was pretty shy and passive, so she never acted out on her strong desire to cut her sister's hair off in the middle of the night, or burn up their favorite dresses or something. She was a little too sweet for that, it seemed.

You're thinking all of this in the space it takes you to get from the front door to Shelley's room. While her sisters had a huge bedroom on the top floor of the house, Shelley lived in a much more cramped room in the basement. It was picked out by her, so she could stay as far away from her snobby flesh and blood as much as possible. She had enough to sustain herself down there for days at a time. Her own shower, a mini fridge, a few bottles of booze, and a lab table filled with all types of gadgets and electronics. She liked to build things in her spare time, like computers and crazy mods to her phone. You knocked on the door to her room, which opened with your touch. You called out for Shelley but she didn't answer. You walked into the room, which was littered with old socks and chip bags. She hadn't cleaned up after herself in a while. You wandered over to her desk to see what she was working on, and among the cluttered scraps of metal and wiring, there was one object that seemed to be in one piece. From a distance it looked like a small nerf gun, but as you actually got close enough to touch it, you realized it was made of metal. The gun looked really cool, and you held it in your hand, inspecting it for a minute or two. It's power source was some sort of green liquid in a cannister at the top, and the controls in the handle read out a variety of numbers and bars. Your finger slipped as you held the gun, and landed on a button near one of the readout screens. The machine started to whir and click in your hands, and you moved your finger to see that it had landed on what appeared to be a glowing red minus sign. You instinctively put the gun down, facing the wall as it shot out a bright green beam of light. The position the gun was sitting in was a precious one, and the beam of light struck a mirror across the room, reflecting back and hitting you square in the stomach. Before you could react to the feeling of being shot by the laser, you felt the world rise up around you slowly. You couldn't move, just watch in shock as the desk, bed, and walls of your friend's room got larger and wider. When you finally stopped, you were up to your knees in the thick blue carpet, surrounded by oversized laundry, crumbs, and more than a few nuts and bolts near the desk. The gun shrunk you down to the size of a small doll!

Shelley's device was a success, but now you were stranded in a field of carpet, a measly 4 inches tall! You waded your way through the fibers on the floor, standing underneath the table where the gun was resting. You could hear it slowly grind down, turning off in the process. Looking at the legs of the desk and the fact that there was no chair or... anything you could climb onto to get up there, you came to the conclusion that there was no way you could get back to the gun at your current size. As you started to contemplate life as a rodent in your friend's room, you heard thunderous footsteps approaching the room. You ran through the carpet, trying to beat the huge person that was walking in there as you dove underneath your friend's bed, landing on one of her stinky socks. You held your nose and laid down to try and stay out of sight, worried about who was coming down. If it was Shelley's mom, you didn't want her to see you like this, she might think you were a mouse or something and get out the spray! To your surprise it wasn't her mother though, and standing in the doorway from your position, all you could see was...
15422.title: In Shelley's Room

choices: Go to Shelly's fridge to get help and survive!
154221.content:
Lost, tiny, and terrified would be the best way to sum up your predicament right now. You need a moment to collect your thoughts so being in the shade from the lights above under Shelly's bed you sit down and try to calm yourself down and think.

"Alright alright, I am... Shrunk..."
You sound insane just saying that but it's definately real, there's nothing else that can explain it.
You stand back up and do a whole 360 of your area, in front of you is the open area that is the rest of Shelly's room and behind you is a sea of food, garbage, and old clothes that makes up the underside of Shelly's bed.
Still focused on surveying Shelly's room from the edge of under her bed you nearly jump out of your skin when you hear a loud thump, followed by another, and another after that, they continue on until you see what's causing them.
In the far distance you can see two massive socked feet followed by redwood tree sized legs going up into the sky, they continue their graceful yet powerful stride for a few more steps before stopping almost right infront of you.
Startled by both the size and the smell you slowly inch backwards as if backing away from some kind of monstor poised to attack, eventually you trip on a huge sock on the ground and fall backwards as the legs and feet raise up one by one onto the bed above.
Loud creaking from above makes you cover your ears, judging by the smell of the feet from before, it's definately Shelly on the bed above, you're assumption is confirmed when you hear her speak up above ontop of the bed.

"Ugh where is he? I sent him a text nearly fifteen minutes ago, I told him it was urgent he should be here by now." Yep definately Shelly, she was always complaining about you being late even if you're on time or even early.

"Atleast I can get the demonstration ready for him for when he does eventually get here."
Demonstration? She didn't tell you about any demonstration, suddenly you hear more creaking before the two legs come back down from the bed and begin their stride over towards the work bench.
"What? Only four inches? I need it at one so I can shrink the model to the precise side!"
You hear a click and then a familiar sensation overtakes you as you shrink even smaller than before down to exactly one inch, crap, this is bad, if Shelly messes with the controls any more you could shrink too small to even be seen, even right now Shelly would have trouble spotting you if she was standing up to her full height of 5'6.
Doing some small calculations you find that you are around 1.5 percent of Shelly's height and it would take exactly sixty six of yourself standing on your head to reach Shelly's height which is a little terrifying.
You need to do something quick to get Shelly's attention or you're as good as a bug at her feet scrounging through her scraps and depending on her for her garbage to survive.
This is gonna be a tough one, trying to get Shelly's help at this size, you can see her mini-fridge in the distance which is probably your best bet for survival but going there you risk getting stuck and accidentally eaten somehow, there are other options but if you climb up her building sized desk and she doesn't notice you, you could likely starve to death so the benefits greatly outweigh the benefits for going to the fridge.
154221.title: Coming up with a plan.

15423.content:
Name - Yuliyah Dragunov
Appearance - 21 years old. A 6'2 tall russian foreign exchange student. Creamy white skin, Long blonde hair shaped in a ponytail, huge D-cup breasts and thick thighs. Stocky build, almost muscular, despite the fact that she doesn't work out. very dark blue eyes and a small pug nose, with freckles adorning her face.

Personality - Although she's one of the tallest girls you've eve rmet, Yuliyah is by far one of the most passive. She's a very sweet girl who always tries to be nice to everyone she meets. She tends to get picked on because of her size and her thick Russian accent. She is an easy target, gets very emotional and never seems to fight back, even given her large figure. Despite the cultural differences, she is excelling in her classes, especially in mythology and history. She's even gone on a few archeological digs to find lost relics and legendary objects. She is an avid reader and loves mythology, especially tales of legendary Valkyries and Amazons, sensing that she shares characteristics with them. And... it's not that far off, actually.

Relationship - You are not extremely close with Yuliyah, but she is very fond of you. You were one of the first people she became friends with after moving, and she appreciates that, often giving you huge hugs in the halls when she sees you. She can be very caring and shy, but doesn't really know her own strength. Over the past few months you've noticed her becoming more comfortable with her surroundings, and she's been making mention of a "big change" happening soon, but you have no idea what she's talking about.
15423.title: How about Yuliyah?

154231.content:
Yuliyah had bumped into you in the hallway earlier and asked you very excitedly to come by her dorm room to see something special. Yuliyah was probably your strangest friend, but it was mostly because of her size and her background. She was well over 6 feet tall, which was enough to make any girl a bit of an unusual specimen, but also throw on top of THAT, she's a foreign exchange student from Russia. She speaks the language, but not very well. Usually forgetting words or using replacements that don't make much sense. Despite this though, she's on the honor roll with a specialized study in archaeology. She's fascinated by norse mythology, which is how you became friends with her. You traded a book of norse myths back and forth from the library. You needed it for a class while she was using it to live out another life. She had told you that she connects a lot with the stories of Valkyries and Amazon women, who like her were huge female specimens that towered over men. She wished to be respected as a tall girl, but there are bullies around every corner, and if they can find a flaw in you to isolate, that's what they're going to do. And in Yuliyah's case, it was her height. She was taunted endlessly for it, but never really retaliated. She had a very passive attitude towards the girls who would mock her, even though you could tell it was eating away at her. You were curious to see what she had

"Hello, you!" She gives you a huge hug and tells you to sit down. She sits down across from you on her bed, reaching underneath it to pull out a small wooden box. "It is in here, what i talk about before." She opens it up, stifling a giggle as she regains her composure and asks you "Tell me... You know story of Grior?" You nod a solid no, obviously you skipped that part of the book. She smiles and strokes the box, saying "When Thor goes to land of Giants, he didn't bring his hammer, belt or gloves he always have to prove he can be brave. But he is now too weak to face his foes, so he finds giant woman called Grior. She gives him HER special gloves and belt to aid him. She was made big by magic, not born as giantess. So it is said everything she owned had some magic in them." She reaches into the box and feels around, while explaining "The Archaeology department of school find something interesting on last dig... they find this box which i take from the office." She pulls out of the box a single glove. It's bound in iron and looks remarkably clean for something found in the ground buried under rubble and earth for however long. "Nobody at dig site know what this is, but i know from first look. This is glove of Grior. It give me magic powers when i put it on. I think." She bites her lip and says "Maybe it fits?" She pulls the glove over her right hand, and a bright light shines around the glove, stretching out around Yuliyah's entire body. You stand up and step back from the aura that surrounds your friend as the glove seems to disappear from her hand. She wiggles her fingers, making a fist with her large hand, and then snaps, causing the aura to fade away. She stands to her feet and you realize that she's different. Her hair seems longer. Her breasts larger and firmer. And her whole body seems... larger! She seems to be almost a foot taller, barely being able to stand up tall without hitting her head on the ceiling of the dorm room! Her voice, powerful and deep but still undoubtedly sexy speaks down to you and says "I FEEL STRANGE. BIGGER! AND TINGLY." She moves her body all around, trying to get used to the feeling of being even LARGER. She smiles at you and says "DON'T BE SCARED, I WON'T HURT YOU. EVEN THOUGH YOU LOOK AS YOU ARE SO MUCH SMALLER NOW!"

She goes back into her thoughts and says "GRIOR WAS GIANTESS BY MAGIC. SHE CHANGED HER SIZE, SO MAYBE I CAN CHANGE SIZE OF THINGS TOO." Without an ounce of effort, she points her powerful finger at her desk and stares in wide-eyed wonder when it turns into a piece of doll furniture before the two of you. "IT WORKED! IT IS SO TINY NOW! I CAN SHRINK THINGS!" She walks slowly over to you and gives you another hug. You are shoved face first into her humongous bossum as she says to herself "I HAVE POWERS OF THE GODDESS, I CAN MAKE ANYTHING ANY SIZE!" You realize what she's thinking and look up at her glorious face. She smirks proudly and says "HMMM... MAYBE EVEN YOU?" You stand there stunned as Yuliyah puckers her lips together into a kiss and points her finger at you saying "TIME TO GET SMALLER, LITTLE FRIEND!" You watch her already imposing body rise further and further into the sky, until you finally stop shrinking when you are...
154231.title: The Powers of a Goddess

Makes your body go stiff... you really are just a doll now!
Makes you fall in love with her... you are her mindless servant!
1542311.content: The blonde giantess's booming laughter surrounds you as you readjust your sight and find yourself staring at her ankles. You slowly pan up to see Yuliyah's giant form standing with her hands on her hips saying "HA! LOOK AT YOU NOW, FRIEND! YOU ARE SIZE OF LITTLE TOY!" You stand in awe, waiting to see what Yuliyah will do to you at this size, but you don't have to wait long. Her massive bare foot comes sailing towards you and gently knocks you over onto your back. You try to get up but the huge sole comes crashing down on your tiny body, covering you with her giant foot. You are unable to move, helpless between the thick strands of the carpet and the sweaty feet of your Russian friend. "SO CUTE DOWN AT MY FOOT. JUST A SMALL LITTLE MOUSE MAN SMALLER THAN MY FINGER! I LOVE SEEING YOU SHRUNK!" She's not applying enough pressure to crush you, but it's definitely uncomfortable and at the very least humiliating being reduced to this size and stuck under your pretty friend's body, with her toes wiggling above your face. Her littlest toe is about the size of your head! The pressure is suddenly lifted off of you as Yuliyah takes a step back. You see her huge body crouch down as she continues smiling and giggling at your tiny presence. "LET ME PICK YOU UP AND PLAY WITH YOU, MY NEW DOLL!" She reaches down and wraps her massive fingers around you, effortlessly lifting you up into the sky. You come to rest just before her big blue eyes which narrow to get a better focus on you. "YOU ARE PERFECT THAT SMALL. YOU ARE STILL FRIEND TO ME, BUT NOW ADORABLE DOLL OF A FRIEND! I PROMISE YOU WILL LIKE BEING WITH ME LIKE THIS." Her massive fingertips rub against your body, fondling you all over. Her thumb makes it's way to your privates and you try in vain to get her to stop. The giant girl giggles as you try to push her massive finger away from your crotch, and brushes the hair out of her face with her free hand. You feel the hand grip you just a little tighter and you are pushed in front of her massive mouth. Yuliyah licks her lips and puckers up, pushing you into the two wet folds of flesh covered in bright red lipstick. She smacks the lips apart and you find yourself tingling all over. You think it may be the lipstick and try to wipe your face off, but your efforts are noticed by Yuliyah who begins to laugh through her teeth. "I KNOW YOU FEEL TINGLE ALL OVER YOUR BODY. IT'S NOT THE LIPSTICK, IT IS A POWER OF MINE. MY KISSES, THEY HAVE MAGIC EFFECTS ON YOU, LITTLE FRIEND." As you feel the energy rushing through you, you sit in her palm and wait for the "effects" to take over. Looking up at your now giant friend, you know that her magic kiss...

choices: "I MAKE SCHOOL TINY. TURN ALL THE PEOPLE INTO BUGS."

1542312.content:
You stare in awe at your friend who is now rising into the air like a skyscraper. You start to get worried as you pass her shins, wondering when, if at all, you were going to stop getting smaller. When you finally stop feeling like the world is expanding around you, you come face to face with a huge wall of pink flesh. You walk over to inspect the wall, touching it slightly with your hand. A rumbling noise fills the air as the mass of pink in front of you starts to move up and down , striking the ground with slight taps. That's when you hear words boom down onto your tiny body. "HA LITTLE FRIEND. THAT TICKLES MY TOE!" Oh my god... this is nothing but Yuliyah's toe? You slowly crane your neck up and see a true goddess staring back at you. She is bent on one knee to better see you, and she is staring at you with pure glee. As she brushes some of her now much longer blonde hair out of her face, she says "IF I WERE TRUE GODDESS, I WOULD ASK YOU WORSHIP MY TOE! BUT SINCE WE ARE FRIENDS, YOU JUST GIVE IT SMALL KISS, YA?" You are almost too startled to move, but almost out of instinct, you put your lips against the salty flesh of the amazon's toe, and she giggles again, one more time filling your ears with the giant girl's laughter.

"HAHA, YOU ARE SO CUTE, LIKE BUG BETWEEN MY TOES!!" The smell of Yuliah's feet all around you is intoxicating, and you scream up at her to make you bigger. "WHAT IS THAT? I CAN'T HEAR. YOU'RE TOO SMALL. HOLD ON, I FIX THIS." Yuliyah points at your tiny body and you feel your vision rising again. You sigh in relief as you step off her shrinking toe, but it is short lived as you realize that she's only made you about a foot tall. "Yuliyah, c'mon! Make me big again, please?" She just laughs and rubs her huge foot all over you saying "NO, IT BETTER LIKE THIS, YOU STILL CUTE, BUT NOW I HEAR YOUR LITTLE VOICE!" You just sigh and take it, realizing that she has an unbelievable amount of power over you. She laughs for a bit and looks back at the box. "THANKS TO THIS, I AM SO POWERFUL. LIKE LIVING GODDESS." Her smile fades away as she continues to play with the gem in her hands. "I CAN DO WHATEVER I WANT WITH THIS POWER. I CAN MAKE PEOPLE AND THINGS BIG OR TINY. LET'S SEE GIRLS AT STUPID SCHOOL SAY HURTING THINGS NOW, WHEN I MAKE THEM SMALL." You realize that she has very bad intentions for the rest of the school now that she has the power to shrink them all anytime she wants. She could literally turn the entire campus into her dollhouse if she wanted to. She was taunted practically her whole life for being too tall, but she's never done anything about it. She's just stood there and taken it like a large blonde punching bag. But now that she has her newfound power, you shudder to think of what she's going to do to those girls once she gets close enough to turn them into bugs.

"THEY ALL MAKE FUN OF ME. CALL ME FREAK. I SHOW THEM." With a determined look on her face, Yuliyah grabs her purse and wraps it around her. She smiles and bends over to pick you up, holding you under your armpits with both hands. You feel your body get smaller as she switches you over to one hand, wrapping her fingers around your now 6 inch body. "WE GO OUTSIDE NOW. YOU WILL STAY IN POCKET BOOK WHILE I TAKE CARE OF THEM." She deposits you into her bag, and you land hard on her makeup case. It's a good thing she kept her bag organized, or you'd have pens and loose change flying towards you, possibly strong enough to kill you! "Yuliyah please! Make me normal and we can think this through! You don't want to hurt anyone!" She looks at you puzzled and says "I DON'T? NO. I DO. I WANT THEM TO FEEL UNIMPORTANT. FEEL DIFFERENT. THEY TREAT ME LIKE MONSTER EVERY DAY, SO MAYBE IT'S TIME I GAVE THEM BIG SCARE!"
1542312.title: A Vengeful Giantess

Just 2 inches high!  (The people inside are nearly microscopic!)
15423121.content:
Yuliyah's grin was remarkable as she closed up the bag, sealing you in. She patted the outside, causing you to bounce a bit in the bag, before heading out the door. She passed by several dorm rooms just filled with people who she despised. These pretty, perfect little women with their attitudes and harsh words would soon feel the wrath of a real-life goddess. You felt the bag shake as another giant accidentally bumped into Yuliyah. While the Russian girl apologized, the other girl was not feeling so generous. "UGH... WATCH WHERE YOU'RE GOING, YOU BIG BITCH!" You could feel Yuliyah shaking with rage as she said softly "HEHE... YOU CALLED ME BIG?" You don't know what happened after that, but you could have sworn you heard a high pitched scream, followed by the deep brooding laughter of the Russian behemoth. She walked for another few minutes, before the bag you're in finally comes to rest. Yuliyah opens the top and reaches in with two fingers, pulling you out gently. She lays her hand flat and lets you get comfortable in her hand before you finally ask "What did you do to that other girl? The one who you bumped into and she called you a bitch?" With an almost evil smirk, Yuliyah says "YOU WANT TO SEE HER? I SHOW YOU HER." With her free hand, Yuliyah reaches down to her foot and takes off one of her open toed sandals. She fidgets around on her foot for a few seconds before saying "AHAH. HERE SHE IS." She produces a bright red toe ring, but the jewel seems to be moving... on the inside of the centerpiece of Yuliyah's toe ring was a figure of a girl pounding hopelessly against the clear walls of her prison. She had actually been trapped inside of a piece of jewelry attached to the foreign girl's long, slender foot!

Yuliyah taps on the gem with a free finger and says "MAYBE NOW YOU LEARN TO TREAT OTHERS WITH RESPECT, HMM?" The girl screams and cries that she is sorry, but your friend just laughs as she places the tiny girl back onto her smelly toe. When she stands back up to her full height, Yuliyah says "NOW. HOW BIG SHOULD I MAKE THIS STUPID SCHOOL? SHOULD I MAKE IT THE SIZE OF A DOLLHOUSE TO PLAY WITH BARBIE SIZED GIRL? OR MAYBE I MAKE THEM SUPER TINY, JUST SPECKS CRAWLING ON MY BIG BODY? HMMM?" Yuliyah is playfully biting her finger, you can tell she's having a lot of fun picturing the demise of the entire student body. You are about to speak up to her when she looks down at you with a wicked grin, saying "IT LOOKS LIKE I WILL HAVE TO TEST SIZES. LET'S SEE HOW THE PEOPLE WILL LOOK AT SIZE OF DOLLS..." She points her index finger at you and you feel your body getting slightly larger. Her fingers grip tightly around you and you stop growing at about 8 inches tall. Yuliyah wastes no time experimenting with your tiny body, using her fingers to poke and prod at your little form. "HMMM... I COULD DEFINITELY TOY AROUND WITH THEM LIKE THIS. ESPECIALLY THE GIRLS. I COULD FONDLE AND KISS THEM AND THEY WOULD BE TOO TINY TO STOP ME." To prove her point, she brings her fist up to her mouth, and gives your exposed head a huge kiss, covering your entire forehead in her wet skin and lipstick. She pulls you away from her and says "BUT THEN AGAIN..." She points at you again, this time causing you to shrink even smaller than you were before. She balances her hand as she shrinks you, causing you to land on the fingertip of her pinkie. The skin around you continues to expand and you are left on a peach colored wasteland. The ground is wet with her natural oils and sweat, and when you look up, you can not see anything but her humongous eye staring down at you. Her giggle shakes you to the core and you drop to your knees as your goddess speaks down to you. "IF THEY WERE THIS SMALL, I COULD KEEP THEM ALL IN MY HAND. I COULD CRUSH THEM IN ACCIDENT BY CLOSING MY FINGERS TOGETHER. THEY WOULD BE SO TINY, I COULDN'T EVEN BARELY SEE THEM WITHOUT SOMETHING LIKE MICROSCOPE! I WOULD FEEL SO POWERFUL WITH THE WHOLE SCHOOL SHRUNK TO BITS OF DUST..."

Yuliyah's fingertip starts to shrink beneath you, and you sigh in happiness that the ordeal of being the size of a dust particle is over for now. She stops growing you at a little more than 2 inches tall, trapping your small body between her thumb and forefinger before bringing it back up to her huge face. "THAT WAS VERY HELPFUL, LITTLE FRIEND. I WILL REWARD FOR THIS LATER." She kisses her fingertip of her free hand, and brings it to your head, rubbing it softly. It wasn't a real kiss, but it was still appreciated. Yuliyah places you in her shirt pocket, allowing you to hang on to the edge to see what she's about to do. She concentrates on the school, and points her finger at it. You are amazed to watch as the entire structure of the school, not only with the buildings and towers contained within, but also the trees and grass surrounding it, shrinks very quickly. Yuliyah is slowly decreasing concentration, smiling at her handiwork. WIthin a few minutes, the entire school is gone. The trees, the bushes, everything. The ground it stood on is just an open field of dirt. Yuliyah grabs her bag and slowly walks to the center of the dirt field. Occasionally you would pass a person who saw Yuliyah point at the building before it shrunk, but before they could run away or confront her, the busty Russian girl had pointed at them as well, shrinking them down to bugs at her feet. Watching her become this powerful goddess, intent on smiting all who stand in her way, was nothing short of exhilirating. You felt bad for the people who were hurt, but you were becoming more and more anamored with this girl as she continued to descend into madness. You couldn't explain it, but you loved seeing her turn people into shrunken little things. Yuliyah had finally made it to the center of the field, and gazed down at her handiwork. "PERFECT. IT IS JUST RIGHT SIZE FOR ME NOW." You stare down from the goddess's shirt pocket and see just how small she's made the entire campus:

15423122.content:
YULIYAH GROWS

She closes up her bag halfway, leaving you in relative darkness. You are tossed and turned as she walks to the school, intent on crushing it under her powerful feet. You realize there's nothing you can do until she stops moving, so you just bide your time in her purse. When she stops moving for a few seconds, you climb into one of the other pouches closer to the opening of the bag. You think to yourself that if you can only see what's going on, you can probably stop her at the right moment. After a few more minutes, the goddess stops moving and you hear her talk. "THIS ENDS HERE. NOBODY CAN MAKE ME FEEL SMALL AGAIN. TIME FOR STUPID, HURTFUL PEOPLE TO FEEL SMALL NOW." You take the opportunity to climb to the very top of her bag and peer out over the opening. You are just small enough to fit over the edge without alerting her of your position. Which is helpful because you realize to your horror that you seem to be rising into the air. Yuliyah has made herself hundreds of feet tall, with you in tow, and stomps her huge body closer to the now toy sized school. She reaches into her pockets and pulls out a small roll of scotch tape. Her snickers fill the air as she bends down and tapes the doors of the school shut, making sure that nobody can escape. She hears a few students scream as the sticky substance coats the doors and some of the windows of the school and she says "THEY FEAR ME NOW? WAIT UNTIL THEY SEE ME BIGGER." She crouches down and without looking at what she's doing, drops the humongous tape roll into her bag, almost knocking you off your perch as she does it. "KNOCK KNOCK, LITTLE ONES!" You hear the goddess laugh to herself as her powerful hands rip open the roof of the school in several parts. She leans over the campus like a vengeful goddess staring down at the world and smiles as she sees the fear in everyone's eyes. "WELL WELL, YOU ARE ALL LIKE ANTS TO ME. I AM YOUR GODDESS NOW! GODDESS YULIYAH. YOU WORSHIP ME?" A few students dropped to their knees in fear as the giant russian girl gazes down at them. Some people have tried to flee the school, only to find a sticky wall blocking their exit. Yuliyah laughs as she sees a few students sticking to the tape from inside the school, before turning her attention back to the worshippers on the ground. "I HAVE NAMES FOR YOU. REBECCA CORNWELL. STEPHANIE MAJORS. BRENDA GATES. YOU WILL BRING THEM TO ME, OR I CRUSH SCHOOL BETWEEN MY TOES." She removes her feet from her shoes and wiggles her toes over the student body, causing more than a few shreiks to escape as people begin searching the halls for the three girls she's listed.

Yuliyah hums to herself as she continues to torment the miniscule student body. "HOW YOU DOING WITH THAT? WHERE ARE THE GIRLS I ASK FOR?" One of the girls climbs up on a desk and drops to her knees. Yuliyah catches this and reaches in to grab her between her huge fingertips. "AH, BRENDA! SO GOOD OF YOU TO SHOW YOURSELF. YOU ALWAYS TEASE ME, CALL ME NAMES IN HALLWAY. NOW I CALL YOU A NAME. YOU ARE TINY, WORTHLESS BUG. BUT I HAVE PLANS FOR YOU, SO YOU COME INTO MY BAG NOW!" The two huge fingers drop the tiny girl into the giant purse along with you, and you hear her similarly sized body strike the bottom of the bag. You can hear her crying up at the giant girl, but it's doing her no good. "NOW WHERE ARE OTHERS?" Two boys from the varsity football team come through the crowd of panicky people, holding onto two blonde cheerleaders. You figure these must be the girls as the boys scream up at Yuliyah, "We've got the two girls you wanted, Goddess Yuliyah! Please don't hurt us!" Yuliyah laughs and reaches down with one hand, scooping up not only the two girls she was looking for, but also the two boys who captured them. She opens her palm up and reveals her huge face to the four shivering figures in her hand. The two girls hold onto each other for comfort, crying into each other's shoulders. The two boys just stare up speechless. "THANK YOU BOYS, YOU ARE MOST HELPFUL. YOU WANT REWARD FOR GOOD JOB?" The boys look at each other and then smile up at the giant blonde beauty saying "Oh yes! Thank you, goddess!" The fingers of Yuliyah's free hand comes up to grab the two screaming girls, and plucks them from her huge palm. She then looks at the two boys standing up proudly, waiting for their reward and she says "YOU THINK YULIYAH IS BEAUTIFUL? YOU LIKE GIRLS WHEN THEY ARE BIG?" The boys let their lust get the best of them and nod up and down. Yuliyah smiles and says "GOOD. THEN YOU LOVE THIS." The places the palm back into the school and lets the boys slide off onto the floor. The boys stare up as Yuliyah rises to her full height and points down at the two of them. From your perspective, the boys look up at the giant russian goddess, then bend over in pain, and then seem to disappear from your sight. A crowd of girls seems to step around the space they were at and one of them bends down to pick something up. Yuliyah laughs loudly and booms down at them "NOW YOU ARE TINY! AND EVERY GIRL YOU SEE IS BIG! MAYBE THEY TREAT YOU LIKE BUGS YOU ARE AND CRUSH YOU!" You don't have to look down to know that this is exactly what's going to happen... a lot of the girls who surrounded their tiny bodies were cheerleaders themselves, and you can bet they were going to punish the two shrunken rats for getting their friends captured.

"THAT REMINDS ME. YOU GIRLS GO IN PURSE, I HAVE TO TAKE CARE OF REST OF SCHOOL." She swiftly drops the two tiny girls into her purse along with the other girl who's been crying her eyes out at the bottom of the bag. You look up at the confident, powerful blonde who's got the school right where she wants it, and can't help but be turned on. You are becoming more and more interested in watching her treat the tiny students like bugs, completely bending them to her whim. You feel bad for the people, but you don't want Yuliyah to stop. She's a beautiful force of nature. And just as you were having that thought, you realized what was coming next. One of the girls at the bottom of the bag stopped crying enough to say "I... I feel all tingly!" And you felt it too... Yuliyah was growing again. This time she was nothing short of awe inspiring as you looked down. The gigantic russian took off her other shoe to expose both feet, and let the discarded footwear come crashing down onto the earth below. She had made herself so large, that she could now cover the entire campus with just her big toe. She placed her hands on her hips, leaving one hand just above your miniscule body on her bag. She looked down and said "YOU ALL STOOD BACK AND LET ME GET PICKED ON. YOU ALL MADE ME TO BE BIG FREAK. YOU MADE FUN OF ME! WELL FROM WHERE I AM, YOU ARE FREAKS NOW! JUST LITTLE SPECKS UNDER MY TOE. GOODBYE, SPECKS!" You knew several hundred lives hung in the balance, and you needed to act fast. You know that she would only listen to you, her friend, if you wanted her to stop her violent rampage. But the big question is... do you want her to stop?

You climb to the top of the bag and using all your might, manage to move the zipper just a few centimeters. It's not a lot, but it's just enough to poke your head out and see Yuliyah standing tall in front of her worst enemies. Three cheerleaders who were all standing in line formation with their arms crossed and a look of disgust on their face. The head cheerleader walked right up to Yuliyah's face and said "NOBODY LIKES YOU, YOU FREAK. GET THE HELL AWAY FROM US." Yuliyah just laughs and says "YOU ARE FUNNY. THINKING YOU CAN BOSS ME AROUND. YOU ARE SO SMALL." One of the girls on the right says "EVERYBODY LOOKS SMALL COMPARED TO YOU, YOU WEIRDO." Yuliyah gets more serious and says to the girl standing defiantly in her face "I WILL GIVE YOU ONE CHANCE. SAY YOU'RE SORRY TO ME AND NOTHING WILL HAPPEN TO YOU OR YOUR FRIENDS." The girls stifle a giggle before eventually breakiing down to full on laughter. "YOU... YOU THINK YOU CAN TELL US TO SAY SORRY? GET REAL, FREAKAZOID. YOU'RE A LOSER AND WE'RE GOING TO LET YOU KNOW IT." You can see from your position on the bag that Yuliyah's eyes are starting to glow red and a wicked smile crosses her lips. "YOU WERE WARNED. NOW YOU WILL BE TINY DOLLS FOR ME!" The girls start to slowly get shorter and small high pitched screams escape their lips as each of them sinks lower and lower into the grass at their feet. At least one of the girls is on her knees begging Yuliyah to stop, but your tall Russian friend is having none of it as she continues to make the girls smaller and smaller. "SHRINK! SHRINK SMALLER AND SMALLER, DOWN TO SIZE OF MICE AT MY FEET!" The glowing continues until the girls are reduced to nothing but toys in the grass. None of them are tall enough to see over the overgrown blades, and all three girls huddle together crying at their current situation. Yuliyah laughs satisfied at her work, and slowly stomps over to the shrunken girls in the field. The trio of 3 inch tall cheerleaders are too petrified by your friend's massive body that they don't even try to run away. With every step the girls get more and more scared, wondering what this gigantic blonde monster is going to do with her newly minimized rivals. Yuliyah stands up tall with her hands on her hips and booms down at the terrified cheerleaders "NOW THEN. WHAT SHOULD BE DONE WITH MY NEW DOLLS FIRST?"
15423123.title: "I FIND GIRLS WHO MAKE FUN OF ME.  MAKE THE...

154231232.content:
As soon as Yuliyah is in range she bends over and scoops all three cheerleaders into her massive palm and stares down at them with an evil grin "YOU WILL MAKE GREAT SLAVES FOR ME" she says inspecting her new pets "USELESS FOR ANYTHING ELSE" Yuliyah states bluntly. Concluding her decision she nods and unzips the bag making you fall back into the depths of her purse, you then realize that in all her rage Yuliyah has probably forgotten about you and is about to dump the three equally sized cheerleaders into he bag. Normally them being your same height of six inches woulden't be much of a problem however they are as tall as you and they work out while you don't making them already stronger than you, combining that with the fact that there's three cheerleaders that are all stronger than you and that are all scared and angry means that you need to hide quickly so they don't find you and potentially beat you up. Diving into a pencil case you tuck yourself down just as the cheerleaders are dumped in, you then feel the bag moving back and forth suggesting that Yuliyah is now walking back to her apartment room.

"Damnit! What does that freak think she is bossing us around and kidnapping us?" yells what you make out to he the head of the cheer squad "Cool it Jay, you're gonna get us killed that way!" responds the second cheerleader the third still on her knees crying. "If we're going to survive we need to find a way out of here..." the second cheerleader says looking around the purse "Pencils, we could make a knife out of them and cut our way out!" she exclaims, this is bad news for you however as you are in the pencil case. Do the cheerleaders find you?
154231232.title: In the purse

1542312321.content:
You tuck yourself in further into the pencil case but the second cheerleader hears a noise "Hello?" she asks into the dark, you hold your breath hoping she wont see or hear you but it's too late "Whatever that was I'm finding out!" she says creeping closer to the pencil bag. Suddenly she peeks into the bag and instantly spots you "What the hell are you doing in here?" you just stay silent "Get out here or I'm making you get out here!" she warns, you just nod and creep back further, "That's it! You're coming with me you little rodent!" she yells grabbing onto your arm, her grip is strong but feeling that she's not making enough progress the cheerleader twists your arm, the pain forces you to stop resisting and soon enough you're out of the bag in the middle of three cheerleaders looking down at you. Suddenly the head of the cheer squad, Jay standa up get seems to have gotten an idea "Strip down right now!" she demands "Wait what?" you ask back "Strip or we're pummeling you!" not wanting to get hurt any further you strip into your boxers andnare suprised to see her doing the same.

"Alright put these on." she says handing you her cheerleader uniform, you stare at her in utter confusion but she just glares at you and shoves it into your hands, once the uniform is on she takes your clothes and puts them on. "Perfect, now as far as thst tall freak is concerned, I'm the good little pet and you're the slave." she says with a chuckle looking at you, "Jay, wait, what about us?" the second cheerleader asks looking up at Jay, "Better luck next time." she coldly says slinking into the shadows to escape capture. All you can do is exchanged equally terrified looks with the other two cheerleaders as the bag is set down and the top is unzipped, "HELLO AGAIN YOU WORTHLESS LITTLE BUGS." Yuliyah says looking down into the bag with disgust, "SPEAKING OF BUGS I DON'T THINK YOU THREE ARE FINISHED GETTING SMALLER." Yuliyah bellows as she scoops up the three of you into her palm. Grinning from ear to ear the russian giantess stares down at the three of you while you shrink to just two inches each, "PERFECT, NOW FOR YOUR FIRST JOB AS MY NEW TOYS YOU CAN-"
1542312321.title: Yuliyah's new slaves

154232.content:
Name - Alyson Umelitz

Appearance - 24 years old. A 5'5 fat punk girl. Cute round face with brown eyes, and straight brown hair dyed purple in highlights. Wearing a purple top with black leggings and converse sneakers. She constantly wears dark mascara under her eyes and black nail polish, but other than that she doesn't let the punk rock chick look take over her body too much.

Personality - Alyson is very bubbly and excitable and obsessive over small things. She has a collection of miniatures in her room, and they look even smaller when in the middle of her chubby hands. She is always trying to be cheery and happy but whenever things don't go her way, she has a tendency to break down and throw fits. She is very emotional and her attitude on something can change on a dime.

Relationship: You met Aly when you worked an office job a few years ago and she worked as secretery. You two hit it off right away talking about music and shows you've been to. You were going to ask her out but it seemed like she'd always been with someone else. Lives with her roommate Jessica who has been working on a "secret project" since she started graduate school. You don't know what it is, but she's extremely happy about it.
154232.title: Maybe Allyson?

choices: "GET BACK HERE SOON, WE HAVE TO CHANGE HIM BACK!" With a very concerned look.
"JUST LIKE I HOPED... HE FELL FOR IT." With a sly, evil grin
1542321.content:
You made it to Aly's apartment and knocked on the door. You didn't hear an answer but the door opened slightly. You decided to just walk in without being invited, and walked towards the center of the living room. "Hello?" You call out, but don't get an answer. Why would she invite you over if she wasn't going to be home herself? You sat down on the couch, looking at all the posters on Aly's wall. Operation Ivy, Bad Brains, and Black Flag posters everywhere take you back to why you started to like Aly in the first place. When you were working that dead end job downtown, she was the receptionist. She looked pretty cute with her brown hair highlighted with purple strands running down the side, her small lip ring and faded black nail polish. She was very cheery, had a great laugh and she was not skinny at all which you kind of liked. You're not a chubby chaser by every sense of the word, but she definitely had a very cute charm about her weight. You wouldn't have paid her much mind until you noticed her Fugazi logo on her laptop case. You both got to talking about music and maybe it was just an office crush but, you began to have feelings for her. You never picked the right moment to ask her out and she kept getting involved with these douchebag guys who just seemed to come in contact with her once and then disappear almost overnight. You were often there to comfort her after she broke up with them, and she appreciated it. She was very emotional and when things didn't go her way she was almost a complete wreck. But when she was her normal bubbly self, it made up for it.

You text her, saying that you're Sitting around her room was getting boring so you started walking around. Glancing at her DVD's, her books, stuff like that. In one corner of the room was a big glass case. Looking inside you saw shelf upon shelf filled with tiny miniatures. Characters from disney, superheros, and a few that were handmade. She had a huge collection of the small figures and you were pretty impressed by it. She had been talking about it a few times, but seeing it in person was pretty awesome. Next to the case, however, was something that looked almost like a supersoaker or a nerf gun. It had a glowing chamber by the handle and a switch that had the option of either "+" or "-" with a dial in the middle that digitally read out a percentage. While handling the gun, you clumsily dropped it, causing it to shoot out a bright blue light that engulfed your whole body. The flash of light disappeared and you looked up and down at your body. You appeared to be unharmed. That was until you looked up. The couch you were sitting on just a minute ago was now enormous. The first shelf of the miniatures collection was on a perch that you were too high to reach. And just to drive the point home, a humongous converse sneaker was next to you, easily several times your size. You had been shrink by that gun! You couldn't have been more than five inches tall, at the MOST! The sneaker was tipped over, with the opening facing you and your miniscule body. The smell of Aly's plump feet washed over you and you began to feel a bit... funny. You weren't disgusted by the smell, it actually felt somewhat sweet. You had felt feelings for women's feet before, and in your younger years, some girls had caught you sneaking glimpses of them removing their shoes or wiggling their toes in open sandals. You never turned into one of those shoe sniffing pervs or anything, but you still felt a certain... happiness when you smelled a woman's feet.

Before you could self-analyze your fetish any more, you heard a huge clicking sound as the doorknob to the apartment opened. From what seemed like miles away stepped Aly into the room with her work clothes on. You were mesmerized by how gigantic she was and how easily she strode across the terrain of her carpet. She kicked off her shoes, exposing her soft, sweaty nylons to the ground. With each step, a small earthquake shook you to the core. "HELLO? ANYBODY HERE? I LEFT THE DOOR OPEN FOR YOU, I WAS JUST NEXT DOOR..." The chubby giantess reaches into her gigantic bag and grabs her phone. She drops the humongous carrier to the ground and sits on the couch, checking her texts. "WEIRD... HE SAID HE WAS HERE... HE MUST BE COMING BACK SOON." That's when you get the idea to use your phone! You don't know if it would work at this size but it would at least be worth a try. You check your pockets frantically for the phone, but a loud buzzing from above you confirms your fears. Aly notices your phone and walks over towards where you shrunk. You hide behind the leg of the coffee table as the huge punk girl comes barelling towards you. "WHY IS HIS PHONE HERE NEAR MY COLLECTION AND THE... THE GUN!!" She knew about the gun? Of course she knew about the gun! Why else would it be in her room unless she knew about it! She had been talking for weeks about her roommate working on a "super secret project" with some school officials. That must have been it! You sigh in relief that it was actually a success, but you're snapped back to reality when the nylon covered foot of Aly stomps one step closer to you. Aly immediately grabs her mouth and says "OHMYGOD... OHMYGOD... THE GUN'S ON THE GROUND... HE MUST HAVE ACCIDENTALLY USED IT AND... IT SHRUNK HIM! OH GOD, I HAVE TO BE CAREFUL, I COULD STEP ON HIM! HELLO? LITTLE MAN? ARE YOU IN HERE?" She looked at the settings and said "OKAY, ACCORDING TO THIS, IF YOU'RE IN THE ROOM YOU SHOULD ONLY BE ABOUT FIVE INCHES TALL. SO HERE'S WHAT I WANT YOU TO DO... I KNOW THIS IS WEIRD BUT..."

She slowly walks over to the couch again, carefully checking to make sure her footsteps don't end your tiny life. When she's seated she takes off her nylons, exposing her bare feet. She places the feet down on the ground, rubbing them a second before saying "I... I WANT YOU TO COME OVER TO WHERE I'M SITTING AND TAP ME ON THE FOOT. I WON'T MOVE SO I WON'T CRUSH YOU, AND YOU KNOW THAT I'LL BE LOOKING FOR YOU IN THIS EXACT SPOT... THAT MAKES SENSE, RIGHT?" You half heartedly agree, knowing that you'll have to trek back to the couch at your tiny size, but take off running anyway. WHile you make your was across the landscape of her floor, you are amazed by how much different the world looks from down at the size of an action figure. You see dust in places where nobody could possibly see crevices, cracks and nicks in furniture is much more apparent, but the most noticable thing is the scent of feet all around you. When you were clear of the converse, you passed by the nylons, and then when you were just at the last leg of the endtable, you got a big whiff of Aly's feet. You ran at top speed towards the chubby girl's foot, while she frantically called her roommate trying to get her to come home and help her. When you finally reached your goal, you stepped right up to it, gazing at the beautiful dark nail polish decorating each toe. With all your might, you pounded against the soft flesh of her large, fatty foot, hoping for some kind of reaction. What you got was the sight of the gigantic girl looking down at you, with a sudden look of realization and shock. Her stomach and breasts formed hills on the way to her face, but her eyes told a story of utter excitement. "JESS! I FOUND HIM! HE MADE HIS WAY TO MY FOOT! OH MY GOD, HE'S SO TEENY!!" and before she hung up she said with a very telling expression on her face...
1542321.title: Alyson, the Chubby Punk Girl

1542322.content:
Name - Rebecca Anderson

Appearance - 26 years old. 5'7 skinny black girl. Short black hair and thick glasses covering her dark brown eyes. In shape with long legs but still incredibly skinny. Always seen at work, so usually wearing a bright white lab coat with a thin black shirt underneath. She also wears a combination of tight blue jeans and open toed heels.

Personality - Very stearn, very dedicated to her work. She is the leading microbiologist in the state, and has pretty much devoted her life to what she finds under a microscope. You barely see her anymore because of all the time she spends in the lab, working for hours on her newest "breakthrough". She is very quiet and rarely talks about anything but schoolwork. When she does talk about other things, it's never about herself.

History - You were assigned her as a tutor and you two have had a very strange relationship. You became casual friends through the years working together on several projects together. Even after she graduated, you got to see her when she immediately got an entry level teaching position at the laboratory on campus. You one time got the courage to ask her out and she shot you down flat, responding simply that she "doesn't trust men." You know she must have had a dark past, but she won't let you in on it.
1542322.title: Rebecca then?

15423221.content:
You make your way over to the science lab and knock on the door. Rebecca answers, but doesn't really acknowledge you much. Just kind of a half smirk as she says "Great. You're here. Come with me?" Yeah... Hi? You guess? Things have been weird with Rebecca lately. She's lost a lot of weight (not that she had a ton to begin with), and she's been working nonstop in this laboratory. Rebecca was a pretty cute black girl with shoulder length black hair that looked knotted and frayed, like she hadn't cared for it in weeks. She was pretty thin but had long legs to make up for it and a pretty shapely rear end. You tried not to stare at her too long, you knew she wasn't interested in you. Not that you hadn't asked her out, but she shut you down pretty quickly. You follow her into the back office of the lab, glancing at all the equipment she has set up. Bunsen burners, beakers, a whole series of Microscopes, and a chalkboard filled to the brim with white scribblings and equations. Just looking at it gave you a bit of a headache and you decided to leave the math to the professionals. Rebecca was without a doubt the smartest person you've ever met in your entire life. She was assigned to you as a tutor when you couldn't pass math to save your ass, and the two of you struck up a casual friendship. You'd occasionally see each other in the halls, text each other during episodes of the Walking Dead, things like that. But over the past few months you've seen less and less of her. She stopped texting you altogether and the only times she sees you are when you have to stop her to try and make eye contact. She got a teaching job earlier in the year and she only has class two days out of the week. The rest of her time is spent slaving away on her experiment in the other room, which she was very "hush hush" about. She's only told you two things about it over the past few months: It's going to revolutionize the world, and once it's complete, she needs to show it to you first. You guess this is pretty much it as you walk into her office and she sits at the desk. She's only a few years older than you, so it's odd seeing her in such an authoritative position. You sit in the chair and look around aimlessly like a child that's been sent to detention and she lets out an exaggerated cough to get your attention. "Now. I promised I'd show you my greatest invention when it was finished, and I'm happy to say it's finally complete." Great! Maybe now she can actually start enjoying life. She reaches for a pen and says "Do me a favor and help me out with a few things. Exactly how tall are you?" You respond that you're 5'10 and she writes it out. "How much do you weight?" You guess somewhere around 200 but probably less. She smirks as she records the measurements. She goes on for a few minutes, asking what your diet is like, how much alcohol and cigarettes you drink, it's all very surreal. Almost like she's playing doctor and forgetting to skip over the insurance information or something. She takes off her thick glasses and says "Okay, now this next question is going to seem a little out of the ordinary." Not that being asked your measurements by a friend is any less unsettling than whatever you expected to follow. Rebecca raises the pen, playing with it in her hands a bit and finally lets out "Do you have a problem with needles?"

Before you can answer, she reaches into her desk and pulls out a huge syringe. It's half filled with a glowing green liquid that seems to be bubbling a bit. You start to get worried but before you can move, Rebecca pushes a button under the table. In a flash a steel restraint pops onto your arm from inside the chair you're sitting on. Another follows suit with your other forearm, leaving you unable to escape. Rebecca smiles and slowly rises, walking over to you with a look of supreme confidence. You struggle to move from the chair but the restraints are too tight. You can barely move at all! "Becca, C'mon just... what is this? Let me go! Please!" She just continues smiling and sits on your lap. With a whisper she says "You're about to find out what i've been working on this whole time. Just like I promised. And trust me when I say, you're in for a great... BIG... surprise." And with that she plunges the needle into your arm, pushing down on the plunger. You watch in pain as the green liquid is pushed into your veins. Your vision goes blurry for a few seconds as Rebecca takes the needle out, depositing it in the garbage behind her. From your perspective, the world looks like it's shaking for a few seconds and you hear Rebecca say "HOOOOW'SSS YOUUUURR HEADDDD?" You close your eyes trying not to get sick, and when you reopen them, the world has stopped shaking. Not only that, but you look down and see that you can slide your hands out of the restraints. She must have loosened them. You stand up from the chair, ready to make a dash for the door and forget this ever happened, when you are immediately struck with horror. The girl who did this to you was two inches shorter than you when you walked into the office.

... So why are you looking up at her?

She laughs out loud and stares down at you, defiantly. "YES! The serum is a success! It's just like my hypothesis predicted! You are the first human being to be miniaturized entirely by an outside agent! I am going to OWN this college by the time the day is over!" You are speechless at the sight of your once shorter "friend" now looking an entire head taller than you while standing. Your clothes all around you feel much looser, and you know that she's telling the truth... You really are shrinking! And as you look down, she's added insult to injury by removing her high heel shoes and standing on her bare feet. You look up at her amazonian presence and realize that your head is now level with her breasts. She giggles and says "What? You thought the experiment was just to make you a little bit shorter than me? No, my little lab rat. You are going to be much smaller by the time i'm through with you. And if you do what I say, maybe i'll keep you as a pet." She lowers her now much larger hand to pat you on the head like a child and laughs at your situation. You start to panic as your view shifts yet again and you find yourself staring at her belt! You are shrinking even faster now! Your shirt seems to fall around you as your body slides through the neck hole, while Rebecca looks on in glee. You keep hold of your underpants and turn to flee. You run to the door to try and escape but with each step, you find yourself sinking slower and slower towards the carpet beneath your feet! Your underwear eventually become too much of a hassle to try and keep up and you let them go, running nude towards the door. As you reach it you drop to your knees in despair as you realize that you're too small to reach the handle. Forget turning it, you're not even big enough to jump up and grab the doorknob for any attempt at leaving. You scramble to your feet as you feel tremors getting closer to you, and you see the now massive form of Rebecca looking down and heading towards you. She's put her glasses back on, obviously so that she can see you in greater detail while you shrink.

Her lab coat flows outward with every step she takes, her giant body the vision of an absolute goddess looking down on the earth. She stomps her foot one last time mere feet (by your scale) away from your puny body. Using it as a reference tool, you are terrified by the fact that the pretty brown foot looks larger than you! The toes are wiggling as you hear a massive giggle fill the air. Looking back upwards, you see Rebecca . "WELL. YOUR PROGRESS IS ASTOUNDING. I WAS GOING TO GET YOU SOME DOLL CLOTHES FOR WHEN YOU REACHED THIS STAGE, BUT I THOUGHT THAT WOULD BE DAYS FROM NOW. YOU ARE WAY AHEAD OF SCHEDULE LITTLE ONE, AND THAT IS JUST WONDERFUL." You scream up at her "What the hell do you mean? Why did you make me so small! Make me big again!" She smiles and coldly says "YOUR VOICE IS SO TINY. IT'S LIKE THE SQUEAK OF A MOUSE. WELL I THINK I SHOULD ANSWER THESE QUESTIONS BEFORE YOU GET TOO SMALL FOR ME TO HEAR. I KNEW YOU'D BE THE PERFECT TEST SUBJECT BECAUSE YOU THOUGHT WE WERE FRIENDS. ALL IT TOOK WAS ONE TEXT AFTER FIVE OR SIX MONTHS, AND YOU CAME RUNNING TO SEE ME. SO PATHETIC." You try to take it all in, while watching the foot in front of you rise even higher. Just the ankle of your giant black mistress is now larger than you are. Her foot's red painted nails shine brightly from the ceiling lights and you start to worry that soon enough you won't even be able to see over the top of her big toe. Rebecca sees your panic and stops moving her foot. She commands "YOU'D BETTER CLIMB ON TOP OF MY FOOT NOW. YOU'RE GOING TO GET MUCH SMALLER AND I DON'T WANT TO LOSE YOU WHEN YOU'RE SHRUNK DOWN TO..."
15423221.title: Rebecca, The No-Nonsense Microbiologist.

choices: She runs some test on you
She decides to have some fun
154232211.content:
Your heart sank as she said all this. She really viewed you as nothing more than a guinea pig for her expiraments. And now you were roughly the size of one too.
"You can stop crying, I took extra special measurements of the chemical along with the structure and composition of the human biology compared to that of my other test subjects." Almost right on cue, your shrinking stopped at roughly 4 or so inches. Rebecca grinned and wrote down some notes as she prodded you with one of her gigantic brown toes. Forget the college, with these results, I'll be in charge of government science agencies. And you can say you were there when I made my ascension from this bit job to true greatness."

Finishing her notes, Rebecca placed her equipment down and returned her full focus to you.
154232211.title: "A FEW INCHES TALL!"

15423222.content:
Name: April Jane Florentine

Appearance: 21 Years old, 5'4 brunette. Long wavy hair. Thin body, with a little bit of fat in her thighs and rear, but not too fat on either. Wears large black rimmed glasses and has a nose ring. Kind of tomboyish attire with a loose Black Sabbath t-shirt, tight blue jeans, and converse sneakers. Has her fingernails painted black and always seems to wear studded bracelets and a belt. Very punk rock, but still kind of casual.

Personality: April, or AJ as she likes to be called, was always a lot of fun to be around. She always wanted to try and be one of the boys, so she has kind of a dark sense of humor, a very blunt way of talking to people, and she's open about pretty much everything in her life, which has led to a pretty close friendship with you. She's a huge comic fan, everything from Marvel, to DC, to the graphic novels. She's insanely into cosplay, going to conventions and festivals dressed up like her favorite fictional characters. Her favorites seem to be the ones associated with size changing: Giganta, Elasti-Girl, Bumblebee, and others like that. But she's not exclusionary, her geekiness knows no real bounds.

History: You met AJ while walking around Comic Con in San Diego. She was cosplaying as Janet Pym (The Wasp), and you two started talking comics. She got your number and the two of you started hanging out on the regular. She was really into Game of Thrones, Walking Dead, and Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D., which she would watch with you marathon-like for days on end. She's been begging you to come over, she has a new cosplay that she really wanted to model for you, saying it's "the biggest thing she's ever put together".
15423222.title: AJ Florentine, the Cosplayer

154232221.content:
AJ has been calling you for days and you've never been able to get in contact with her. The phone tag going on between you two is almost getting annoying. She's been trying to get you to come over for days now to see her new cosplay she's been working on. You met AJ at a comic con one year, and since then she's been really interested in showing you every superhero she's been able to dress up as. It started with the Wasp, Janet Pym. She admittedly looked stunning walking around the center with those pretty wings glued to her back and her tight yellow jumpsuit. You had been witness to all of her incredibly elaborate costumes, like her detailed Elastigirl costume. Not the one from The Incredibles, mind you, but the one from Doom Patrol who could changer her size at will. Come to think of it, she really liked to dress up as characters who's powers were changing size. You let it go for a while but finally she called and you realized it had been a few weeks now. You'd put her off as long as possible. So you answer the phone... but first of all, what time is it?

(Added the chapter to allow Allure's story some context)
154232221.title: AJ Wants to Meet Up

choices: A Red, White and Blue ensemble (WONDER WOMAN!)
1542322211.content:
You finally take AJ's call and she says "Dude, have you not been getting my calls? I've been trying to reach you for like... a month!" You roll your eyes at the exaggeration but apologize anyway, saying you're ready to finally see her costume. She responds "Cool. Come on over, this is gonna be awesome!" You make your way to her dorm room on campus and knock on the door. She opens and gives you a big hug, almost jumping completely off her feet to hang off of you. She was a shorter girl, only a little more than 5 feet, but she had a great body. Juicy thighs and a big behind, with a very thin athletic body. If she wasn't so into comic books and guy stuff, you'd think she'd be one of the more popular girls on campus. But she's always been a bit of a tomboy, and it fit her personality. She wipes her long brown hair out of her face and says "Come on in, I've just about got everything together." She walks you to the couch and goes off into the kitchen. She grabs some beers out of her fridge and hands you one in a glass. You both clink cups and take some big sips. She cleans her glasses on her shirt and starts talking about her new costume. "I tried to make it realistic to the comics, with a few modern touches. Everything's up to interpretation but there was one thing that had to be done right, and that's to show how big i was. If i'm playing a size changer, i need to make sure that it gives the impression that i could be a giant." You ask what she means, reiterating that she's only about 5'3 at the most. She laughs and says "Yeah, but everything is about perspective. If i'm close to someone shorter than me, than it would look like I'm pretty tall, right?" You laugh a bit and say "I guess... but how are you going to make yourself look bigger?" She stands up off the couch and steps in front of you with her hands on her hips and says in a very domineering voice "I DON'T KNOW... YOU TELL ME." Her voice seems deeper, louder for some reason! You look down at your hands and realize that the beer bottle seems to be the size of a soda bottle in your grip! And your clothes around you seem to be getting baggier and looser! Before you can register what's happening, you stand up to ask what's going on, and realize that you're only up to your friend's chest. You can't be more than four feet tall!

You are so startled by this, you don't realize that AJ grabbed the beer from your hands and pressed it up against your lips, forcing more of it down your throat! DId she spike the beer? Is that what's making you smaller?! You instinctively smack the beer out of her hands, but she just looks back at you and smirks in a playful manner as she says "OH WELL.
