154232222122.content:
The faire only stops by town every few months, so Maggie was aching to get out and see the festivities. She's always enjoyed that sort of atmosphere, almost like she'd be right at home in the 1400's. She grabs your arm tight as she weaves in and out of people, stopping to check out the random tables selling jewelry and weapons. You both have a bit of a knife collection at home from the first time you went here and spent an unusual amount of money on ancient weapons you'd more than likely never have to use. She separates from you to go watch the jousting while you continue to walk around. You pass by the random food pits and archery demonstrations until you come across an old ratty tent. Out front there's a few empty chairs and a hand written sign:

"MADAMME ROSELLA: CHANNELER, MYSTIC, SORCORESS EXTROADINAIRE.... $10 PER READING.

You look in your wallet and see a Hamilton staring back at you. Well, you may as well give it a shot. You wait by the front of the tent and are about to call in, when you hear a sexy foreign voice whisper "Enter, Traveller". You slowly make your way into the tent, and see two empty chairs around a small table. In the middle of the table are a collection of beads, a stack of tarot cards, some gold coins and a large crystal ball. The voice returns and says "Please take the empty seat close to you. Madamme will be with you shortly." You take the seat and place the bill on the table next to another stack of bills, and wait for "Madame" to enter. After a few seconds of waiting, this eastern european music begins playing and out steps Madame Rosella. She is a short woman, no more than 4 feet, 10 inches or so... and she's dressed in a tight red top adorned with jewels and roses, and a long red skirt that falls behind her as she walks. She is barefoot with dark red painted toes and thick, healthy legs. Her hair is a mess of black that looks like it hasn't been combed in weeks, and a thin veil covers all of her face except for her eyes and nose. She sits across from you, and leans into the table with her hand on her chin. "You do not seem troubled." You don't know how to react to this. "Uh... thank you?" Is all you can muster. She smiles and says "Many of the men who come to see Madame Rosellla are in need of guidance. Are in fear of what the world has in store for them... or just look to make themselves wealthy. But the spirits are not easily fooled." She takes your hand and traces a long unpainted fingernail across your palm. She says "Hmmm... just as I suspected. You are content with your life. You need not seek out the forces of other realms to arrange the pieces for you, you seem to be carving your own path." You smirk, tapping on the ten dollar bill on the table. "I want to be sure that you're telling the truth. You can speak to the spirits? I'd like to know what they have to say about me." Rosella sighs and says to you "Very well. I will look for answers... even if you are not willing to supply questions."

She grabs some sand from under her chair and sprinkles some across the glowing orb in the center of the table. She looks into it and begins to moan in concentration. She closes her eyes and says "The forces are strong... they command me to send you a message..." You lean in close, interested to see what the seer has to relay to you. She places her hand on the ball and says in a loud clear voice... "TWO OCEANS CONVERGED... A FOREST OF PLEASURE... AND... A BLACK JEWEL SHINING IN A PALE DESERT..." She opens her eyes and says "Very well. You may go now." You sit there dumbfounded and finally blurt out "... Huh?!" She sits back in the chair and takes the veil off of her face, revealing her ruby red lips. "The spirits have left you a message. It is up to you to decide what it will unfold to. A warning, a reward, a journey... the spirits are vague because you must discover these things for yourself. I am only here to help you get started. Thank you for your patronage, please make your way out." She begins to collect the money from the table when you say "You've got to be kidding me! That's all I get? That wasn't even worth TWO dollars, you crook!"

She stands to her feet and slams her palms flat on the table. "You call Madame a cheat? I am here to give you a glimpse into the other worlds, worlds that would make you tremble if you had a taste of their power, and you call me a thief? A swindler? You have no idea who you are talking to, do you?" You stand up defiantly and say back to her "I know who i'm talking to, Short Stuff... a no good CON ARTIST!" She takes a deep breath and begins to walk towards you, chanting in a different language and laughing to herself. You begin to get nervous as the lights inside the tent flicker on and off, and she begins to walk you into the corner. You feel the flaps of the tent behind you as her short body comes closer to you with piercing eyes. She has not stopped talking in this foreign dialect and she grabs your shirt collar, bringing you down to her level. With a swift motion, she puts her hands behind your head and pushes you into her lips, embracing in a powerful, angry kiss. She lets go, smacking her lips apart loudly as the lights return to normal and she begins to breath heavily. She chuckles a bit to herself and says very quietly... "You wanted to see Madamme Rosella's true power? Very well... I will show you..."

You start to feel queazy and fall to your knees, unable to stand. Your head begins pounding and the world seems to spin around you. Madame Rosella takes a few steps closer to you, smirking in the power she has over you. "You pathetic fool, you tried to stand toe to toe with a sorceress? Well then i think it's only fitting to give you all the proof that you'd ever need that the spirits have given me the power to make your life a living hell. Let's start with some simple commands." She pulls up a chair and sits close to your trembling body. With a point of her finger she says to you "Stand." Your body rises seemingly without your own will, and you feel yourself stand at attention in front of the short gypsy woman. "Jump." You body lifts off the ground once, at her command. With a hearty grin she points to the ground and whispers... "Kneel." Your body falls to it's knees and you sit before her, anxiously waiting to see what comes next. She lifts up her left leg, her toes wiggling in your face and says down to you... "Kiss." You grab her foot and bring it up to your face, closing your eyes in a passionate kiss against her sole. She giggles at the ticklish feeling of her new slave's lips against her bare feet and says "That's enough... Release."

And suddenly you regain control of your body, spitting out a bit of the grime that you had taken in from kissing her feet. It tasted like grass, which would make sense considering what her bare feet had been in contact with for seemingly days at a time. You stand up, fearing what this diminutive woman is planning to do to you next. She laughs and crosses her foot across her lap, twirling her ratty hair in her fingers. "Now you see what I am capable of, you stupid man. That curse i put on you allows me to completely control you for a short period of time. It takes a lot out of me, but it's worth it to see you grovelling at my feet like a peasant. Now have you learned your lesson?" You clench your fists, humiliated and filled with rage at the fact that this short gypsy woman has basically forced you to act like her pet. You hold it back though, saying slowly "... Yes Ma'am.. I have." She starts to smile and says "Very well then. The spirits have given me enough power for just one more command. Are you ready to follow it?" You sigh and say "Whatever it takes to get out of this tent alive." She laughs and says "Very well then. Here's your final command. I don't like the way you look down at me. You are too tall." She walks up right next to you, points at your face and looks you right in the eyes as she gives her final demand of you...

"SHRINK."

You feel your entire body tingle as a blue light surrounds you. You stare in horror as the beautiful sorceress before you starts to grow... along with everything else around you! Her sharp blue eyes stare daggers into you as they meet with yours. She blows you a kiss as your vision continues to drop below her chest, her waist, and then her thighs. You start to run for the opening to the tent, but with every step you take, you lose even more height. It takes no time at all for her long thick legs to catch up to you, and stomp a foot directly in your path. You come to a halt before the beautiful foot, which is almost up to your waist in height, and remember how just a second ago you were kissing the pretty soles. Now it has become a dangerous appendage that could squash you flat with one misstep. A roaring laughter appears all around you and you look up to see Rosella standing as tall as a building before you, with her hands placed defiantly on her hips. "PUNY LITTLE PEASANT." Is all she says before her large legs bend and she extends a hand out to grab you're shrinking body. Her thumb and forefinger grab you on both sides and lift you off of the dirt floor, placing you into her soft, lotioned palm. Rosella admires her handiwork, having just turned this normal 5'10 person into a 3 inch toy in the palm of her hand. She giggles with excitement and hovers her enormous face over your tiny body. "YOU WILL MAKE A WONDERFUL PET FOR ME." She puts a finger in your face, intent on petting you on your tiny little head. You seize the opportunity, not wanting to be this crazy gypsy woman's slave, and bite the huge mass of flesh as it gets closer. "OUCH! WHY YOU LITTLE BUG!" While she recoils in pain, you jump from her hand and into her dress. You slide down the fabric, landing on the flesh of her foot. "DAMN IT. WHERE DID HE GO? WHERE DID THAT LITTLE PEASANT GO?!" She gets to her knees to look for you, and you hop off of her foot, quickly dashing to the flap of the tent. Stepping cautiously over the huge blades of grass in your way, you desperately try to make your way to the outside of the tent. Once you got outside, you could get help from someone else, maybe even if you're lucky you could find your way back to Maggie! You finally make your way into the bright sunlight, happy beyond belief that you've escaped the crazy sorceress when suddenly...

You try to get her to stay away from the tent containing the woman who threatened to "show you her power", but after a while, you inevitably double back to the place you ran from just an hour or so earlier. But as you point out some landmarks, you realized that you had passed over the area where the tent was. It was gone! You didn't even see an indent in the grass from where it had been set up. How could this be? Did you imagine the whole thing? You try to shrug it off, and spend the rest of the day close to Maggie. The two of you get home late in the evening, and you feel so drained from the day that you kiss your girlfriend and make your way into bed. You pass out almost immediately, and when you open your eyes, you're no longer in your home. You're in an open field of tall grass.

You see nothing but the field in every direction, with the sun shining brightly overhead. You hear a voice say all around you... "TWO OCEANS CONVERGED." You spin around quickly and see in the distance a figure of a woman. A short woman. Dressed in red, with jewels and beads, with wild black hair. It's Madame Rosella! You see her walk towards you and the words echo in your head again... "A FOREST OF PLEASURE". You turn to run from her but bump into something large and firm. You step back to check what exactly you've hit, and are shocked to discover a gigantic human foot in your path. You look up slowly to discover that you're in between the legs of a gargantuan gypsy, staring down at you and grinning as she whispers "A BLACK JEWEL SHINING IN A PALE DESERT." And in a flash of light, you are transported to a huge tan plane, with hills and canyons all throughout it. But there is a smell in the air that disorients you and confuses you. It smells like... hand lotion. You look up and no longer see a sun in the sky, but a huge eyeball darting back and forth to search for you. It finally comes to rest and the head it's attached to leans back. The massive face of Madame Rosella is gazing down on your miniscule body, like a goddess watching over the earth. You fall back onto the ground, which you now realize is her massive palm, and you feel yourself shrinking furher and further into the cracks of her skin. Her face, still as beautiful and powerful as ever, is staring down at you and with a very cold, determined look, the goddess speaks once more. "I WILL SHOW YOU... MY POWER." The huge appendage gets closer and closer, looking like a planet crashing directly on top of you. And just as her fingernail is about to make contact with her palm, sandwiching your speck sized body between them...

You sit up in a shot, sweating and breathing heavily. You are shaking from the vision in your dreams, and you look out the window. The sun. It's the next day already, but you feel as though you haven't slept a wink. You stand up, groggy from the experience, and start to walk into the next room. You greet your girlfriend, who's already up eating breakfast. You can tell she's just woken up herself, because her hair is a mess and she's wearing nothing but a tank top and panties. Your eyes lock with hers, and she says "Good morning, sunshine. You really hit it hard last night." You sigh and say "Yeah, and the bad thing is i feel like i haven't slept at all." She gives a fake pouty face as she says "Aww, poor baby. Have some breakfast, and maybe you'll feel better." 1542322221222222.title: Isobel's New Doll

15423222212222223.content:
Isobel pulls you ever closer to her beaming blue eye, her gaze on you only interrupted momentarily when she blinks. You do your best to breathe through your nose - not too much so as to give yourself away, though your lungs are still burning from being inside her mouth. You're about to lose your nerve and give yourself away when you hear a deep, sultry voice from the doorway ask, "Aren't you a bit old for dolls?"

The girl turns her face toward the voice, allowing you to glance over as well. Leaning on the inside of the door frame is another girl, probably about 20, who's clearly Isobel's sister with her long, black curly hair and large blue eyes. When she smirks you see that she too has impossibly white teeth, and though you can't see from where you are she probably has Isobel's light freckling too. It's clear that she has lots of time to work out, since her white camisole, black short shorts and white ankle socks hide very little of her lean, sculpted body.

"Yes," Isobel admits, then quickly adds, "But this one's really cool Claudia, it's not like the others! It's got a lot of cool details, it's got some sort of body heat, and I think it even acts like it's breathing! If I didn't know any better I'd say someone shrank down a person."

"Oh really?" Claudia asks. "Can I see it then?" Isobel shrugs and then stands up. She continues gently gripping you, concerned about the fragility of such a lifelike doll, as she crosses the carpeted floor to the doorway. You steal another glance as you're carried by her side, and notice that Claudia's legs are several inches taller than Isobel's: the latter must have a lot more growing left to do.

Isobel raises the hand with you in it and drops you into Claudia's waiting palm, a soft, not uncomfortable place. "Okay, just give it back quick."

"Yeah, sure thing." Claudia cups her hand to cradle you and lifts you up to her chest so that she can inspect you, and you do your best to get in a pose that will be easy to hold until she's done. Her massive finger comes out and prods you, moving your chin up and down, then goes to rotate your arms. She looks you up and down with her probing eyes and lets out along, quizzical hum when she spies your crotch. You try not to blush when she says, "Yeah, definitely didn't expect to see one of those."

"Okay now give it back," Isobel demands. Claudia responds by snagging your shirt between the thumb and forefinger of her other hand so that you dangle and holding you up above Isobel as high as her arm will reach.

"Come get it shorty!" she taunts as she waves you back and forth, the pendulum effect making you very uncomfortable. Isobel jumps and reaches for you, but Claudia lifts you just out of her reach. While most dolls are fine with that, the sudden rise and fall of your stomach makes you feel like you got punched in the gut, and it takes all your concentration to keep up the doll act. Again Isobel jumps and you're lifted away from her, making you feel nauseated. Claudia reaches out and puts her hand on Isobel's head, holding her in place while she dangles you like a pendulum some more. The younger sister struggles against Claudia's palm and then jumps again, surprising Claudia and making her yank you away more sharply than before. That's when...
15423222212222223.title: Claudia's Keep Away

154232222122222233.content:
Claudia pulls you up just in time, and Isobel's fingers swipe at the air not even an inch below you. The younger sister continues frantically grabbing for you but Claudia keeps her hand firmly planted on her head, keeping her from jumping too high and, more importantly, keeping you out of her grasp. "Come on, give it back!" Isobel whines. "You promised!"

Just then a voice rings out from down the stairwell, clearly calling out Isobel's name. Claudia laughs and says, "Go see what mom wants, I'll put it back in your little dolly house all safe and sound." Isobel pouts and storms out of the room, and Claudia forms her hand into a bowl to support you as she gently lowers you onto her palm.

Though you're cushioned by her palm Claudia doesn't set you down entirely, instead making you dangle from her grasp while barely touching her palm with the tips of your feet. You do your best to maintain your pose without moving too much, but it's only a matter of time before you falter.

Claudia walks you over to the house you had been pulled out of and stops. "I guess this is the place," she mutters to herself. Instead of lowering you into it, she raises you up to her face. Her warm breath washes over you and she brings in her larger than normal blue eyes, enormous to you now, to inspect you. "Seems like an odd detail to add, a tiny little penis, guess dad didn't notice before he bought it. Eh, at least it's proportional."

Satisfied with her inspection Claudia begins to lower you down into your apartment, and not a moment too soon - her warm breath buffeting you, the strain from being held upright, the impression of her all-seeing eye - if it had gone on any longer there's no doubt you would have broken character. As you pass through the removed ceiling you take a deep breath, knowing that this is the home stretch, and soon you'll be hidden away from these giant sisters pestering you.

When you have just two inches left, Claudia drops you, spilling you onto your back. Your head hits the floor hard enough to make you momentarily see stars, though not do any permanent damage. Claudia turns away and you reflexively rub the back of your head while it smarts from the pain.

You hear a gasp from above and know you screwed up. Claudia drops the roof she was about to replace and claps a hand to her mouth. Shocked she leans in as if to verify what she's seeing. "Oh my God! You- you're... you're..."
154232222122222233.title: The Strain of Being a Doll

1542322221222222331.content:
Claudia's exclamation jolts you into action, and in your excitement you forget to maintain the pretense that you're a doll. You start screaming and backing away from the girl, who seems just as surprised as you are though not nearly as terrified - after all, she's not the one shrinking. Your back bumps into a cabinet, ending your retreat. Madame Rosella's laughter rings in your ears as you find yourself trapped, just as tall as your old waist-high cabinets and getting smaller still.

By now Claudia's overcome her shock at not only seeing this doll come to life, but get smaller right before her eyes. She reaches a hand down from her freckled face, fingers at the ready to snatch you up off the floor of your apartment turned dollhouse. You duck under her first strike, and manage to sidestep her second pinch, finding some advantage at least in your small and still-lessening size. Claudia pulls back her hand and gets it ready to pounce while you watch her fingertips carefully, bouncing back and forth on your feet and ready to dodge her next swipe.

As you focus more and more on her hand poised to strike, she draws it gradually off to the side, compelling you to follow it with your view. She tips it down to strike, and you preemptively dodge the other way... just as she pounces with her other hand, an open-palm strike to snatch you out of the air. As her fingers press you against her palm there's no doubt about it: you fell for the oldest trick in the book.

When Claudia next opens her palm she's holding you up to her gargantuan blue eyes, inspecting your tinier form. "I knew there was something up with you," she booms as she sets an finger in front of you. "All that detail, body heat, simulated breathing... you may have tricked Isobel, but you can't trick me." She prods you with her finger, driving you back. "Never thought you'd shrink though, that's definitely a new one."

Claudia blows a blast of hot breath over you and chuckles. She opens her mouth to say something, but is interrupted by a voice from the doorway. "Now who's too old to play with dolls?" Isobel teases, and Claudia rolls her eyes in response.

"Whatever, I have something to tell you!" they both say at the same time, then rush to say their news before the other one can.

info.brief_description: Your nerdy but cute friend shrinks you to tiny (maybe micro) size!  Additions Welcomed!
info.description:
Your best friend is very cute, but has always been a very nerdy person. Incredibly smart, but not at her peak socially. So when she asks you to come over to see her new invention, you don't think twice before heading over. Then you find out that her invention is designed to shrink things down to tiny size, and her next test subject is you! What will you do now that your friend has reduced you to a much smaller size and also, it turns out, has had deep feelings for you for a long time!

This is a shrinking fetish based story, that will hopefully be VERY long and detailed by the end. Additions are welcomed on a few conditions:

1 - NO SINGLE-SENTENCE CHAPTERS. The chapters should be detailed, with at least one paragraph of story. Any chapters that are one or two sentences long will be edited.

2 - THIS IS A GIANTESS SHRINKING STORY. So try to keep it to male shrinking and female growth. Females are allowed to shrink, and if for a few brief moments the woman is smaller than the shrunken man, that's fine too, but for every situation there has to be an element of a woman in control.

3 - Things allowed (and encouraged) are: Feet, Handheld, Insertion, Soft Vore (no chewing), Humiliation, Domination, Sex, and shrinking is unlimited (You can make them ANY size you want without limitation). For the stuff i don't want to see: No Butt stuff. Poop, farting, all that stuff will not be permitted. Not to say that the story won't have the potential to be a little gross here and there, but this is just a personal thing.

4 - NO KILLING THE MAIN CHARACTER. Always keep the story going with an option or two. There is no "end" in sight for right now, the idea is just to have fun. And always leave an option for the size of the main character to change. No dead ends in sight, that's what we're aiming for. Also the main character is YOU. This is a size changing story told from YOUR perspective (2nd Person), so write accordingly.

Once the options are opened up, there will be a ton of different ways to take the story, with a whole mess of different characters. We started off with four girls and now we're up to a possibility of 20 or so different girls who take control of the tiny protagonist. The story is just starting to pick up ground, so the more options there are, the more chances we have to make this a HUGE interactive with a lot of different writing styles and characters.

PLEASE feel free to add your own girl to start off with or jump into the story to interact with the previously established characters. But for each girl you add, give a brief overview of her looks, personality, and intentions, BE DESCRIPTIVE with each chapter, any chapters that are rushing a point and changing the story dramatically quickly will be edited or deleted. Have fun with this, let's try and expand this as much as possible!

***** EDIT: 1/25/14

Only three months old and already the story's up to almost 100 chapters! Thanks to everyone who is contributing and to everyone else for reading it!
